7a611cb8db26e166677db7f79f3e9bae.text:
When confronted with new enemies, be sure to learn about their abilities. 

Hold down $1 while mousing over units to examine them

707838e56b572a9b5dd23b103ad63943.text:
This is the Power Grid. Whenever a building is damaged, it will be reduced. 

If it is reduced to zero, you LOSE.

e1eeaad738817ac067225578a0baf0fa.text: When aiming a weapon, the ORANGE tiles show where you can shoot.

8c948cedd526df19bb93034b8ad672fb.text:
Every enemy attack is forewarned. Next turn, this one will attack the buildings. 

Hover over an enemy to see details about its attack.

6bd9a477bce827800b72d842bbdd1b11.text:
This is your Combat Mech. It can punch any adjacent tile. 

Click on your Mech, move it closer to the enemy, and punch him.

5b6e7257af6df874b42fa879f8ecfd00.text:
All of your Mechs were disabled. In normal battles, the Vek would then continue their attacks and the mission would end. 

For this tutorial, your Mechs have been fully repaired.

bc801be4f12b39d1935e65b84748c512.text:
Your Power Grid has been reduced to zero. Normally this would mean game over. 

Because this is a simulation, you can continue fighting the Vek.

5b6f7146d2509023195dc555be3e9ac0.text: You cannot hit the enemy from this location. Use 'Undo Move' to reposition the Mech!

66b4cdda1eb071c99ca566b176bf5511.text:
Your Mech's punch PUSHED this unit. It will now attack a new location! 

Pushes can save buildings from enemy attacks, or even make enemies attack each other.

e3329be7c31805454dac7585bb703cd3.text:
This is your Tank Mech. 

It shoots a projectile that travels in a straight line until it hits another object.

39a08f694a07d512093ec0d3513db427.text: Every mission, you win by defeating the Vek or fighting them until they retreat.

a76906f62cdf1b770f2b66e0ee0a6e3f.text:
Missions also have bonus objectives. 

Completing these will earn you additional resources after the battle.

06ceb4ba26e51c80e069d06f19cd6d00.text:
Click on a weapon to use it. The number keys will also work as a shortcut. 

You may not move after you've shot a weapon.

ee10e3906c1e0aa88398d5376de5e784.text: When all of your Mechs have used an action or there is nothing left for your units to do, press this button to end your turn.

a6d277f01ac333493cb5210e8af9941f.text: The tanks have come online and can now be controlled!

c7fc05495bef77dcbf37de1658d63bf8.text:
This Terraformer unit is under your control during this mission. 

Use it to turn Grass tiles into Sand tiles.

6b62349c25ded810315a3300e14a33f9.text: Your bonus objective in this mission is to not let this Vek die.

bf4c61c58093b0c6acaaec1f1f98655b.text:
Warning: This final mission is still in development. 

It is less polished and still being designed. 

You should still find it roughly playable. Good luck!

80cfd3dc2522979f617b789988caa81a.text:
Warning: This save file was created by a previous version of Into the Breach. 

Since the game is still in development, I can't guarantee full backwards compatibility for every update and you may experience problems with this save. 

That said, chances are good that you won't have any issues. Sorry about the possible troubles!

ee8a17f0836a80f624a0107811302d9a.text: This Pilot is a Sentient machine and requires Reactor Power to activate its special ability.

76d8ec0666c0fab587c5bf248c970921.text:
This unit is inflicted with A.C.I.D. With its defenses corroded, incoming Weapon Damage will be doubled.

All other damage (Push, Fire, Blocking, etc.) is unaffected.

990c0f701cc2208ba127d2cb056e904f.text: This unit is FROZEN. It cannot move or attack and will remain Frozen until it takes damage.

918368503143cd25a742ede437fd7be5.text: This Mech can use its Repair Skill to free itself from the ice, but otherwise cannot attack or move.

3e9c5f7fa0b0fe9f7011fad81281cd13.text:
This is a Shield. It will block damage and any negative effects (Fire, Freezing, A.C.I.D, etc.). 

Only direct damage will remove the Shield. Non-damaging, negative effects will have no effect.

202ce6b05b7cec61e6d4fddb1ea7034c.text:
This unit is Armored. All incoming Weapon Damage will be reduced by 1. 

All other damage (Push, Fire, Blocking, etc.) is unaffected.

e481cfb5e6c8b599acaecb8a61d588cb.text:
This mission has a special effect that will happen every turn. 

Mouse over the environment icon to get more information.

463e2f306203da28680be887ca694cb4.text:
The Power Grid connects every corporate Island. Any damage it takes in missions will persist. 

The Vek caused damage before you arrived, but there will be opportunities to restore it.

8077ed577b5c1d096e4fdd1276b68933.text: If your Power Grid is full when it receives additional power, your Grid Defense will be permanently upgraded.

893ad99a93770a513dd4e1257eaa7f5b.text: You can only Overpower your Power Grid to have an additional +25 Defense.

0a8d9d72ab120bf3ac77c550a5da0c61.text:
This building resisted damage! 

The chance of a building resisting damage is shown to the right of your Power Meter.

1599ec0d5be1a70a7c12c7d2401ddac7.text:
This enemy Psion provides a passive bonus to all Vek. Killing it removes the bonus. 

Select the Psion and mouse over its portrait in the bottom left for more information.

f9aaa92e840cc96cc093859c10313f16.text:
This unit has been WEBBED! 

Mouseover the status icons on the bottom left to investigate what that means.

32b6ac51c13ac392d2e9f3e3552be5f2.text:
You can attempt the Islands you've unlocked in any order. 

Vek difficulty will scale depending on how many Islands you've completed this game.

e062c810ef865866d424beeb020c7c38.text:
An enemy unit will emerge here next turn! 

You can temporarily block enemies from spawning, but it will damage the blocking unit.

9c4c96a2a6a710e683c99a81d88fe6a4.text:
The FOREST on this tile took damage, turning it into FIRE. 

If a unit stands on Fire, it will ignite and take damage every turn.

6a7284aedd257d8ca7e9c644d7efaf73.text:
This Mech is on FIRE! It will take one damage every turn. 

Mechs can REPAIR status effects, but cannot attack the same turn that they repair.

3ac6a0bb2ce1d49e7384b9af6a677088.text:
Your Mechs will automatically repair all damage after battle. 

If a Mech is reduced to 0 health, the Pilot dies and the Mech is disabled for the rest of that battle.

0ba7ed3437d6f9303f93b8de455aa667.text:
This Mech is inflicted with A.C.I.D.! It corrodes the unit's armor, causing all incoming damage to be doubled. 

Mechs can REPAIR status effects, but cannot attack the same turn that they repair.

437692ce132f09c01a128d89e772de00.text:
This Pod contains equipment from the future! 

You can collect it with your Mech, or just defend it until the end of the battle.

6c35e073cbc4bbe3f1b7cd7a63fadb95.text:
The Time Pod on this tile has been destroyed! 

Time Pods are destroyed by taking damage or by any enemy standing on it.

0f919302feb51711bce641b587c611fe.text: Mechs cannot use their weapons when standing in Water.

43cccc2cceaf16d6b4dbd54243515fb5.text:
Mechs cannot use their weapons when standing in Water. 

You can use Undo Move if you'd like to reposition it.

3c099c43e5fcfc30aed5c7e036980a9a.text: Your Mech was disabled! Its Pilot was killed and it will not be able to act for the rest of the mission.

b3a0629013f1e5b9029e083c3478b891.text: This unit fell into the Water, killing it instantly!

e1749f019dcb8a90143ad537dfb5d9f6.text: Pushing units into things deals 1 additional damage to both!

bdcdfcdc465734e20522eaf4901e5959.text:
Pushing units into things deals 1 additional damage to both! 

In this case, the extra damage killed the unit!

a7b21789b68c4389c7021336767d6b83.text: After selecting a location to shoot, if you're using a touch screen tap the same location again to confirm the shot

10a2152c0d8ae5942e724fdffd8126ef.text:
This building tile was damaged, so your city Power Grid was reduced. 

Your primary goal is to prevent this!

44e78706a90c1c3664dd55e22c735aa9.text:
There is a Combat Simulation available to get new Commanders up to speed with mechanized combat. 

Would you like to launch the simulation?

d59aa9b9ec2e4c669787008db133f4db.text:
As you secure regions and complete bonus objectives, your reputation with the local Corporation will increase. 

 You can spend reputation on supplies at the end of the Island.

6ec9ccb14daf75cf8b961fa0fb98cd14.text: You now have a Reactor Core! Open a Mech's Upgrade Screen and install it.

e6fb98c5624a3ed4072469fb7e88011e.text:
You can use this button to install Reactor Cores in a Mech. 

Each Core will increase a Mech's maximum reactor power by one.

12bd82aed2cb5883118c86cf4ba6c918.text:
You can use reactor power to activate weapon modifications. 

Click on a mod to power it. You can always click again to remove the power if you want to put it elsewhere.

69442465b9a3acde37fde8e03d53c4ec.text: You just got a new weapon! You can equip it in the Upgrade Screen.

528bc322dd901052d982bb08adce56bd.text: You just got a new Pilot! You can assign them in the Upgrade Screen.

7731a1c10c7907a15d4fa21e1a430baa.text:
The game has been updated and older beta profiles might encounter some oddities after these changes.

Your Achievement Coins Total might be negative now because of changes to pricing of previously unlocked Mechs. The game is functioning, you'll just need more Achievements to break even.

If you have a run in progress, it may not load correctly. I hope it still works, but I apologize if it does not.

01977e7dd9e00e08a93003b340f537bd.text: When aiming a weapon or examining an enemy attack, icons show you exactly what will happen.

1e9bab002b8a01217b17aa1a0aa24319.text: An arrow on a tile means a unit on that tile will be pushed

7e5a105f4e2854102fab018055030ccb.text: A number on a tile means the unit on that tile will be damaged

6d73bec2f6ce0a5ceaf59c9553570b10.text: Some weapons can cause multiple effects on a single tile

338fc5a8f29ad0357372a0ae4c550504.text: Artillery Weapons can shoot over obstacles like mountains, but cannot shoot adjacent tiles.

6d8b40fac33c32e2da88dec68bf07009.text: The Artillery Mech's weapon will only damage units on the CENTER tile, while units on ADJACENT tiles are pushed.

66d15d3e5f4dccbb25d584a1ff81e897.text:
Every mission has different potential rewards for completing bonus objectives. 
    You won't be able to do every mission on the Island, so choose carefully!

4936eb5172ee8b4a6d3384418cf22a26.text: POWER CORES: Used to upgrade your Mechs.

b5aa901c009023cd6d1a38f39ec2364a.text:
GRID POWER: Restores your Power Grid. 
If your Power Grid reaches zero, you lose.

cebb52c118132d544ba1e4f55f4decea.text: CORP REPUTATION: Used to purchase items once the Island is secure.

2cecb339d96e5c3a68ccee30c296d341.text: WARNING: Missions with more potential rewards will have additional dangers!

ad4957b59cd2d66a919a756a8410e5c7.text: After securing two corporate islands, the Final Mission is available to complete.

25992de388d93be872ec73f4707ce6c2.text: The difficulty of this battle scales to your current progress. Fighting it now will be as much of a challenge as attempting it after securing additional Islands

fbce892c4df0bde1edd65dc50c23150b.text: Securing more islands before the Final Mission will allow you to save more civilians and increase your final score.

a435041423488ab3375eca52073ae449.text: No, I know what I'm doing (hide ALL future tutorial tips)

fd44c9f820e40ad4d8b5bbab895c096f.text:
You may complete the Final Mission at any point after securing two Corporate Islands.

The difficulty of the mission scales to your current progress.

b3f4360620275006d782f4db1f489ac8.text: Use reputation points to purchase supplies once an Island is secured.

004f963ad95a1b04aa4daa8db393df17.text:
Used for upgrading your Mechs. 

Open the Mech Upgrade screen by clicking on any Mech icon on the left.

a596380bd51b69aa2155b2dbba57fa48.text: Mouse over here or hold ALT to display the order enemies will attack.

6e57d3f52375c99387a38b8b778507ae.text: Shows the order that actions will happen during the enemy turn. Hotkey: [$1]

a5704ef5d17d6e34e56b6c17a028d6ed.text:
How long you've been playing your current game. 

You can hide this in the Options menu.

dee6f1f8d87b1865581ad94a6134be20.text:
Go back in time to the start of the current turn. Available after taking at least one action. 

You can only do this once per battle.

53202e43f748b602c490a68fe9bad3e9.text: You can only use this once per battle.

410ed538eff6e2c2a1d00c404a1fa8b3.text:
Go back in time to the start of the current turn. Available after taking at least one action. 

Your 'Temporal Reset' Pilot gives you one extra Reset per battle. You have 2 remaining.

e75be79cc30a237939127927e4f6ef66.text:
Go back in time to the start of the current turn. Available after taking at least one action. 

You only have 1 Reset remaining.

58793042a14774337a8ef97a9f0b851c.text:
Modifies how quickly enemy units take their turn. 

Slow it down if you're new and having troubles following enemy actions, speed it up if you're experienced and comfortable with combat.

f8a6d97c40e2bf9bde3a7820b9409b46.text: End this attempt and send a Pilot back in time to try again.

5ab415512413cd614cfa107376a28cda.text:
Show relevant Tutorial popups during the game. 

Highly recommended for new players.

49b8396489a3e7374927c07d09f4b2db.text:
Customize the max combat board rendering scale.

This can be useful to decrease the scale for larger monitors.

Current window default scale is: $1

0ae0d23a1d1e5a47b6b515fb341073d6.text: Restore the game to its default 720p Window. Recommended for streaming.

397122c5eae73af50ef59a0c036dec6f.text:
Add Game Timer to the UI. 

Helpful for speed running or obtaining the 'Lightning War' achievement

9919d0e2fa6d4b0c00e47b0827fb0c16.text:
Changes some colors and adds additional icons to aid colorblind players.

Let us know if you'd like anything improved with this.

1b8f5b9ea9f46d4922ebea93e2b5d768.text: Increases the size of tooltips, dialogs, and other critical texts.

a3ccfd0681598a863fb206fd129922c0.text: Your current window resolution is too small to support larger fonts.

fd2227cbec643184bb0f5a5bda07c278.text: Receive confirmation when you attempt to end your turn and have units still available to act.

18f137b6ff3c0457a49dc42d99a31a30.text:
Stretch art and UI when adjusting to larger resolutions. 

Helpful for high (1440p or more) resolution monitors if the UI is too small, but might make the art and text slightly blurry.

f2a4fd376fd0558f952efebbd19bff2e.text:
Limit the FPS to 60.

Recommended for most systems.

d85ca6373e8ab30c64ad7c6cf113cb39.text:
Prevent the board / UI from shaking.

This is common during combat when something deals damage.

46e9939579d71828c0be177ebfa097c2.text:
Add coordinates to the board.

Good for streaming, or whenever sharing the game in other forms.

af32b8f2f98597096ccce48a95d23da2.text:
Your Video Drivers do not support the necessary requirements for this. 

Please update or contact support if you need this feature.

8df71f7944386174f76bddb63a3c3f93.text: All enemies will retreat in $1 turns

9d5761f598618bf5b7bc3e5d63278821.text: All enemies will retreat in 1 turn

f0208e95aacb83ae7f0b582be1d8bd04.text: The bomb will explode in $1 turns

228bd85e6d4ac6ec7dbb735d34af3c9c.text: The bomb will explode in 1 turn

0f86a7a62e0290290b14fc25eb96088e.text: Rewards Corporate Reputation, used to buy equipment.

5b6c8b9eaaf2cd1d9d374e746bdaaf4b.text: A Time Pod's contents could be useful for the fights ahead.

46d8e5a217c800965f72380f97a79788.text: Restores power to the Power Grid

72f54b33842023f43b6281f05b573879.text: Rewards a Reactor Core, used to upgrade Mechs.

a2df8ef7e3c59dd9c2c7f852589c4b07.text:
The number of people you've saved in this time line 

Higher difficulties have more people per building in battle.

98e19fa07969dbd898a12cc9a3fc4784.text:
You can use reactor power to improve your weapons, or power additional weapons. 

Install Reactor Cores to upgrade a Mech's reactor.

41e9d05f2b9f12ee3c92fc4f3681329f.text: The Zoltan Pilot prevents increasing the HP of this Mech

017434f53d02c231132cb1207723f7d7.text:
The Mech's Class determines which weapon types it can efficiently use. 

Weapons not in the same class will cost 1 extra Reactor Power.

ad96412935725387ad576dfa618bca97.text: Cyborgs require 1 extra Reactor Power to use any non-Cyborg weapon or passive.

e90147a4fc12ba444efd16deba1e975e.text: This Pilot has unlocked all of their skills!

93e6a10800f59909453ee9617e85b86c.text: Once this Pilot gains enough experience in combat, they will unlock more skills.

511e9ab5d7600f006572aa98246d6753.text:
Basic AI Pilots are already operating at their peak efficiency and do not gain experience in combat. 

Find superior human Pilots, or advanced AI Pilots, to replace the basic AI.

43aa5426efe811a1fdc8525da78fe233.text:
The percentage chance any building will resist damage. 

Gain Power when your Power Grid is full to upgrade its Defense.

091818283f09c965c79714064c1021c0.text:
You LOSE if this reaches zero. 

Reduced every time a Powered Building is damaged in combat.

3d7c1d9caf54fe5ea41ec3e212947d2a.text: Reactor Cores are used to upgrade your Mechs between missions.

317fabcd8075160bb53ae14fd26fd687.text:
Repair damage to your Power Grid. 

If your Power Grid is full, this will permanently upgrade your Grid Defense.

b726ac65031efb497cf8fd47ec520f11.text:
Your Power Grid is full. Additional Power will permanently upgrade your Grid Defense. 

The bonus will decrease the higher your Grid Defense gets, to a maximum of +25.

393f77ed71d670753e143183f4986828.text:
Your Power Grid and Grid Defense are both at their maximum value. 

You cannot purchase additional Power.

fe7e147807891f03cf46873ff8e255ff.text: No special additions for this mission

4de97a385dbe577d4790467be2a360ea.text: One extra Alpha Vek will be present when the mission starts

b4826c7865e6f895cb0286c8b34d0905.text: Some buildings start with a free Shield

019800612108220ffdaa9ad88aaac463.text: Conveyor Belts will push units around the map

ba385690a57dd86e07d7da021e24ff96.text: A bomber will periodically target areas of the map

9a2fedc2c86524c55ebaab91a14d438d.text: The map will gradually be flooded in water

8a59848be42a8d8c481212200e93d203.text: The map will gradually break apart into a massive chasm

33d772191bfc614314d6b3fb12bffa85.text: Ground tiles will periodically sink into chasms, taking any unit with them

4f91ab5e6ace84262b21eb3593d21293.text: Dangerous lightning will threaten the map, killing anything it strikes

644a4c139ed090bda8e4de521bb68bb3.text: Large areas of the map will periodically freeze solid

9b9deb31726b572bb7786fdf9a973307.text: This Museum Island recreates Old Earth as it was before the oceans rose and nearly wiped out humanity.

5ee34830ad5049295b0d7959d563a184.text: Terraforming specialists, R.S.T. turned the environment against the Vek and nearly destroyed their Island in the process.

e0d7f6d3702c6cbf244648ef8f47b120.text: Pinnacle Robotics fights a war on two fronts, one against the Vek, the other against its own Sentient Weapons.

85c85a15684a2cbc9f11442224cc71aa.text: Detritus tech can break down any matter into its base elements. Their factory-cities are devoted to waste removal and recycling.

195e646b42c48a06a2e102cca4c2acb8.text: Select a location in the yellow Drop Zone

b703e5f5c54eb1c42321b71f2a230f20.text: You may change your placements before confirming

7230281bcf6b50de36f6354fdf28229d.text: You still have units that can act. They will lose their turn.

27df34f7234936e34e35d03e0d43c591.text:
Go back in time to the start of your turn?

Power limitations means you can only do this once per battle.

87d62df299f9c30df2c9967837fc4640.text:
Go back in time to the start of your turn?

Your 'Temporal Reset' Pilot means you can do this twice this battle.

42ccda7cde67a92b38d8c7b9a20e50a1.text:
Go back in time to the start of your turn?

You only have one Reset remaining.

a34e1dc448ef3ba0396e0ab25cc17303.text:
No matching Mech class. 
 1 Power penalty applies.

909bc0b9e147e98ed87cbbeb7124fed9.text: Gain experience to unlock this skill.

47e697a8b054e1019a35d12a2bfa5542.text: Piloted Mech health is increased by 2.

ff8761f054ccf2536b2c244862e91ba8.text: Piloted Mech movement is increased by 1.

a71e3ea0d64d85b6367f1f6fbf13c948.text: Grid Defense increased by 3. This affects the chance of resisting Building Damage in combat.

76db4f76f41f42ab4fa3684454775236.text: Mechs can pilot themselves, but it's better to have a specialized Pilot.

a7f60211fe66f1c6f83e2d5a0f617082.text: Use the Virtual Simulator to test Mech Loadouts

e31f6de7f20569a62ab23e3f02aca8f1.text:
Costs one additional 
          power to use

8f67905f8a0624bfe5f78902575f9f06.text: No rewards for a failed mission.

faf55900ba27cf6012c42860b7228b22.text: Congratulations on your first successful mission, Commander! I'm confident in your ability to save the planet after such extensive training.

3e0913aff1b7ac46b7456c19516a7bbf.text: Donate weapons and pilots for       Reputation

9a55a7fb31333cb5f19be9728ca2c161.text: Your unspent Corporate Reputation will be lost if you leave now.

62daa3b47773659c18c039a1978db45f.text:
Are you sure you want to permanently assign this Pilot to the Island?
(Grants Reputation)

e0ce18cca6c55c9cb80a085ab7088e53.text:
Are you sure you want to donate this weapon?
(Grants Reputation)

8517208075299ce4d3b34034fbcab1c4.text: Are you sure you want to purchase this?

be55c75d32f3be960313b72dc2c79fd8.text:
Vek are overrunning two regions on the Island. 
The region you do not save will be lost forever.

a87ac75fbbf6e20128679f0f752c6fa6.text: The Emergency Medical Supplies were able to save $1 from the brink of death!

9be673a3c062b82d8a7651fe4d17f213.text: $1 has recovered from the brink of death! The effort required to regenerate has cost XP.

77aab093cbf5ef5bc33b3638987a6af7.text: $1 died after taking severe damage in the battle against the creatures.

2b562e3fb010fa7736e3cc6e73e63fab.text: You currently have a game in progress. Starting a new one will permanently erase it.

a8ef5141119bfde56c34255540077f7c.text: You will lose all game progress and unlocks. This cannot be undone.

c177be8ca84f6a46f8b2e3a09f7e235f.text:

Your Profile File appears to be corrupted. Please contact us at contact@subsetgames.com if you'd like us to attempt to recover the data.

9dedab33b2690cbf03ce183c30bfbfd6.text: WARNING: There is a file write error and your progress cannot be saved.

e0844901d849e11d38a073b3c5223a70.text: Medals awarded based on how many Corporate Islands are secured before completing the Final Island.

4c1479b2126a160cc8cafd40724c6199.text: Note: Achievements earn you Coins to unlock new Mech Squads!

615624fc402dfb915b3d2898e4eb68f9.text: Unlock the Squad "$1" to use this Mech

10d1fcb3e902a514312f89792714043e.text: Gain Coins by completing Achievements! Use Coins to unlock new Squads!

99d629f7b90bbb4763e2f0877f4caee1.text: The tank's attack also pushes its target.

df09dbe9a86b4ea88607489ed0b43c65.text: Throw needles at the enemy, pushing the furthest hit tile.

df5186a5873ca5d52ee24bc63ee60aaf.text: Underpowered compared to modern artillery, but still useful.

33ce64dd1e4acf873d181c9f64464938.text: Eradicate all life in front of the Terraformer.

fe2d0c28d7da6952bc6bde70c29ec6f1.text: Stronger projectile that causes target to burn.

eb86802cea3077262ab9944209019056.text: Piercing beam, damage reduced by range.

8a55f81685ce71ac854a45ade12a8d72.text: You accomplished every Archive mission, an astounding accomplishment! Please, you and the #squad accept this as thanks.

0c5dd262e2d54d83ff051c84a0760fc6.text: You completed every mission on R.S.T. despite the odds. You've earned my respect, #squad - and everything we can offer.

b56ab466212ccde44c75b63768d3042b.text: You have saved Pinnacle, accomplishing every objective without fail. Allow me to provide additional aid.

cc237255517abdf2e286de0ec50f0c3a.text: #squad, it my pleasure to inform you your success rate is 100%. Detritus corporate bylaws dictate you've earned a bonus.

5181be78dcb4af637c563d529e134655.text: Detritus has an aggressive bonus plan for excellence in performance, commander. You and your #squad deserve it.

c3e463a79106c675bc919524936d2a70.text: Due to your efforts, commander, our success to failure ratio has reversed since your arrival. Permit Detritus to share the fruits of that success with you.

aeddbabb69e49d44719bc736c0d5c37b.text: The bad news is the Vek are overrunning our island, putting refugees and historical artifacts at risk. The good news is we have Old Earth military artifacts that can help in the fight!

1b463763e0a996404d5f2669cbcedfb0.text: We're doing all we can to protect the refugees, but we need your help against the Vek. We'll assist with some of our Old Earth artifacts if we can.

6b4486bc40d1c6ca8d14fd271a3ef853.text: If you are from the future, you'll find our island is even further back in time than you expected. If not for the Vek, I'd have loved to give you a tour of the Old Earth relics.

ebc799885bb44d62d56b981c15558100.text: You've shown up in the nick of time! The Vek are overrunning our island archive. The Old Earth relics here still have some fight in them, they could help us.

4bcfdde156df48179c9e9fce29cca9ac.text: Civilizations of the past had a military strength vastly exceeding ours. Good thing we preserved some of their old war machines!

c10ce6530fd1ddc14e5a266750360ada.text: My advisors insist we're losing the fight. They also insist I trust you. And since those cowards rarely insist I do anything, I'm giving you a chance to prove yourselves.

333b24e7ea8eaea50665bce34bbb78eb.text: Don't think for a moment I'm falling for the 'time traveler' stories, but your Mechs - they are undeniably impressive.

f66070cfe207579e0f8991fa34db337c.text: You won't find me as gullible as my department heads. Whatever 'time traveler' nonsense you claim, it's your firepower we need.

261ef6a2b83c4d9208265f3fc5b6ea9c.text: We can postpone the discussion on where you got this advanced weaponry until after you use it.

4ec7de505602dce0ff8f2910490d6992.text: R.S.T. was divided on asking you for help; it was viewed as weakness. But the choice is stark: we either ally with you or lose the island.

b0e4ab101a3a91094f7606e40bf168bd.text: I hope you can respect both forms of life on this island, organic and mechanical.

8a84932456fa1d6874c4e580ef0e0e35.text: The humans employed at Pinnacle are just as important as the sentient machines. We must stop the Vek to save all life.

d68ee3cc736bf5f1a3e783eff307229a.text: On behalf of Pinnacle, I welcome you. The climate on our island isn't ideal for humans, but the low temperatures are vital for machine life to thrive.

19d379ca3b2a782d59a44bb2b03af1c5.text: I have heard of your triumphs against the Vek, commander. We hope you and the #squad can aid us in our fight as well.

8a7a8f3b1d4d22e65b16e9c657411d5b.text: Our accommodations are sparse, commander, but you and the #squad are welcome here. To quote our corporate motto, 'Detritus is at your disposal'.

e1ae3f632522e50480210bf2dd555e22.text: Our island was once one of hundreds of Detritus disposal sites. Then the Vek came. But with your arrival, Detritus has hope again.

e0c888f8fbdba4c6bcd9eae00e1b34f4.text: When the Vek came, Detritus took on what refugees we could. What we lack is your military expertise, commander.

5d5639525d4207f1b2d589e8d7bbb2e0.text: If *any* mission results in extreme structure damage (4+ buildings?), these comments will trigger instead of standard mission comments

de7fe485f4fbfd3d0372c6c5b4158417.text: Rising seas destroyed most of our world, but it seems it's the Vek that will end us. So many lives were lost during this mission - we can't let it happen again!

933ea8c53ee5a2c40abe1e9ac7d3c723.text: The structural damage sustained during that battle was costly. We've lost irreplaceable research and priceless artifacts.

7491d3d213c96ea3b410a64bf4388973.text: If every battle against the Vek results in that much damage, I don't think there'll be much left of Archive to help in the war.

429f97f017b19f47251d083571723674.text: I've seen the casualty reports from your mission. The losses... were considerable. But not unendurable.

b7fd2fa5cf0aac6780bfc2bb3c0019bf.text: My staff reports your attacks are hurting us more than the Vek - but keep hammering them, no matter what it takes.

1b4197be9cf4baccad55335049d48208.text: I fired my advisors after they objected to the collateral damage on this mission. War means people die - it's that or we lose the planet.

20d16c3430a4af458ed1db791ae739e7.text: Many died today - too many. But the ends justify the means when you see the end coming for you.

630014b5607da76e714a693ed6057671.text: The loss of life in the last battle - it is better than losing the planet. We must all make sacrifices.

1a6880ba125fbd3bc754769605ce5da9.text: My people understand their sacrifices are not in vain. We must keep the pressure on, or everyone will die.

d30cd2e8cb4b4ed56730c8a40576f129.text: Hundreds perished in that attack. Each a unique being the world will never see again.

d40295678de38475c392b81f4b89e398.text: We have lost much today, human and machine. We will see if Pinnacle can recover.

600f4dc6ee345a65004a641c14db287a.text: Other timelines may exist for you, but this is the only one we have. Please fight for us as we would fight for you.

72e2f57d100ee1c3d1bec756f82a54da.text: We cannot lose so many lives in a single battle, commander. Detritus is not the island, it is not the company - it is our people.

5f65592a4e591fe5deeeafb5a1d45462.text: Accidents happen - we at Detritus know this all too well - but is there some other approach that will yield better results?

184c7aaa6be823d9a700db15b43c25a4.text: Accidents happen, but it reminds us we must do better, especially when lives are at stake - and even more when lives are lost.

5c84bf29cedd4ba772a2c8ac380f9acc.text: I've seen the casualty reports and am contacting the surviving families personally.

a0973fdf0cbd52d50d347ebf34956477.text: I know you have done much, but I ask you to not let the lives of our people be the cost of defeating the Vek.

646b1f4513e962a10c63432c417c86a4.text: Detritus is nothing without its people, commander. I urge you and the #squad to put our citizens first.

ec385cc156d205ab93eed740703be1cc.text: The damage to the region was... extensive. While I've been told my... sentiments could cost us the war, I beg of you - consider our people.

b8c11bbef64dcb436fd46a231d3a27e6.text: Technology from the future protecting technology from the past! Has a poetic ring to it, doesn't it? Let's hope the future is up to the task.

5bc9c21e901fa8323a6febc30dc2f4ad.text: Much of Old Earth and its history was lost when the oceans rose. We must protect what little is left. If the Vek destroy us, these artifacts may be all that remains of our civilization.

934f322cbd24b0298c83dc58f25eaaa0.text: Refugees living in preserved 21st century cities was not what the Archive founders intended, but we need to shelter everyone as best we can.

1f46393f5deab78fc6e812b7211dc793.text: There are Technology Vaults buried under this region, we've got to drive the Vek out before they can damage them!

a4cb386ce7f1155abcbbb15f9dcd70b2.text: With most of Old Earth under water, we've got to defend what little remains. Archive has protected these buildings for decades, but we're counting on you now.

bca68760498313c1fc6b701fd362eef7.text: Our island suffered greatly when we turned our terraforming tech against the Vek. Still, we must defend what's left.

48c9f07d7dac336a455146a0877ef87c.text: The civilians in those buildings are tough, but not invincible. Make sure they survive this fight.

32827c542ff1ce446f601c90ffb8a0a6.text: Grind the Vek into the dirt they're breeding in. If your story of the future is true, they must be stopped here and now.

0546061fdfb4d7769e1d8d5e2f3ef2d2.text: I'm simultaneously monitoring 84 subterranean micro-incursions by the Vek. You will have to manage this one on your own.

96a2fcae009d30f70bcd6975f87c31a5.text: Three out of five subroutines are giving you a low chance of success on this mission. Please be careful.

c83ce008351d14e394f3faed819da1e4.text: With the island melting and sentient life driven mad, you and your Mechs are their only chance.

931a9c9f96d381545581f80417916cfb.text: Our residential buildings are full of both forms of sentient life. The survival of two species is depending on you.

c41b13d449fd0672244bf6e5d47ab26d.text: You must press on, commander. Detritus will do all we can to assist you here.

92c27d1e75f31e4e7dedf538c14d7c9d.text: Do as you must, commander - the Vek must be driven back and our people protected.

2fd595355f2a2c0b2e096f0dadc4da19.text: Know that you and the #squad are our wall against the Vek, commander. We put our faith in you

1ea593174ef54a135d44e345fd76f748.text: I have faith in you and the #squad, commander. Know that all of Detritus stands with you.

fa3eac1fc3c721eff9d00800828761e0.text: There's a lot of unused space in this region's nature preserves. We'll begin moving refugees here now the Vek are gone.

7a3b948cffdcb1f19ce1ca38f7c23805.text: Vek are not easily defeated, yet you put them down with flying colors. My compliments to the pilots.

e5845ef4ab3fc285a8a6b1dc82759f17.text: The troops of Old Earth would have been proud! If only they had been here to see it...

a498831551917ec59b262eb90d78deb8.text: With this region secured, we can open our Technology Vaults. Let's see what other Old Earth tech we can use against the Vek!

244b6d2307b824878b1bc52267d8b011.text: That's the spirit we need if we're going to win this fight. Good work, both you and your... '#squad'.

88b7943827484b410084768fa503800e.text: Excellent, you've gained ground - we'll hold it now, you and your squad keep advancing.

95ff08d67a7512a15b6247e38a74c58c.text: Never thought we'd dig the Vek out - wherever you're from, I hope there's more of you on the way.

d83ad6384ba6417f1179f8489984e7d6.text: I read the casualty reports, and it's my pleasure to report the Vek are in the top percentile.

0c75279dd4c389d5926a9c85f79616fa.text: Region is secure. Deploying troops to hold the area before the weather shifts.

a6f5b14beecf0573f14d04c834a9bc9b.text: You and the #squad have driven back the Vek. We are updating our chances of success based on this battle.

363b0ecce03a268c5ec44f1f0e3df6ac.text: Additional victories of this kind will increase our chances of survival considerably.

f1b78cd29c50567e7bf7704105db7be3.text: Excellent news: My prognosticator sub-process has dramatically increased the odds of our survival based on your victory.

88b4c5501c7a5f552a11e9dc723d3e26.text: Well done, #squad! Good news is rare these days, but your efforts here have changed that.

2c15a36a67f30247ab48778acce13e3f.text: You've driven them back, commander! This has bought us more time to bolster Detritus' defenses.

fdb9dd6fa9ca9b628d42a1cc0c611a56.text: I know my thanks is a poor reward, but all of Detritus is grateful for what you and the #squad have done here today.

aa3a934716162008cd7ec9e80c27dfa6.text: My faith in you was not misplaced, commander. You have Detritus' gratitude.

a2a1712a128d59f00db1157ce9ed83cc.text: With the success of the #squad on the field, I've been able to focus efforts on the factories and the Vek elsewhere on Detritus!

3197d018ae5d8ed3e7f27a9e503e97d9.text: Well now, hmmm... that could have gone better for everyone involved. Let's hope the next battle is more successful.

0cee410b2b9ace51f77eacb4a8396e0b.text: Without your help, humanity will join Old Earth and be a thing of the past. But we can't let this mission be the norm, we have to do better!

17511e0266789a81617a94ef933432b7.text: I don't care about your best - don't let the enemy gain any more ground. I shouldn't need to tell you this!

15e575e31b50bcffdf8772420d36cd94.text: We don't have anywhere to retreat. If you think we can run, you're wrong. This is all we have.

404f21d06c9bd3581b52c38df1cd3e8c.text: Your best isn't good enough. We need better.

75cd50623949ac01e803af2d65ab8a90.text: If you can't use your weapons to win this fight, then surrender them to someone who can.

1e02e489e4de535d6d617756c910e4b7.text: At least you were able to save some sentient life in the region, though you failed to accomplish anything else.

d5dd3f8f9340e628ba68586e525a847b.text: Our objectives were not met. Recalculating our chances of mounting a successful defense.

190d0cd1f2784bd14d0992c31fa86a83.text: I am grateful for your efforts, commander... even if the results were not what we hoped.

11d75438acc00b99350699f1790baf1f.text: Today has been a victory for the Vek. I fear if we lose any more ground, Detritus and our people may be lost.

dfe3be75f4745b4eeee410838d776f76.text: Not currently used, but we'll need it

99b658e7703f989141a693b92e46355a.text: My condolences for the loss of your pilots... they fought bravely and well. They will be remembered.

1bae0c42ee3fe41035c7b2b4a201ad7a.text: Know that all Archive Corporation mourns the loss of your pilots. We know you are putting yourselves in harm's way for us.

542c01129015bb83a596d42f82c9f6b5.text: The war won't be determined by this battle - but a few more like this, and it might be. We can't afford any more losses.

5ffd0115b42ad52b75624067ecc60a9d.text: One lost battle doesn't lose the war - but we can't continue to lose ground. You need to focus.

ca702f7640fa214d5dcb64387538e7ca.text: Your pilots are the heart of your war machine. Without them you don't stand a chance.

defd3c778e98c2259f91bcca4a2acdd4.text: I have asked that the names of your fallen pilots be added to our Memorial Wall. Their sacrifice will not be forgotten.

61da2fcb72c9418e1b33da0986369f3b.text: The Mechs of the #squad are powerful, but I worry few are left to pilot them - now, even fewer than before.

90c43552958160cf2963acdfa1220abd.text: Some missions use generic objectives, so the CEO can pull from these lists to address those objectives

b4864f1e562b368b5ac876643d7f9b55.text: Our equipment and resources to repair your Mechs are limited - please keep damage to a minimum if you can.

299c9445117a9dd0dc4a9445447742cc.text: We can barely keep our cities functioning, let alone repair your Mechs if they are damaged. Choose your shots carefully.

487cf87c74fc42c39a59b493d4df36ea.text: This isn't Pinnacle - we don't have enough engineering crews to fix your Mechs if they take heavy damage.

499d62e3c3ab658da312f161de9a323d.text: There will be little time between skirmishes and we need you fully operational. Exercise caution.

0e843fa3a9305d82023b77e5757f0d65.text: Our robotic repair teams are offline. It will be difficult to assist with Mech repair before the next combat operation. Please keep that in mind.

c7b749a8dd393eb7282e06502c433651.text: Unfortunately, most of our engineering division is occupied. If the Mechs of the #squad take too much damage, we may not be able to repair them.

888b6a03dae57e237394f3c3e4c73d44.text: We have no personnel to repair your Mechs if damaged. It is unfortunate, but please, do what you can to keep them out of harm's way.

4e5fe263ffc31e5d80967f1c1fbebbe9.text: Your Mechs look almost untouched! That's a relief... it'll allow us to assign our repair crews to reinforce the refugee shelters instead.

fd8377f8f54a48b51f1076d0bd8867e3.text: Your Mechs are barely scratched! That'll allow us to assign our repair crews to emergencies in other regions.

2e52f7066cba59a9d41d9b33f89a198e.text: I see you and the #squad weathered the worst of it and survived. Excellent.

39c032fdcd301125120f403aa0b5ddfe.text: The repair teams report barely a scratch on your Mechs - efficiently done. We can re-allocate the damage control teams to civilian relief and city protection.

923313252c03fefe04005aa41ff744b6.text: Your Mechs took almost no damage. That means we can allocate additional resources and repair crews to help refugee centers elsewhere on R.S.T.

dd0b39ec8511a839abf744c0a3eb9ced.text: Your ability to defeat the Vek with minimal damage to the Mechs is admirable. If only all humans showed such concern for their machine counterparts.

a3e95fc4f8904bcc32b7993b5ea45159.text: Success - and only minor damage to your Mechs, commander, well within the projections of what Detritus can repair.

d2c3d85783e29610f16e98ec074bd469.text: Your Mechs have taken only minor damage, my engineers are certain they can get the #squad back into the field quickly.

83e7c76f81bcdfd268e73de5d5d960aa.text: I'm told we'll need to divert three teams of engineers to repair your Mechs. The engineering teams have more than enough on their plates already...

0a43bf2df3418d0635a1be0e1a7431d8.text: Your Mechs are heavily damaged; several teams of engineers have been reassigned to repairing them as we speak, even the teams devoted to civilian defense.

3eb2acf15c6c53ab5f27a055812a72ef.text: The damage to your Mechs is extensive - we'll have to call in repair crews from the city centers if we're going to stay in the fight. And we must stay in the fight.

4174ffccdad0b989329aea75c7bac9c0.text: Your Mechs are so torn up they're ready for the scrapyard. It'll take our repair crews working double shifts to get them back in fighting shape!

58c9e1ddfb9a8ca3dbc75ee5dc56d105.text: We've had to call back engineers from the refugee centers to fix the damage to your '#squad'. Don't let this happen again.

3ce41ea06a8daec2ed1c120bdeec8910.text: Do not allow your Mech's reinforced hull lead to complacency. Repairing its exoskeleton is a material-heavy process with considerable cost.

82ba0520b7cb1598d609f3060760ca07.text: It seems you are quick to risk your Mechs and their pilots. Both are needed in the war ahead. Please be more careful.

e184caf0469556637bfcd79efa14b204.text: I've had no choice but to assign all emergency engineering divisions to repair your Mechs. This will compromise Detritus' defense efforts severely.

d1ab9c219f5374d20c7f54d6cd595be1.text: Our repair teams report - ah, I quote... 'there's more shredded metal than Mech' and conclude with an... unoptimistic... report of the chances of repair.

34eaa348f6fd11c89a26fcab9f434a1f.text: Our pilots report the #squad are so damaged they barely fit into the docking bays. We'll need to assign additional personnel for repairs.

badf3a0928c7aea3fc4041126d1c229e.text: This island's ancient power stations can barely meet your Mech's needs. Please try to prevent any damage to the Grid!

d51cf6476589e4758eca6ef2e001d219.text: The Grid here can barely power your Mechs. Fight efficiently, or you'll be in the red faster than you think.

27fc6efd7df4ba983b21199ac451a526.text: Our reactor cores are frozen like everything else. We can't spare additional power. Make the Grid a priority.

b988f712ee4679a909d4c5f507c049c7.text: My power output in this region is... <Connection Lost> ... <Grid Power Low>

46390ef172873a1bfffaf0618f1a7bfc.text: The Grid here can only provide limited power. If it suffers any damage, you and the #squad may not have enough power to fight.

0f3c99fb83a8eb4d7f4367d4780dc279.text: The Grid here was never intended to power something like your Mechs. We've made it work, but barely - minimize damage to the Grid if you can.

468597a1ccb4696e93183c61c50e589a.text: Looks like the Grid held - thanks to you fighting smart. We need all the power we can spare for the war ahead.

0ec85153566a3b6d3c1f25c75178de59.text: Everything is operating at peak efficiency. I thank you.

a0d64e9ac871f17200f1018ca21d5079.text: The Grid held, commander. The sector still has power. Detritus thanks you and the #squad.

fb82e117443c39fdf59b503fb4c76f2e.text: The Grid's power supply was uninterrupted. You fought conservatively and efficiently, commendable.

8a7ec087f181c12061aaffab150de16a.text: The Vek are gone, but the casualty reports are still coming in. And we haven't even started assessing damage to the island's infrastructure.

da28161bf5610ae6df50fb0c42af5fcd.text: The Vek have caused massive damage in the region despite your efforts. We may need to re-examine our tactics.

8a87fe2783e21a728a0bff62ad153ad6.text: Many lives were lost today... if this continues, there'll be no more of my people to protect.

f566ed6ef9473f53053c3d61cfb5f05f.text: The Grid took massive damage, and the casualties... unacceptable. I need you to protect my people, not let them be slaughtered!

ffdb4d213196ad7e62d3bf976d605497.text: Did you come from the future to ruin us? The Grid is damaged, we have no idea if we can repair it - and the casualty reports? They're still coming in.

8a8345376ac0c677bf778d82ac489981.text: With that much damage to the Power Grid, more of my mechanical brethren must shut down. Others are permanently damaged and cannot be reactivated.

5b00206d02e9dd2e169f71ae67780efd.text: The Grid suffered too much damage in the fighting, commander. Detritus will have to reassess our chances of survival in the region.

97f8b095b73cc3fae6b2c54e0f675fbd.text: The Grid collapsed. We'll have to reroute power from already struggling sectors of Detritus to keep the island intact.

ed19dc1eb3881eb259724d844bb6e3ec.text: I know you did your best with what little the Grid could provide, commander. It was a slim chance, but we had to take it.

d7d600690cd67ab3fe86db9206135420.text: The Vek retreat when the battle goes against them, then regroup and attack again somewhere else. Wipe them out for good this time!

d25eb07abcda082c509ccbf6b173715d.text: Don't let a single Vek survive - if they do, they'll only create another hive and hit us again. Kill them all.

beabed4720a6eb4ab13e77d20be23f12.text: Exterminate every Vek - if you don't, we'll be fighting this same battle again in a few days. Don't let a single one escape.

6366547c70411d0f100ddab8a81e5a94.text: Keep firing until every Vek is dead - then shoot them again. Do not allow even one to escape, or they'll swarm us again in days.

0bc91cf98018dd08b8dc59343afdcb26.text: All life has value. But I will make an exception for the Vek. They must all be wiped out.

e4d0f5e61b51dfc2e55c39a31ed287a6.text: These Vek were to blame for the loss of ten million machine lives on a nearby server farm. Stop them before more lives are lost.

2390278b3a336ccfe16da62de5b086bb.text: My creator did not teach me to seek 'vengeance', but she did not have to watch the horror of the Vek.

c6ecbea5d92fded7783a5d528c39c8b8.text: These Vek destroyed three gestating A.I. routines in one of our Sentient Vaults. They must be prevented from murdering any more of my children.

f8dff6e44f63442e7e7a13b53c2d3045.text: The Vek presence must be reduced to 0% or they will regroup and attack again.

24031ea1a0d17d9b3658863077cc6e43.text: According to our projections, we must exterminate all the Vek in this sector - none can remain alive, and none must escape.

eb4b283685cea4880664e1ef4b6e1d46.text: Those Vek won't be causing us any more trouble! Well done, all!

4620d8246ab78a08e0ade00430cb4f41.text: The attacking Vek have been wiped out! Good show, #squad!

a49ded1735196c3dcc9abafe88ec47e2.text: One less Vek swarm to worry about. I've read the battle reports - I'm impressed. You and the #squad were very thorough in the extermination.

c17f78f7c3e6c4934ef873cbef495b47.text: Your thoroughness in battlefield sanitation is appreciated. Sweeper teams report no Vek survived.

60652bb6c8673b3d61cdc5bacc30acee.text: First, we burn the Vek on the surface, then we'll dig below and exterminate them like you did here.

f85a26e87813b7193c8d4b29eee16e48.text: My subterranean sensors are reporting no life signs. The Vek are all dead. You have made the sector safe again.

b3e33cd94c5464d51fe8fdd977277bdb.text: Reports put the Vek presence in your sector at 0%, and mission success 100%. You and the #squad have our thanks.

42b7ac696d4afac6495c51858d6a1e00.text: The Vek are no more, and another sector has been reclaimed. We thank you, commander - you and the #squad.

70a6935996907d7c80e3d8a82af649ae.text: Your intervention was 100% successful, commander. Sensors register no Vek activity in the sector.

dda373800c3e91d1e90653abef15a555.text: You let some of the Vek scurry back to their underground hives. Unfortunately, they'll emerge again soon and attack another region.

43f7f4c4923bbd43026e0dfcfcbf50a5.text: One day we'll find out where those Vek run off to and take the fight to them! Old Earth would not have taken this sitting down!

520282a22b46655d3b516f1fe11fa7cc.text: You let some Vek escape? Unacceptable - you haven't won, you've merely delayed the fight.

2d53e76eefae63ff7e731a697e601985.text: If you can't contain an area and cleanse it of the Vek, I'll find someone who can.

1240aba1ec8a64464b8874d2b860af13.text: Sweeper teams already report the surviving Vek have burrowed too deep to hit - likely making another hive.

5636ae8071a8941a5aab4827e97d20d7.text: I needed a thorough Vek cleansing, not a half-assed attempt.

06264cc1aa1cbce95ae5d9412eca390c.text: I thought I was clear - all the Vek have to die. Every. Single. One.

d55b5d6bc863a4756b4ee25a160e2343.text: Your failure here has put other regions of the island in danger. I must reallocate resources to protect them.

68423f718a67500c19d06f911868f6c4.text: Sensors report Vek escaped, and they are breeding even now. I know you did your best, commander, but this was not a victory.

33b6bed59c14cf6da1358660c18af80a.text: You drove the Vek away, but enough survived to restore their numbers in the next breeding cycle - then we will have to fight them all over again.

591d227136cb2c16b73630e65faf5336.text: Vek from emerging in the first place. As it's not blocking *all* Vek, and even Vek you do block might emerge, it's hard to give a proper excuse for why this is a good thing!

3fd245c4642668d0ada1c54e6cc7b8c8.text: This region still has pristine ancient roads and topiary design! Do not let the Vek surface, they'll wreak havoc on it!

e6db1c3d983092e41ca852af32fced2a.text: This region is some of the last arable land on R.S.T. Do not let the Vek destroy it.

8b15cd4d38a0757f14f658344b3587f1.text: There are micro-bots covering the surface of this region. If the Vek break the surface, it could cost millions of lives.

ecf958dabbf698f9c1cc69b96e5c9a29.text: A fragile ecosystem of new machine life is evolving on the silicate plains here. If too many Vek break through, the ecosystem will be devastated.

9798c95cdcd0cd600736e03e72143bed.text: A.C.I.D. can destroy hives beneath this sector - but we need you to keep Vek from surfacing so the A.C.I.D. has time to do its work.

7aeaa1cf7a5f84124d588ed5420da40b.text: We've tried to drill down into the Vek hives in this region, but they're surfacing to escape. Keep as many trapped below ground as possible.

701afc1da9b7aaf88f78defbe7eb7cab.text: With the Vek trapped underground, our Old Earth relics on the surface are safe, and the people as well. Thank you, #squad.

22ab1bf679dc7bbe00d35e3fc941e904.text: The way you prevented the Vek from surfacing was impressive. And I am not easily impressed. You and the #squad have my respect.

f95d1ab4de6edc492a0381356b727a87.text: Thank you for minimizing impact on the surface. I'm still getting positive pings from the majority of micro-bots in the region.

839e95a5803dc5bcb25858723d776f25.text: The #squad were successful, commander! You kept the Vek pinned and under control - the sector is ours!

8be575a9a74dea1057e15692ec4928d5.text: The sector is now ours to occupy safely, commander. The Vek below ground are no more.

e155a2995c597e3fe5bb82ad6fca86a7.text: Our nature preserves on the surface were destroyed during the fighting - there's little left of the region. At least the Vek are gone now.

fd312b93d667ed8fc9147b123b25a806.text: Vek reaching the surface means crops were destroyed. My people will die - not from the Vek, but from starvation.

6f2bf619a4f6a5c49e140da5239ffacd.text: Every millisecond another life is being snuffed out by the chaos from your battle on the surface. Redirecting my output so you have to watch it too...

835b935efa2fdaa5d602a359d500bafe.text: Detritus' attempts to destroy the Vek underground failed - too many were allowed to escape. We will have to redouble our efforts.

e0b5db590524e2910c85f246f7b4babc.text: Ol' 'Horace' here is the only diesel train left on the planet - that isn't at the bottom of the ocean, anyway. He's still going strong, carrying vital supplies across the island.

8aa5ac04ab7fce27d2a812415afccc86.text: I was overseeing maintenance on this Old Earth locomotive myself. Good thing, too - when the Vek struck, ol' Horace became the backbone of our supply lines!

80ab8b537e4a77a87d019d563ec990ff.text: Diesel trains may be old-fashioned by today's standards, but ol' 'Horace' here is going strong - he's vital to our supply lines!

2b3de972685a1ef5a2011903bc8e7111.text: This maglev track is one of our last remaining supply lines. My people rely on it for supplies - without it...

cf66b9e3d0258d4f3d0a5af47650d951.text: This maglev line is a major artery between our remaining cities. We lose it, we lose the cities as well.

132d13c8d1366e867bf77c05122d4794.text: The maglev runs on solar power - we need to get it out of the approaching stormfront before its cells die.

f74833717f2000a921bdb6a0ea1e49d8.text: Make sure the supply train reaches the extraction point - we can take it from there.

4484e7d48e727040ecdce127cc950b8c.text: This maglev is one of the few we have left. It needs to get through, or my people will be cut off.

2c49ab105e5d2e2b51e6d417c5a7cc7d.text: Detritus waste disposal relies on trains to ferry hazardous byproducts to our disposal sites... but not if the Vek intercept the trains.

d21030e489f564e6f68e7940acbb74d1.text: Our trains seem to provoke the Vek - whether it's the chemicals or the vibration, we don't know, but the Vek attack them on sight.

3914efc9b7c6bd297f58dff6fefdb243.text: A waste disposal train is passing through this sector. The vibrations attract the Vek, so we need to protect it from attack.

1d19ba2542c451b00fd95c81c5742b7d.text: The refugees will be grateful for the supplies. And I owe you my personal thanks for saving ol' 'Horace' - we two relics have been through a lot together.

cf78995a7d11bd965b2531ac1f5c3600.text: Ol' Horace made it to his destination without a scratch on him! With most of our past under the sea, it's a great day when we can protect our history from the Vek!

89c9e75f2e9d752782f741a4af5a8d06.text: The supplies made it through and are on the way to my people in the cities. Thank you.

a63339122f78c2b586b07f978a550f62.text: Excellent, the train made it through. We live to fight another day.

367715fa86e26512c11ff03ce2713b73.text: The train has reported in; it has reached its destination without further incident. Well done, commander.

2845244e030ec9bdde63c1e7a25b7be5.text: I've received confirmation, commander - the train is safely en route, and no further Vek have been detected in its path.

de6ce9d0fa1e46fb6e152a2974bb1794.text: Another irreplaceable artifact lost to the Vek. Maybe R.S.T. will sell us one of their maglevs.

33b62f2f1e94d75062bdc77ffd01a0f2.text: That was the last diesel train that doesn't lie at the bottom of an ocean. Unfortunate. We'll need a new way to transport supplies now.

0bbc1d6e082281e2ccb263913ca2fafc.text: That was one of the last maglevs we had. I'll report the loss to the destination city and see what I can do for the relief efforts there.

ac059a95dbc36bbe498bd08480676ebc.text: Every maglev we lose, we lose two cities. Protecting my people means protecting the supply lines.

edef4e3b73aa56fcea985f9fed00465b.text: The train is destroyed - and the byproducts it was carrying have contaminated the sector. It's uninhabitable to all but the Vek.

89f1306fcf977b7434004e94dd25f996.text: There's nothing left of the train. Or its crew. Detritus honors their bravery, and mourns their loss.

843e6d41cd235dd101d110911e434c7d.text: If the train is damaged once, it will stop, but the player can still defend it to earn half the rewards...

e4161909f9a84656e1003301a4398baa.text: It'll take weeks to fix that train, but at least it's not a total loss. For now, we'll have to find an alternate way to ship supplies.

575ff2ca6c6a382014f174f80827e3d9.text: These Old Earth trains were built to last! Despite the knocking it took, we can still get it back up and running - remarkable!

1c57a2a2602a6c98e1bd19ab5f36960d.text: It'll take more than the Vek to stop ol' 'Horace'. We'll have him back on his feet in no time!

e5784cc1fdc602e314d31e38deeb9da1.text: Why was the train's path interrupted? It could have been destroyed... my engineers say it's recoverable, but we can't afford to have it idle for repairs.

a44d405f3c1a6a006171e4c9083223fb.text: We're dispatching teams to the train now - their priority is to get it running.

f8f6fa4d57a9d07b2eed1c8c73831be0.text: The train was damaged, but the #squad saved the crew. You have our gratitude, commander.

9fd43abb9cc55bfa2c51d008842ee4ba.text: The train was damaged, but not beyond repair - thanks to you, our engineers can get it up and running again.

1e15473b71caded0dccb1e019bdf7913.text: This mission involves a special monster that explodes when killed. The primary objective is to not kill it, letting it run away.

da25fcf75f6876979380d31aba7e6380.text: These 'volatile' Vek don't have the courtesy to simply die - they explode and damage entire regions. Drive it away, but whatever you do, don't kill it!

e049a51422b094776a044a4ebdaf1068.text: These 'volatile' Vek detonate on death! Drive it away and for safety's sake, don't let it explode!

cdad4198d4ce3080afffe0bb8d73f76f.text: Normally I wouldn't ask you to hold your fire - but one of the Vek is a Volatile, it'll explode if you kill it. Drive it off instead.

84fb86e48ec00acd5102d8c413e5461b.text: A Volatile Vek has been spotted. When they die, they explode and kick up a mile of dust that scrambles our sensors for days - don't kill it, drive it away instead.

397ee6c75b3ce38fd2a967ed4e78b481.text: These Vek are nasty ones. Volatile Vek don't die quietly, they detonate... and take entire districts with them. Do not kill it - make it run.

9956fa580d852e6ee792eaf3b9df255c.text: These Volatile Vek are living bombs. Don't kill it, drive it away before it turns the region into a crater.

04e293d064ca5fd236801fba4cf9d0e7.text: My Vek Analysis Process has triggered an alert. One of the Vek in this region will detonate on death. You must drive it away without killing it.

649dba497c01a1c8c7601ccc771ccfd8.text: We have detected a Volatile Vek in this sector, and it is imperative it not... detonate, or it may cause a chain reaction.

08ca920e6788c71ad315ccc87f0846ae.text: Intercept the Vek in this sector, but do not harm the Volatile Vek - drive it away without killing it or the damage will be catastrophic.

ebf2c2b3ba7db06bd709b3dc4fd3a31f.text: We've identified a Volatile Vek in this sector, commander - 'encourage' it to retreat - without killing it.

2a4e4445636a6cdbe523f30a2203e4fe.text: I'm sure that explosive Vek will be back, but at least nothing was damaged. Hmm. We should double the blast proofing on the Vaults before it returns...

86a96dbf75b1ede76a70eb60b9d95cc8.text: If we had the resources, we could capture that volatile monstrosity and study it. At least it's gone now, that's a relief!

8a8d0b67003747dbe7afd4a78656f320.text: Excellent. We should be able to track that Volatile and terrabomb it when it hits an abandoned region.

0b252d4667fba01f6839d0991be336e5.text: One of these days we'll capture that Volatile and figure out how to turn every Vek into one... then set them off in their own hives.

3939984adcc087ad5f1a837fd5a29e67.text: I'm creating a new subroutine to monitor where that Vek goes. I hope it stays far away.

826d285158acb9419df25e41e4b4cbd9.text: We're tracking the Volatile now - it should pose no further threat to us. We commend your efforts, commander, efficiently done.

6bec4b2bebceea149e9bff0ca91f1468.text: The Volatile is retreating to its hive. This is good news - we should be able to track it and detonate it when it reaches the nest.

52b14b83b73d47f2bce88b9d1def200c.text: There was a nature reserve within that Vek's blast radius. One of the last remaining ferret species is likely extinct now.

935a096a3340636a86b19fb6d3add634.text: One of our secure underground Technology Vaults was cracked open when that Vek exploded. I can only hope nothing inside was damaged!

cc7fef57e800ff7def09cc2d2b98a52c.text: We heard the blast all the way here at the R.S.T. Corporate Tower. I take it you weren't successful.

c4fee315d4fc7abaab2f6277b0855a40.text: We picked up the blast on sensors... the region's useless to us now.

c9ffb006bd64a4fc6a2e523e49de3cf4.text: The Volatile damaged one our substructures... we're going to have engineering crews working double-time to brace up the island.

0efe20e501e31045cbf03e735868b9f1.text: Our sensors detected the explosion. There's nothing more to be done now, we've evacuated what survivors we could.

9f9d0dcbdd64e9bc892d1e218c30cab6.text: The Vek detonation disrupted Detritus operations in the sector - we'll have to pull back and reevaluate our attack plan.

feee3e0cde40dbbc8f431b8fdf9406f1.text: Some sort of... gelatinous mass is approaching our headquarters! We've never seen anything like it - you have to stop it!

1a987f4582f1bae32d17c9c732769314.text: Sensors have picked up an unknown Vek... some sort of massive gelatinous creature. Whatever it is, don't let it reach the tower!

316e0ff6ae4a63b4e90e65a8a0f07e25.text: Our scientists believe that oozing Vek retained enough of its bio-mass to remain a threat to the region. Unfortunate.

5063a112dbc3e892b1ebdd9bf154caa5.text: You failed the mission. The creature still retains enough mass to reform and attack again.

847c49cdcb90895b5a3dc60fbb5636d9.text: Ha! That should drive the Vek off our Archive Island for good! Thank you for your efforts in preserving our past, #squad.

8b4b8c9aff2fc93265b75fc81d8821e2.text: I don't know how you managed it, but the creature was destroyed - it no longer poses a threat. I thank you - and the #squad.

ec8cf5a172cafe5e29ec47ce24108a84.text: One of the Vek abominations, some sort of spider-like monstrosity, is approaching our headquarters. It and its spawn must be stopped!

ebbe802f1a7f9b2533a16c9f4defcd1a.text: A Vek abomination has been sighted - it's spawning a horde of Vek spiders and attacking R.S.T. tower. We need your Mechs now.

97ef4a7bb403bc1f3707bf6dee361077.text: Alas, with the Vek abomination still alive, the Vek remain a serious threat to the region. I can only hope you find more success on the other islands.

dc17299d1a4aecffb360400f76ce40cc.text: If you really are the last hope for humanity, we don't stand a chance. That Vek spider will attack again, and I expect you won't be around to 'help' next time.

54c39c47810e85f19191c186952ca1f5.text: With that Vek abomination destroyed, no new hives should appear on our island. Thank you, #squad, you've saved us!

f5d323383423687362672a3f48ccd786.text: I must admit that was an impressive performance. We will rest easier knowing that Vek abomination and its spawn are gone.

2130a1e410f454fd42310cb083f46116.text: One of our machines has somehow taken control of a Vek hive and is assaulting Pinnacle Tower! It must be stopped.

63037c72988d45bbbde15e64204550d0.text: I will find a way to remotely shut down that machine. It's too dangerous to be allowed to persist.

d6a55600b05bad4efcacc5fd809c2985.text: My data servers in Pinnacle Tower have taken severe damage. I must see to the repairs.

9b8be802368c50dad6b3da3bd3fecdb2.text: If only we knew how the machine controlled the Vek like that, it could win us this war.

f0e647ca51b802aa767397ea4a376c9c.text: Some kind of Vek abomination is approaching our headquarters! Whatever it is, it must be stopped!

501fb02fc0d9083081207c95022d5f53.text: A Vek monstrosity is assaulting our tower. We have to rely on you this final time to help us.

f3ddad3fe7ae88dc8143d7bf24081d85.text: Pinnacle Tower is under attack. My analysis processor is unable to identify the species of Vek threatening us. Caution is advised.

28b2993b7a59f30cf98d6ae66586065a.text: Our sensors have picked up a Vek we've never encountered before... I fear it won't go down easy.

52a51253f5ff7c5bc75e0b53d5c51556.text: We've detected an unknown Vek approaching the Detritus hub. We're gathering what intel we can, commander, but we need the #squad.

40a903d1c5da38f991afe5d4d2842bf8.text: With the abomination still alive, the Vek remain a serious threat to the region. I hope you find more success on the other islands.

a42270a3775d9a9a0333da944ea0e6f1.text: If you really are the last hope for humanity, we don't stand a chance. That Vek monstrosity will attack again, and I expect you won't be around to 'help' next time.

f996b4fd479c9c013803fc98510aaed4.text: I will assign a drone force to tail and scan that new Vek. We must obtain more data to properly combat it.

ffa52b9881f27525a30a41fed0c58a33.text: That monstrous Vek survived - and it'll likely strike again. If the #squad can't stop it, I fear our forces will have no chance at all.

19f14038ae209002cc68f1f8cf6610e9.text: You survived, but alas, our corporate tower did not... we've lost so many lives to those creatures!

754fbcb56d58a56afc0edfe1b02c3b95.text: You let our corporate command center be destroyed by those creatures. We were counting on you... I was counting on you.

f5863e6530ac690d339978c49bb4328a.text: Our corporate hub has been lost. We're evacuating what survivors we can, but over 30% of Detritus' own were manning the HQ when it fell.

b7fa8b11a41b5cc5c96170c61a6e5af0.text: With the Vek abomination destroyed, no new hives should appear on our island. You've saved us!

f23594c7d7f01875c74b9b58ef375f84.text: I must admit that was an impressive performance. We will rest easier knowing that Vek monstrosity no longer infests our island.

89e18baaeafad439687298ba960fd57e.text: Thousands of lives were saved today. I am thankful for the time you have sacrificed to aid us.

bc930bb5da95b3bb89b505f401b1b6fb.text: The Vek abomination is down, and our corporate hub is intact. You and the #squad have Detritus' gratitude.

3174584d3c30ee2867d4cc0e8215b3f9.text: This region has an old airfield that can provide air support. We're new at actually flying these planes, but let's hope for the best!

874a18e9d338a25ca55048990ba4d435.text: We recently got a few Old Earth jets in the air. My people aren't the most skilled pilots yet, but they're getting the hang of it!

b7420e18458a41861015777631d5fa0c.text: It did my heart proud to see those planes soaring across the sky. We really showed those Vek what Old Earth tech can do!

e6396bcb0481df592539e2cbab6f1dd3.text: This region is now wiped clean of Vek! And, uh, I do hope our pilots missed your Mechs during their strafing runs.

039c450a63d1cbbd3385a1eb98db57bf.text: We've got engineers working on two Old Earth tanks in this region. They should be up and running shortly after you arrive.

a5d63fda13b02f48fd36425b1797c015.text: The Vek have been put down - and Old Earth technology is up and kicking! Couldn't have hoped for better!

d203e86c77e355d3f0d640b054833484.text: Both tanks were destroyed? But... they were the only other defense we had in the region, we're vulnerable without them.

51affb8516c405335c460193f6c16cc5.text: It's a shame one of the tanks was destroyed, but at least we still have one left for our Planetary Conflict exhibit.

efad920ecdeff2b03c1ce6cdcbe528f4.text: It's a shame to see one of our tanks destroyed, but at least he went down fighting!

b864bf6d7e7dbf9272d1fc4cced219de.text: These satellites were the centerpiece of our Race to Space exhibit, but they'll prove more useful providing telemetry for our defenses.

2bd7bf89dd2aeb22fabdd4129a997683.text: These satellites were recovered from orbit a long time ago, but they should still function well enough to help us detect Vek activity across the island.

23ec2d5595fe54d5b29f2f94943a7168.text: We've upgraded these old satellites and should be able to make use of them. With any luck, they'll survive the launch!

adc3f4a53e85a205282634e66ed97ae9.text: We've been planning to launch these satellites for quite some time, I hope your Mechs can keep the Vek from sabotaging our efforts.

39adf439d0b00ac360caf12077f7f7eb.text: We're already getting data back from the satellites in orbit. Excellent job, we'll be able to spot the Vek before they attack!

e38f27379b76baa58f2044b16b79485d.text: I've dreamed of launching those satellites into space my entire life! It's amazing to see Old Earth technology still serving its purpose.

2643795350ed42cc896c4b3f5c1c3644.text: Privately, I was always sad seeing those satellites sitting in a display. Up in space, helping mankind, that's what they were meant for!

60af190bd64b598e27c2a86bdfc5c519.text: More artifacts destroyed by the Vek - along with our chance of establishing an early warning system.

57a52931f7529a840271c2894c9cea70.text: My grandfather recovered those satellites for Archive Inc. - many lives would have been saved if we could've put them back in orbit. It's a tragedy to have lost them both.

e1d8b39b037feebbb39f3d92b5b03ed6.text: Would've been better to get both satellites into orbit, but at least one of them is up there and transmitting!

7d4177559f90a3240f95e35223cfd248.text: I suspect Old Earth scientists wouldn't have been happy with a 50 percent success rate, but it's the best we amateurs can hope for!

41c4772812a2c2979026ea82270f95d8.text: Our technicians recently got an Old Earth artillery battery up and running! Please make sure it survives this fight.

11a78b4a5322969f4d516bf3f3cba645.text: Excellent job, we'll leave the artillery battery manned and ready in case the Vek decide to return!

97024fb35fd8ae6cb25a6856f5cb2ee2.text: We were hoping to study that artillery battery to expand our military capabilities. Now it's just another worthless pile of scrap.

c07eac794a96a4ac861713bf96710110.text: Old Earth produced massive quantities of explosives. This region is littered with uncleared ordnance, so watch your step!

764fa1a939d05933c202ed15b3c899fd.text: Old Earth proximity mines are buried in this region from hundreds of years ago. We were slowly disarming them - but then we thought, why not use them against the Vek?

e0f407b4404a3f260e747105c5fbdc6c.text: We were conducting excavations in this region when the Vek came using Old Earth proximity mines. You may be able to use them against the Vek!

4a18b97217a32914e9f48146d582b78c.text: Watching those mines take out the Vek was a real treat! And with fewer mines around, it's safer for our forces to move through the region.

63ce11854b9ca5fffce007fe4eb6c797.text: With the Vek gone, and some proximity mines cleared, we can establish a permanent military presence in the region!

18bc1bb1303b8910afc8d424e3bb8fde.text: Destruction of the dam in this region is a necessary evil - it will create a natural barrier between us and the burrowing Vek.

78fefd471ebd5fb4149e987d7c12c539.text: This Old Earth dam used to generate power, but has little use now. Destroying it will let the river reclaim the land and delay the Vek.

9db399434f492041b015907529d2ddba.text: It was painful to watch that historic monument fall. I hope it was worth the sacrifice.

2b4ed491d885aaad34f81814b3c57ace.text: Thank you, #squad - the destruction of that dam will delay the Vek while we try to get more military technology back online!

c7994015ff81c9acf63b0b140cc867c3.text: Now there's a massive river between the refugees and the Vek hives, we all should be a lot safer! Thank you, #squad.

e4c6dc03328e948a0b9f9acb78059063.text: The destruction of that dam would have been useful. At least it's still impressive to look at.

79032ec84724c9771abfb73bc415672e.text: With the river still locked behind the dam, the refugee centers in the adjoining region are easy targets for burrowing Vek.

07601ad780ce443415957201c2e3b7a9.text: An offshore volcano is causing tidal waves along the coast - and may help wash away the Vek threatening the area.

e4aeaf27c3235db3cdeaeae1ab5a6a19.text: Mother nature comes to our defense! Good thing the structures in the area were prepared for flooding. Thank you, #squad!

819eabdab04d6926c2c0fcce87c525c2.text: against the Vek. Bonus Objectives are to

8270a854e7b6fba39f1ffc9bf49eae43.text: We need to move aggressively. We need you to destroy as much land mass in the region as you can before the Vek use the mountains as hives.

a697f192cb9580d89e6c76551c50d0e8.text: We need to drive the Vek back - kill all you can, then destroy the mountain ranges before they turn them into hives.

2da9dc629bb0026270ea8e92f7533360.text: Well done. Normally, I would welcome stable ground in any part of R.S.T. - but not if that stable land mass benefits the Vek.

e123152df4c97fe802a7faabcda87f08.text: Not enough Vek were killed... and reports indicate enough stable land mass remains for them to attempt a hive. This mission was a complete failure.

6f75d783cea0e7e5e7dd3c432b45e3a2.text: Mountains left standing (optional, we could just have generic

93e71fee6070b038d016e820de1d6105.text: messages and not bother with these.

0bbdc7f7b2a53542763c677f5017fe03.text: The Vek casualty report was sufficient, but with the stable land mass remaining, they can still use them as hives to replenish their numbers.

1a1c0910ef27b675c54049516ba94dc7.text: Vek left standing (optional, we could just have generic

1fbf943193bdccf458c1b9c6c7e824d2.text: Vek still remain in the region. But at least with the stable land masses destroyed, they have no hives to skulk back to if we hit them again.

5376a2a6db99882e0a5a6286ef987445.text: Similar to 'generic' missions, but this one has Hornet Vek arriving out of massive holes in the groundinstead of Vek coming up from under the standard tiles. Where these holes came from has no explanation currently, so the text can address that.

69d958658d9b7cf6de6b2c2a343a9d6e.text: We're detecting strange Vek activity - flying Vek are emerging from underground hives beneath the island through erosion points.

4c8b6b89e4e3dcc9ee1bc408e876e3d4.text: Vek have been reported emerging from erosion points and then taking to the air. We can't allow them achieve air superiority.

f580c2ac67e9e30a64fe990ced06133b.text: We've had reports of Vek not only burrowing below ground, but emerging and then taking to the air. They own the ground, we can't allow them to control the skies, too.

6a453423840fdebd93833dfc9896acf6.text: I want you to make this area a no-fly zone for the Vek - turn those erosion points they're emerging from into graves.

a8a50dafd45fdcd90941ff62e9b3fbb6.text: success for this mission, as it can involve a number of different bonus objectives (low grid power, low mech power, etc.)

9743e0447f9e6faf344a49605ac8e9ea.text: No Vek in the air or on the ground - no living Vek, that is. Well done.

7125d2152c3cd364cdd56e2614144902.text: We've stopped the Vek infestation here - we'll be ready if more erosion points appear.

d3b97ec771d328f325f0fac1922ebb5d.text: mission, but this one has lightning striking the ground every turn. Weather Control systems out of control?

2b4eb63abe72f9e853777a82f9364399.text: One of our meteorological stations has reported Vek converging on their location. Intercept them - but beware the weather, it rains lightning.

baa91bd00c3abc6518b8e87535f8eb6c.text: One of our weather turbines has reported a Vek attack. We can't afford to lose the turbine, but beware the storms in the area - they are out of our control.

355d378bfea87368733b04a98e293ad2.text: success as it can also involve a lot of bonus objectives.

1ab164bdf229c90803b47550f147ce91.text: Well done. R.S.T. weather conditions are notoriously difficult to control, but they're one of our best weapons against the Vek.

0d94cfc81b5a1a9f9ce2ba96ba030066.text: Mission expect the player to use the Terraformer to transform grass into sand (as part of RST's

7778b9a87e54f204553d80e3f837b030.text: policy). Though Justin is concerned that it's confusing why the player would want to destroy pretty land, as the mission does not make it clear why destroyed grassland makes a strategic difference.

6caa5289043b5db7aeb026e81ba783ab.text: We need to activate one of our terraformers to destroy a Vek hive beneath the surface.

e2a16d78f4217ebe80ce2517d0672387.text: Use the terraformer on the ground in this sector. We can't let the Vek use the stable land mass to breed; the whole region could be lost.

17f118fcfc14a3dae2cd5b1526794e92.text: Our terraforming technology is one of our best weapons against buried Vek hives.

f854875acc479ca8eb9867a0b48bdb96.text: We need to use the terraformer in this region to collapse Vek tunnels beneath the surface.

74db47481ed07e64f6c06bf552479c0e.text: Terraformer is secure - and sensors report no activity from Vek below the surface. The region is ours.

92dda731144a17378eb23c28a0c3b801.text: Losing our island's greenery in this way is something I can endure if it means it won't be despoiled by the Vek.

7cf2e372ba249fdea32ffc6b0629a443.text: The terraformer was destroyed - and we already have reports of Vek hives in the region. One of our best weapons in the war is gone.

72a5648b7b78cd0d6100641b2a96852b.text: Terraformer survives, but the grassland remains

35ec4b06dba50bdf895b2918e15bcf3b.text: You've secured the terraformer, but it's too late to stop the hives - and that means the surrounding regions are now in danger as well.

d78a263f97eec84938e6ceb9d68f58fd.text: The entire map is falling away, only half the map remains at the end of the battle

74564bc5a7997f8dcdf123db10b365a0.text: The cataclysmic failure of a terraformer in the region is destroying the land. Try not to fall into the depths.

bb84e6e9b7bb331ae6167008faace116.text: That chasm should prove too deep for even the Vek. Maybe we should start sinking more of our island...

a301e33ff65bc879540689c0a55a8e1c.text: The Vek took out this region's ground stabilizer. We're not sure what the result will be... watch your step.

5a7edcc239228e7a85de0cf506b8f90c.text: Another day, another piece of our home destroyed. Once these Vek are gone, our terraformers are going to have to work overtime.

4118a82c6c869204704a69393cab8a67.text: is filling in a chasm in the earth. Player must defend it.

20eaec9c413cba4e83f0075c66ba862d.text: One of our earth movers is filling in a chasm created by malfunctioning stabilizers. Make sure it stays in one piece.

d7de4f7aa6bfb59c17126b308de563d4.text: survives and the ground is filled in

dff2ff76add1c24caea479276f8aa211.text: We'll start constructing subterranean defenses on that new land before the Vek can burrow into it.

7ec1fd33578fcee7e7f8e6d0e709057c.text: dies -- ground still might be filled in, so don't address that.

1aea09e0a3a76dff0851048e91f7f7fc.text: Stable land is at a premium on this island - we needed that earth mover to create a foundation for new shelters and roads!

fed2f7cf3ff75e811579d5edb35beff5.text: We shape the weather patterns over the island so our solar farms can harvest sunlight twelve hours a day. But to do that, the farms need to remain standing.

51e6a25d792a58ae5ff66eeafb58022d.text: Those solar farms are essential for maintaining the Grid. It's a miracle you kept the Vek from destroying them.

29914da8250397a1cbe4b97281554bf2.text: Just one solar farm is insufficient. While the island endures rolling blackouts, I'm sure you'll expect your Mechs to get priority treatment.

d23a84fa5761d89b78ce7d8b2b8ec360.text: Without power, your Mechs are worthless. Perhaps next time you should consider that when the enemy is destroying our solar farms.

479d74bd9d82ce0a04b5848a31f4e35b.text: This site holds two warheads designed by a temporal physicist, Dr. Renfield, utilizing your 'breach' technology. R.S.T. was deemed the safest place to test them.
