e47b0db3d6d0e5808fc974e18cec9299.text: Temporal reconstruction initiated. Removal of hazardous Vek material commencing.

b274d919769dd7b94ea910fafefbabc3.text: #corp infrastructure is at risk. Removing Vek from combat work zone.

9fa5f4807cf347314fd416d16210ce0c.text: My weapons have reported in. All components are eager to fulfill their purpose.

41dc790ad8f0707cd8901e90cc43dc3a.text: Here we go... th-th-this time I can do this.

8de1fe9e655f3d00ce26a56e3b247c02.text: I'll n-n-never get used to this.

a89a6806a4d51d31454f40b990e8849d.text: Deployed... uh, assessing th-threats... acquiring t-t-targets.

613bb16a425608a2df0305b64003eb1e.text: Uh, this is P-P-Pilot #self_full... r-reporting in.

329b6a49826ab268293f9f925fe289fb.text: Attention, #corp citizens. Please remain in your safety pens until order is restored.

055ddfe22bb0efe427bdcce7a730d233.text: Attention, #corp citizens. I am a designated representative of the #squad. We are here to protect you.

236f9fc58056bd87a3352a821c76fa9b.text: Citizens, please remain in your  emergency pens until safety has been restored.

bfc811180b4ef93f85290533bf0f96a9.text: Hundreds of people are in those buildings, make sure they stay standing!

d29c4ff7ef2689dc87aac7b63dc748ec.text: Now show me what those Mechs of yours can do.

766e6e52e5dfa62eaae017abf089567c.text: Many lives depend on you. Stay safe and help everyone you can.

e27d7118f79c454ac797de018d35ae14.text: Hundreds of lives are in your hands. Please be careful.

30529976320b320d15900772f8229a67.text: We're monitoring you from here. Good luck, #squad.

8df7ac0fc048f968cfc49ef6f80eece5.text: Detritus will monitor you as best we can, commander - #squad, good luck.

681ae5409ac2f713a3850156b0741487.text: Nnnh... localized breaches make my head spin.

b3300147f5877d5728264ec4a1f78b5e.text: Are we back? Where we should be?

1bbdea409791d47e7e88299f0b3c5611.text: Are we where we should be? And when we should be?

9bd3f328beb34d11104c479627656cfb.text: Localized breach successful... all systems check out.

df7ac4aa304d8aa5d9120c30932e057f.text: So that's what terraforming time feels like...

85d82df199f845239b5e9497e6d21803.text: Nnnh... localized breaches make my head feel like it's in two places at once.

dcbb12954f5db79bb4fac1f6701c28dd.text: We ready to do this again?

5106aa143c8651d9c4ca5aa9c37ad2d8.text: Localized breach worked. Let's use it to our advantage.

37348a42d04498f9252b3e78c144775e.text: We've bought a little time, make the most of it!

44c96ecfe50774f634dbfdac6948da4d.text: Does... do colors seem sharper to anyone else?

b70fbaddec09f4dc88ebf6e4dd41907d.text: Did we just create a new timeline or...

a0039f54d1b3f3423c739e5a312b6db7.text: I heard repeated local breaches can induce s-s-stuttering... oh no.

77beeee741acd043fdf43e1d25df4429.text: We know our opponent's movements, now let us use it against them.

056974d242e25f898b40bf6844968ace.text: Fascinating! All right back where it was!

329d37aeeb4eab992656784686abe421.text: Oh, I'm right where I was when... or where I was now... which... never mind.

d5f75ee1eb6ddfd98e37287187faeab8.text: I'm relatively certain short breaches were not the intention of the technology...

511646278fae7a11b1a9ceeb23447e56.text: Let us begin our Vekticide efforts anew.

76c41c4cbf658054fc26e91989ef4967.text: It worked! We didn't blow up time or anything!

65c159bf91843de6bee8dd3f3e004ea1.text: All my senses feel... sharper. Colors seem... brighter.

614ecf82fe9ca953a6014fcc00c6c85c.text: Feels like we're stripping time's gears when we do that...

559f6236b244fed38c81cf6b2f7f2154.text: Nnnh... localized breaches make my head hurt.

7e9983137cfd31b55a1313e8490aaad9.text: Can't do that again for a while.

6b0527f95ae3a7d6a18f5cf7eaf132cc.text: We got a second chance, let's make it count.

584adec170b4074cd972872819d43d70.text: Localized breach successful, commander... er, this may be the first time you've heard this.

947c74a95aee1f2ca92a341f761ee4fd.text: Localized breach successful. Suggest avoiding any more wear and tear on timeline.

97edbac776806ba448b5a80580803dc8.text: Reset c-complete. Please, we need to more careful!

62aa887ee820bca2bb38e31e12482899.text: This isn't what m-my research was meant for...

6a6c193eacb6065a6fe7751afac0baee.text: Did we go actually just go back in time? Or did we create a divergent timeline?

01403df661e08c5f1d1d7ba7b2104787.text: ...Did you pick up a strange glitch in your sensors just now?

fad23c0dd1154b033f1660af57675d75.text: What was that? Just had a moment of deja vu... like when you first arrived.

b8de7b1b0064eae787f38a53869865ca.text: My sensors just registered a localized time breach. Was it a malfunction?

36e3efad07cfc4dc8e22ebb220eac377.text: #squad, are you there? Getting strange readings on sensors... are you all right?

c43e0446f6ed50fba3dc5cab0f777818.text: Generic mission end where enemies are all killed

da43800f72bd1d887d844477a54e2b37.text: We killed them all! The Vek are dead!

2a2f1606678202595a955acde7380157.text: We wiped them all out! The region's clear!

c7d22fa9790f638c2c523b27841e0a04.text: Got them all. #corp will be pleased.

5a725b3227ccf3f07912d5adc07fe5c9.text: Even Kern's got to be smiling now.

11483b6b0284ce49729c9b14aa313193.text: [ No Vek life signs detected on sensors ]

a3eabce2cc65e2cb555099e70c37bae6.text: [ The Vek threat in the region has been eradicated ]

79c8fc46ef25f032cdbde5cf89966901.text: [ Vek population in the region at 0% ]

73e2ddbb8dcd6422f1b760037cdc9be6.text: 100% success. That's the number CEO Singh likes to see.

8b5b4918abe3645eceb18d351914e682.text: Not a trace of Vek on biohazard scanners.

a65119d9de698252c90c2ada646fa27c.text: Took out those Vek cleaner than an A.C.I.D. bath.

e2bb8c09ac22e1daead1a564c33136c3.text: We did it. Their hold here has been weakened.

0f3ae20e047be63984f403870e09e10e.text: A few more like that, this war is won!

775c4b735ecf19c15c0dba9001fafe9a.text: Not a single Vek on sensors - good.

8d085a81dec946806c927fcfe3415a62.text: Only good Vek is a dead Vek.

02c1e6e8d9d637a8b631b99830a860b9.text: Good work, #squad. But the war's not over yet.

9da9e40cc1bc9f6278d3079619ab4576.text: We did it! Good job, everyone!

a210ac566b0d9c40a2811678d92a1f32.text: Good job, #squad! We took out all the Vek!

0203ca233458f1386304d055207c7b6f.text: Did we wipe them all out? We did?

877d30515afebfb6c752b669aea9b757.text: Region secure. Not a single Vek on sensors.

e4acebd5b0515658143606a23099211e.text: These Vek were no match for us. A shame.

2ed0eb88a32dc869734fd7035c189f21.text: The Vek are all dead. The region is secure.

fc8ab3834c197c30e67554487faadc49.text: I didn't collect nearly enough data on the Vek to perform a full analysis.

fc6d42cd4742a4461c50261365f5fcd0.text: Land has been cleared for planting.

f12ca17bd82dac26a757f1ae6e287bb3.text: Vek garden pests have been eradicated.

114e24ee0cc6d3c1e32256ba3c87bbb3.text: We did it! That was fun!

76678c307cbd5f24a4570067e45fa517.text: Last one back to the Carrier is a rotten egg!

af7b6f34c20c9682e3c47e1470259694.text: That's how it's done! #squad, saving the day!

3f4d5eaf8beee3c1d29b648d89b81f51.text: Clean sweep, let's pack it up.

4e331e999bdc609b5f2402fec8ffb112.text: No Vek on sensors. Good job, #squad.

687ae4424eaabca1b4c876d1fa9fd36e.text: Clean and by the numbers, #squad. Well done.

08660e0788e0c5c6f41e46c33e87b13f.text: Is that all you've got? I could do this for days!

d5eddba986220d58901a243e1dff6328.text: Is that all the Vek? Really?

f840dab8df1ce4413d9e8a6305a2b359.text: Mission was a success, commander. All Vek have been destroyed.

c47984252d776d2b369094fb36744b34.text: Vek hazards eradicated. Components, you have behaved admirably.

59c0aebe089e1ace10583ac6825284f3.text: #main_mech's skill set has successfully removed all Vek from the threatened work zone.

5e7d3ff3c2d707c934dd0ef311d22824.text: I-I-Is it over? Are there any left...?

22d072ea904ef6860cd943077054b6ff.text: The Vek have been sanitized completely.

fab4e4fdde4d2f20fa37fa824b98f411.text: The Vek have been excised from the region.

5ccd68f1cb2345796a846b10a469c725.text: Not a single Vek life sign detected in the region - you've wiped them out!

60b872a1d18396e3283070e9b50724ad.text: Every Vek has been wiped out. Thorough - and impressive.

45223c04493f58be1dae3415d801daec.text: Running a deep scan... no Vek detected.

71f703b06650a8ebc0110dee829f1c1c.text: No Vek detected within the region. Well done.

247f275010debbd240d5d87dd68707af.text: I am grateful for your help, many lives were saved here.

fa62db106ee25bf67c3814b01c2074bf.text: Detritus sensor arrays detect no signs of the Vek.

62fa76dbab5075214f9030ed91d2efb5.text: Generic mission end when enemies retreat

c921f6db9787f7622a05498e6632a784.text: We sent the Vek packing... hope they don't come back.

6fb805e537b57f8df5e57813930afca7.text: We'll get them all next time. Those fleeing Vek won't get far.

fdf438ae44f0ec4542a0196fbb6973c0.text: Next time, we can't let the Vek flee - they'll just regroup.

08fa7b8e3a4c9e285ded7ee72c9db18f.text: [ Vek have been detected leaving the area ]

dad93cd2c8eb074db3e9feb7015c1af0.text: [ The Vek are receding from the conflict zone at maximum speed ]

2756f284548899f2a4c0644c76ab44cf.text: We're still picking up surviving Vek fleeing the area... not ideal, but still a win for us.

9cc6ef243bce16e4d0ae903ecaf200c8.text: Hate to leave those fleeing Vek unaccounted for, but we secured the region.

9803ccca0e9de3c5cedee31605c9153c.text: The Vek are retreating. We'll monitor the area, but they'll likely regroup elsewhere.

3a1cf9052317af556c38e5b8a3f1c438.text: Hate letting any Vek get away, but at least we secured the area.

84804d1660a28ba162324df6b8dc2eee.text: The Vek may run, but they won't get far.

89d62346cf8bf38170557d5edd379f0c.text: We got the Vek running scared now.

6c1d8890cc37ad1f1b89d7ae2262602e.text: They're scattering! We pulled it off!

669430bcc36b1ea05722bce29ac9830c.text: The Vek are retreating... will they regroup?

f826910bddc2884c2f3066a1a2c3f11c.text: The Vek are fleeing to other regions. I hope they don't endanger the civilians there...

eff4dc83b21e868976dc29212a60ef7f.text: The Vek are scattering! We've secured the region!

992af9301b3754e98a63f92615f9fb78.text: Where do the Vek retreat to? And how can they burrow so quickly...?

1cad6d227b970bd42db953cae4e67c33.text: Vekticide of region complete. Further gardening of other regions required.

de1323277d8c66aa87b6b9edb4f68ba2.text: Nature preserve has been protected. Further gardening may be required.

8a082da5c91e6a9be47c33d4c175ede7.text: Vek garden pests are relocating to other regions.

d4ac8ab89d27116090dfb7bd181031f6.text: Nutrients of deceased Vek have been distributed into the soil.

cc40e5827e781835bff6c942d3099067.text: Hey, where are the Vek running off to? I was having fun!

d2ef7b5b59eafb120147470ef7295956.text: Aw, just when things were getting good, the Vek run away!

3ad3187e0fbd4db4b7f7256ba48a800e.text: That's it, Vek! Run! And don't come back!

b72426f22a06e6058299fbb3a37ea090.text: Don't like letting even one Vek escape... but we did good here today.

c8c82573d9386860026904cfa54770be.text: The Vek are fleeing... but they'll be back.

62910edd687e19684bacdcad7d50c9d0.text: Run back to your hives, you Vek bastards!

6c51a31c42ea260110ae9108dec8d259.text: Vek driven off. Ready for evac, commander.

b725fbe44468d6b62fd51fdff1ca2d60.text: Vek hazards have fled the zone. Warning construction crews in other regions.

7ce361fc02889f16b4a332897e9a56ad.text: Vek hazards have relocated. Work site integrity maintained.

4cf730d37d5b14b41159df388abece7b.text: Are... are th-they retreating? Wh-Why... we won!

76e66acab3e9181cbf0e53f79f1e5653.text: The Vek have been partially sanitized.

30c0154817a8ec43d1e45961dcab037b.text: The Vek have retreated. Further sanitization will be required later.

dfc3216631b0e16d35993c6fd271da3f.text: Our scanners are picking up reduced Vek activity. What a relief!

d321dd5b625421b7f3fbf36b8a2df1b5.text: You sent them packing! Well done, #squad!, well done!

36fbaa06350695f4358f046d4fdbaba8.text: Hard to believe, but it appears you drove them off.

fdbc76c0ea67794c6b116d512e70f143.text: The Vek retreat gives us hope. Initiating subroutines to track the survivors.

d994c4bda667ecc6b48f7660bb3eccb4.text: The Vek - they're disengaging. We have you and the #squad to thank, commander.

8f22b3c84375b9f0282b24fb3216f222.text: The Vek are on the run. We'll handle them from here, commander - thank you and your squad.

39df026bff26a2f78b3ca47a4f0d5183.text: Plays at the start of the final mission

4c79df39da618414a8cfc4b0ea07a15d.text: Emergency: Power Grid out of range

0bcc29cc51f8c014a7d4039ee82d2f80.text: We're here... but not sure what we're supposed to do without access to the Power Grid.

a01418017763606a0a80533f8f6ea327.text: We're here, but we're too far from the Grid... our Mechs won't last long.

c724f816b11b22fe3e47b411cdc0f5fc.text: [ This unit risks itself by coming to this Vek volcanic hive so that other units might persist ]

6abc6d0b540ae590b8005975bcb4ff98.text: Deployment successful. We're out of Power Grid range, however.

40a668f5264a06aa04a101c323c839a1.text: So close now - can we do it?

740f25c7e41ef4dcad7718e2dd96babc.text: This is the last timeline the Vek take from us.

7bfcdf0e185cc1d9e414d978aedbe329.text: We've come all this way - just a little further!

67877e5347cb3bd7af2794b8c144ce79.text: This will determine if this timeline has a future.

d875505e8dab5677619906a671db0692.text: Amazing... the Vek activity must have somehow sparked this eruption.

05268011be561613cd8c38de3c6f4a7e.text: Thermal levels are off the charts - this volcano is active.

c228bf353d917b865e74e687e3323554.text: This island is a new biome... created by the Vek?

a1a18be23cf9246b82efa2333b9931c7.text: Theory. Perhaps the Vek mean to recycle Old Earth using volcanic activity.

66d1fd9c4b5153c92e66412c3f8039db.text: Diverting all power to Vekticide protocols.

c7fcaa4db0c0aa40add76fd883104469.text: It's now or never. Well... I mean, until next timeline, I guess.

f3d2bef8413e43f06ad9ed175323e878.text: This is what we trained for. Everyone, form up on me.

767c0b06156c32397f765bc607409c6a.text: First, secure the surface, then we'll need to protect the bomb.

00a7c8aa0818ff028a8fd4ad60877cda.text: Hope they're still recording me back at the islands... I can't hold this pose forever.

56a7b3092ffd5c851358a34b46da2023.text: We ARE coming back from this, right? Anyone?

594e30d66fda1d3e6b4d2cf76e968dc8.text: Don't want to get all mushy, but it's been fun, commander. Let's do this.

3104412f180546a42d3fac01466b8b71.text: ...This is for every timeline they've destroyed.

0e714a7b2f69a20a3892fd9a65f9d22f.text: We're here. The central Vek hive.

fda0d10f299833ed131a34d098c9210a.text: Picking up tectonic activity... watch for lava, that volcano's active.

66da5b3e694880934c6dc6f50befafd0.text: Analyzing temporal reconstruction needed at current location. Calculations expanding exponentially.

eb922550ad195cd1eb262aba01de5e6d.text: Am testing morale of base components now. Deserters will be cast into the lava.

4b4c16bd34421397f7fd751999c60023.text: My base components are prepared for disintegration before dishonor.

656df50d9cd25f5e8cc6576198cec5e7.text: This volcano is in violation of Corporate Accord Zoning laws.

5e6e620f677e40bfd87c8ba5b5b50d18.text: This island violates the Corporate Accords prohibiting island construction without certified safety checks.

f7852f32d84d0d31a1baf7cde30db419.text: This Vek hive violates construction ordinance 1.i, 2.ii, and aesthetic association rule 13.a.i.

abbb6bb7fddc8fcaa0ffc4adb833cef8.text: This island... it... it d-doesn't look safe?

ef0b2a5fea8404bfa4aee5cb0cb4f31b.text: H-How are we s-supposed to get off this island once we're done?

a920904905073ebeb023397d1b2992be.text: Scanning land mass for useful mineral deposits. Failure to access Power Grid logged.

f1632edbc3569efbab334f6b7c52f454.text: Not getting a Power Grid signal. Without power, the probability of success is 0%.

0677fd912880c9353a444811438687f5.text: Picking up the pylon drop on sensors, commander - they're falling fast!

74f3e8a5c8828f9ed79e529619ecbabf.text: Picking up the pylons on sensors now.

885a40c23ad465a2f3857451c3f4ed54.text: Prepare to protect the pylons when they land.

eb9d42eb5442431db7e100227b555b86.text: Remote power pylons? I could use a few of those myself.

da7c45a1c655df6009a766e815113320.text: We're getting company? Even if it's just pylons, they should brighten the place up a little.

fedbc603b5815a02dade1154f8261625.text: Good. Without a Grid out here, we'd be running on fumes.

ea6b04bf7deeab8c5ab0544c52e751f9.text: Picking up the pylon drop on sensors.

6234858b3891fc8ca923638f336b6c64.text: A squad of highly-trained supply pylons have been deployed to assist us.

ca1cf3ace907f642c2641dde7dae6790.text: D-D-Detecting p-pylon b-being deployed to our location.

7b3821e421c5018438a100868707fa49.text: Deploying remote power pylons. They'll keep you connected to the Grid.

a4ff709b128e6180218537e16ee29df4.text: The ground's unstable, we're falling in!

e6945aab1983d522a798ee1a0ea0f4c6.text: This island cannot defeat us, so it tries to swallow us.

416db751bbfb04b3c5a9cb52e3c076ea.text: The ground's breaking apart... everyone, watch out!

7e39803bf4ead4bb975695de7fa70a6c.text: This damn island's trying to swallow us alive!

f02d989949795833dcddbb34533697ab.text: The island foundation is collapsing due to unusual Vek activity beneath the surface.

751d4663fa82487d8f2730a8034e2d5b.text: The island! It's t-tearing itself apart!

769c3b3928acee66bfa771cf9fd9cb12.text: Activate ground stabilizers, the island's breaking apart!

282a43168b0fa98b99ca18bada8fa14e.text: Sending down power pylons. Keep them operational, we don't have any more.

2c0b7dd529494969b46e6e93e6f7d00a.text: Update: Target acquired\nMission: Destroy Vek hive

89cf3142957af925facac3b1c5839dca.text: We're going to need something big enough to take out this entire cave system to stop the Vek.

45c95bb357dae50006c9e38f5fdfec07.text: It'd take a dozen R.S.T. Earth Movers to collapse this hive... we can't do it on our own.

db3154ba0f3ddf6dc6314dd47141c202.text: [ Central Vek hive discovered, probability of destroying hive with current armament low ]

384ba09f09921bf8c6c45dd05fab862c.text: It'd take a fleet of A.C.I.D. launchers to collapse this hive on itself... we can't do it alone.

ad0e1a1fff8a2b2642d353a2a82e2f19.text: We'll need a lot more firepower than we have to take out this complex. Any ideas?

d47ca5afab73f13513d7f17321d359eb.text: This hive... it's too big for us to take out by ourselves!

45850793131e32328e3a3abb2b47fefe.text: Our weapons cannot kill this hive. It is the island itself.

8c0f5c9dece516b6d67456122c073973.text: Not trying to be negative, but our Mechs cannot take out this hive. It's immense.

84e8dd2d5f0f3dfebc60935d42f788ff.text: The Vek infestation here is beyond our capabilities to exterminate.

80c44aa4f80ece990e53d8f26717de80.text: So 'what do I do now?' said Jonah, inside the whale...

80afde880257c900814c56bff22b6663.text: Okay, hive size a littttle larger than expected... Hold steady and await orders, #squad!

09137629a9a4bd9a504ff3462cb81a22.text: Great, just great! Now what? There's no way we're taking this place down!

1f4f4adeb6028182bfecd8f1aa7408c9.text: If we hope to destroy this hive, we'll need a lot more bombs.

77ca0414f77de578514e76f55bd641f6.text: The explosives required to destroy this hive exceed this unit's capabilities.

0038a406590fd52c84155588746cec37.text: We're inside the hive... but... h-how can we d-destroy something this size?

21dccd1675dd8f4d1e259399df93fe28.text: Demolition efforts impeded by scope of target area.

2f05a939d620df6fb5be76d7dc2b8069.text: My calculations indicate even a hundred Mechs couldn't bring this hive down.

83690592e76eee6d7610fde5e1f6225c.text: Deploying a Renfield Bomb. Defend it while it primes and it will destroy the hive.

dd711e018816a7406766c6fe31f1b0eb.text: Plays at the start of the final cave section (after MissionFinal_BombResponse)

c4a5a5b4973339057767437e41965648.text: Get ready, #squad! Keep the bomb safe!

a340a6f5e5cd336d35c6aa8aaf029151.text: Vek want to get to that bomb, they'll have to go through us first.

b25a61cfff266bdd075d8a7b6b79c0f1.text: Do whatever you can to keep the Vek from the bomb. It's our only chance!

4171eb70b4bd4cb4a4b02031ebd32718.text: Keep the Vek from that bomb - no way I'm letting them escape what's coming.

9fd70ac3ad963383d48a9ab527fb9e85.text: Defend the bomb. With your Mech. And your life.

b124ff85a86745f8ce99cc454ca0f007.text: We must keep Dr. Renfield's bomb intact... even if it doesn't go off, at least I can still study it.

da10222fd7b24a86ca953654da0edece.text: Do not allow the Vek to contaminate the device.

f6fb912eae3b968a1e22b4273111995f.text: I don't recall the part where there was a bomb. But... all right, we'll keep it safe.

0d980ee2d35d879f86cf92b684c5a111.text: Confirmed. All right #squad, form a circle around that bomb.

9abd6ba02a6190f602af63affa157751.text: This is it, #squad. Protect that bomb and I... we... save the world.

bf7e34d52fdd9fedb50b10c8ba83b6af.text: Affirmative. You heard the CEO, people, let's get this done.

08afdedd6777e66c5ed86cb53b4329c7.text: Demolitions are being primed. Ensure bomb hull integrity is not compromised.

7c60bb4d9c20a81ba33390a77b3eb1da.text: All components, protecting the bomb is our priority. Remember your training.

af5edcab9b7c32a1eb33c5e4cc490b8a.text: We need to protect that b-bomb... don't let the Vek destroy it, or the w-war's lost!

187abdfce878bed182623d3841bf218a.text: Demolition authorization and defense of Renfield tachyon explosive logged.

2df8578985c788e8bebb5a3025eddb9d.text: So we are to keep the Vek from Renfield's dangerous toy. Let's get to it.

06ff942bdcd3ac2d27303325960f8d16.text: When the bomb is destroyed, another one is dropped and the battle length is extended.

6799ddb736a621b2270cae641da22fa9.text: Deploying another bomb, but it will need more time to prime. Try to keep this one in one piece.

f6b9cb903ec4809e80ff3755ea331684.text: The bomb... it's ready! This is it!

9040d5e669fcc23e4aff90f7bbadbc8e.text: Bomb's ready to tear this Vek hive apart!

e1c9474035e13d38a05827bb9f4d94c6.text: Getting a rise in tachyon emissions from the bomb!

e6737adf3830fb7b47976214c3c8d2cb.text: The bomb is about to fulfill its purpose.

7793082cd0423fe51f35d92ec8b6016a.text: Renfield's temporal bomb has primed itself... tachyon charge building!

3a29d8f912fb622fdbb9ee20ae63e3c3.text: Bomb has awakened, signaling a drastic change in this biome.

1383b237dd801cb56f4faef7cde58855.text: That bomb's live! I... I hope this works!

f644a278cec05a9f1020a50c1af91cd8.text: Renfield Bomb activated... bracing for impact.

1b3338b40367b59329c6701e4db46597.text: Damn bomb's active, finally! Took its sweet time.

606742fea224f841767ac31cb4c83d2c.text: Bomb's activated! It's about to blow!

a274e51a1bad4f22756cabe871655862.text: Bomb is now active. Vek hive demolition commencing.

180a2c251c7f8181da6c7c34113509f9.text: I'm p-picking up a rise in tachyons... the bomb, it's activated!

197823407ad8be8879f3d6185d63eefa.text: Renfield Bomb activated. Hive demolition commencing.

c84049eca39fc6e6b91a6cfb07a9c677.text: Renfield's temporal bomb has activated. Bracing for impact.

78d069a34f6a742bad5c1dd623b6d749.text: The Renfield bomb is ready. I recommend you leave now or you'll share a grave with the Vek.

9fcba1b4612aaa5abf9e28b0ca6d48c3.text: Is that one of those Pods you were talking about?

0231c4f9f8c73359c96ec9851b2dc4b8.text: Picking up an incoming object, commander.

4e97398d2c187b5a6fdbbc6f50917811.text: [ A temporal rescue craft, designated 'Time Pod', has been detected ]

67827c5ed47c56fab1e4a12e966d5069.text: We've picked up an unidentified object on sensors.

94bc4528ed2dbbe8cc43ebedbb4daa57.text: We've got a Time Pod about to impact the area.

64a5f6d495dc1d0bc0c1c1e677d18fab.text: Picking up a Time Pod on sensors.

5b931362c1c46cef9b102124a0862d47.text: Delivery just showed up on sensors - a Time Pod.

8afa93e3851ffb8af08c29b97b0d4dc1.text: Picking up a Time Pod on sensors!

4e1d65ecd3ddfd1470efab6ba3f6f2fb.text: Got something on sensors - it's a Time Pod!

4d6565828baa9dac07c4fbd06fd418f5.text: Calculating trajectory of incoming Time Pod...

7313ec8a7fa34b6edcf4e469094ae1d3.text: I'm detecting a temporal distortion... a Time Pod!

df549574a39ae61bbafaf5f1a726a7dc.text: Picking up tachyon emissions... a Time Pod!

1ff1268df8a58485a2038750834642e2.text: A Time Pod is causing a disturbance in the atmosphere.

6d5c4e97abf23f13ee474162d592ad44.text: A Time Pod is cutting its way through the clouds as it descends.

9b66170df38b4851a568ba5e6d8c0962.text: A Time Pod is on approach. It may include contaminants to the soil in its wake.

40804c326c018bebc671dff6b7a524c0.text: What... a proximity warning? Is it a Pod?

b8f9ecb89bc2e603a844ac2c9fd3dd27.text: Got some crazy readings... I think a Pod's on the way!

bea3527344d06075f317a0e2846df42e.text: Sensors are picking up a Time Pod.

925178b9b1b858afa8dfd456547f730a.text: Got a Time Pod on descent.

1a844936fedad31f9f46606e0f4e1d79.text: Looks like a gift from the future is about to arrive.

52f3be704570f6affe6d3f0c0f7ccfc6.text: A Time Pod is entering the construction zone.

623b40262579b4daab77c670ed069835.text: A temporal capsule is entering our work zone.

95707c12d0c42050427c2e652db7db51.text: Time P-P-Pod is on approach. I h-h-hope it survives the landing...

1283b6fe793d212562227d21a81cd5cd.text: I have detected a Time Pod on sensors.

b90b67dd64991a337e8bb83d23653173.text: Our satellites are picking up an incoming Pod.

e02acca8a8369620d6afa3fff43b0fa4.text: Another Pod from 'your future' is incoming.

293c32cbab8ec11156a20c9435f96664.text: I have detected a Time Pod. Its trajectory indicates it will land near your coordinates.

4d697ffe221c7ca247362f2b379cec29.text: We've picked up an incoming projectile - it came out of nowhere!

72350b3f7683b60df5ed064ad0fb21c1.text: New Secondary Objective: Acquire Pod resources

db1ea616d8ac892b3a760b50be33859a.text: Let's recover the Pod if we can!

a77dca4bca94908fe45d11133a33ce8f.text: Don't let the Vek step on the Pod, they'll crush it!

7d0848318fce6d80b83af314aabd95ae.text: It's one of those Pods. Might be someone inside.

6e359a9308c3fe90371cf56ee867c0d1.text: Guess we were due for a resupply.

f91ff75e95de236cc3a6e51e058e7790.text: [ A temporal rescue craft, designated 'Time Pod', has landed in our vicinity ]

9fe0fba072a2ee84b4ec64808bb3ceae.text: Be sure to follow safety protocols before opening that Pod.

dc5a1542e13e03ac5a447539167bf9fb.text: Secure the Pod before the Vek dispose of it.

d9dde1755b02b467ca5ae5a0c5f2e1c7.text: We can try to secure the Pod now - or secure the area first.

a19500a3ad518120f3e59a26dff2116f.text: That Pod - we need what's inside.

85a09f0279c6a90543692e58ca8a92b9.text: Drive the Vek away from the Pod before they crush it.

f6b04771b5541ae82e16daa54d0a73c0.text: Need to get to that Pod before the Vek do.

8aa23223531fa715e2274e8078399783.text: Make sure the civilians are protected first! The Pod can wait!

e05e32a949e561a926c8f406378c0d77.text: If anyone is in that Pod, I hope they survived the landing...

d766bdd3299fc9028857a7ea5e3be0d0.text: We need to keep that Pod safe from the Vek!

2356d0ba390bd290bf41a32349c199d9.text: ...I wonder if another me is inside that Pod.

c7ddc3467a5bfdf0424344240f6df884.text: If the Pod contains weapons, save them for after the battle.

1c409e828ff18deec964f39f0bbc7b8f.text: I MUST get my hands on this new arrival. Think of it, more future technology!

213c9016e4a62ade0db50a3a72a319cf.text: We can't let that technology get damaged!

96ce916ec959a93e5b52e5e10e1ff5f8.text: That Time Pod has disturbed the soil. Shall we remove it?

4ab68f05f4c099e67707f7fab65edf19.text: The soil has been contaminated by the Time Pod's impact.

326c05c32b4b07eca0127993b274edcc.text: Ooo... someone sent us a gift!

b9a78f7307f083d145ea31bfe8cab516.text: A gift - and it's not even my birthday!

e0a63cd28e4000e814202ea6e996516c.text: I'll see if I can snag it!

6818c9e272436e8757264a1a7449976d.text: Remember - Grid first, then the Vek, then secure the Pod.

812e3d014b7227992a279efd9a76a0ad.text: Lady Luck's on my side. Let's rescue that Pod!

c52b7ce7992f6bfabc6297355f744782.text: We need trained soldiers, not more toys to play with.

244abb2e85e7d84c0203f2d3fd4fad2f.text: Don't break formation - mission first, then we secure that payload.

2ef256f3a694453f7a300995ddb0df4c.text: Focus on the mission, not the Pod.

7bd2249deebcf3fc50276963f977e627.text: Secure the Time Pod and detain its components for questioning.

908cba6682b92622fac65f91be45da26.text: The Time Pod is violating work zone safety protocols.

a77ef0a720630ceacdfba4e1c9d06d12.text: C-c-can we get to the Pod before the enemy does?

4c6f90d7e41d19d6c3812c17308fe822.text: W-W-We should be careful of f-f-firing weapons near the Pod. W-w-we might damage it.

501b0747ffc73c9953a441c0690f6c15.text: S-S-Should I recover it? Or... can s-someone else get to it?

0b87c55c4d3acaa2d06c7ef206dd2e5f.text: Be careful of that Pod... we d-don't know where it's been... or w-when.

1130e740c5028d978de5f7820257a9e3.text: Pod has carved an unauthorized trench on the island's surface.

9cd524f5fe65ac8d1dce05296b5f964a.text: I wonder if the Pod will have an intelligence on board comparable to mine.

b7eaacac2881b74e07beee43aec95483.text: It's vital we obtain that Pod. It may hold something that'll help us win the war.

b9c0ea86aa4432eff782e37b8cd894e1.text: That Pod's technically company property, so make sure it gets back intact.

2bd6bcfd5c8c398f614e1ffb2733a900.text: I want that Pod retrieved... and if you can't retrieve in during the battle, keep the Vek from it.

634c80f8a1ceaf1d5a20b57a9aa93609.text: If only those Pods would hit a Vek on the way down.

8d63d8a02a2f05ec9c176fcba08e7402.text: If you can secure the Time Pod, please do, but do not put any sentients at risk.

bcd7f88ac18c5eeef216f5a61c085482.text: The technology within that Time Pod could be instrumental for protecting this island and others.

3631b1a24b74c2208a284175021e7c6f.text: Whatever the object is, recover it if you can, but don't put yourself at risk to do so.

e576f93c790adbeb48e1d7cfe23be202.text: Now let's get back to the mission.

5b733a70ad423e035e2656c6060448a4.text: The Time Pod has been recovered safely.

6ffdcfed04551e9ee993e76c5ca96d56.text: All right, Time Pod's safely stored in cargo.

4a855b7dcedbafdd5bf120b34730223b.text: I have the Pod. Focus on your opponents.

098f0c050b90136d7c522fe6e6b62cef.text: The Pod is in my possession.

19fc9ff15f42514016a1acaf2729d66a.text: Time Pod has been safely extracted from habitat.

9e7416d0fa5f95963ec4a24f4680af2a.text: Time Pod reclaimed. Its impact trench will need to be reseeded.

36ca3d21dfa8dd0abd3f42b78b171590.text: Weeding efforts complete. One Time Pod removed.

57fd9599c57bd56cf081875302337324.text: Snagged the Pod! Wait... does this mean I'm 'it'?

29dcec1c055a7682ad163f3c6bde69a7.text: Pod secure. Now focus on our primary objective.

c90d40fe47ffed8f47dd77644e3211cb.text: I got the Pod! Someone... go long!

b57cc5d13f3610ee3388d9b2abb743ed.text: I dug out the Pod - you can thank me later.

88a8311f8d5a06c72685383e37cbf597.text: I really hope my Dad's not inside this Pod...

faaaa3f87be06027e4ed483b333910f8.text: Time Pod is in the cargo hold.

ebe7d01508d6166dbf3b3943894a73c4.text: We've got the Pod locked up tight.

f20546ae0bed36903ed9e4fbb8b61326.text: The Time Pod has been apprehended and its components are being interrogated.

232345f28e33fdfb343893a8824fa403.text: The Time Pod has been apprehended and its components detained for questioning.

ebdc3c689bfbb0b072e8d72d81c93c42.text: I will oversee the dismantling of this Time Pod personally.

f69858c64bd55972af8d12778c096451.text: The Pod... it's s-s-safe! For now.

5c2a3111d3e45792b66570ee168046ff.text: I have the Pod - it's still safely s-s-sealed.

121a51826851db45f60ade5072df9476.text: Recovered the P-P-Pod. It l-l-looks intact.

e07c12cc1b1f17544b8a56e67ed1f0e7.text: I have acquired the Time Pod. As expected, it is filthy.

d51d8284be3bdac92073e859eb9da169.text: I am pleased to report, due to my efforts, the Time Pod is secure.

9ae3d027d760ce50b7f331d7ca2f6b68.text: Pod destroyed (by anyone, including Vek, except the speaker)

52e8c2f212630a2042aaabeb679719d6.text: Hope no one was in that Pod...

e032c1a8a1cd5102b0559afbc1db4cf2.text: The Pod wasn't our primary objective, put it out of your mind.

cd0b5a8a1f0caae5dba09d3f54dc0d69.text: [ A temporal rescue craft, designated 'Time Pod', has been destroyed by post-landing damage ]

323c7ee394726f44a66452e0634b7b7a.text: We did our best to recover it safely.

b4aa928049002f9dca5d2b66bdfa746a.text: Don't blame yourself. There was no projection a Pod would land here.

a76d13e2a78e3dbfd2426103a48f774c.text: Whoever designed those Pods, they need to make the hull stronger...

d98de45e84a40bf3a3b6f873eada8a24.text: If only we could have recovered it...

c3463e8844cbe0c024568b46d6f8c76d.text: The Pod no longer needs our protection.

49750bafc4bddc2712a86fb93ae18e17.text: The Pod has been destroyed. Focus on the Vek.

1c20893b9508bcf193c13a321ad66a9f.text: Time Pod debris is now leaking into the soil.

443758831389870c4463b4e70334c0fa.text: Time Pod... and potential occupant... now enrich the soil.

8b08e0de9bcd80501c622c4fa48d4df3.text: What... what if someone was in there?

5ad48f8d5ce9fdfd7501849663f707c4.text: Pod's gone. Focus on our primary objective.

ebe1f11dea1b6626beb4cb0c6f31b1e8.text: No sense crying over crushed Pod.

727448f6adbf331dbf412b6d51d8ae8c.text: Pod shouldn't have dropped into a combat zone.

2f9f76bdd6c3c51dea59fcc3a4ec4020.text: Negative on recovering that Pod, commander.

e712cbe6c630b53d774926dbdc0f5b2d.text: The Time Pod is no longer trespassing in the work zone.

b1926980adb060de5c32947c707b9f6d.text: The Time Pod has shown how unsafe it is to enter a work zone without proper clearance.

14a3751ae61ffe733cf3db2f7a610254.text: Time Pod's structural integrity has been compromised.

6c982020cc699b79240d06a90a68f799.text: If only that P-Pod had landed somewhere s-s-safer.

64c8d9b165195fdf66fd005a8a5edad0.text: Do... do you think s-s-someone was in there?

2fcf83eca0d26a797114f4dc314d8684.text: Pod dispersed across wider surface area.

e299d783a6230f352c17a556842d3fe1.text: I regret to report the Time Pod has suffered irreparable damage.

2af95ad40363b92431b6bf09fa6ae840.text: Maybe something can be recovered from the wreckage of that Pod. Though from the looks of it, I doubt it.

361125acdede7f5b77f36f4737a73473.text: I hope there was not a pilot within that Pod.

52fb76b79825ce6c211a8b9142c78fec.text: The technology in that Pod could have saved many lives.

c6a0c2926a6c3d5c3be8b5027416b295.text: Unfortunate. I hope there wasn't one of your fellow pilots inside, commander.

c2a4214b89974110c1f2a1602ec6c568.text:
Secret object was inside a mountain 

Only needs 1 line per Pilot

dcbe65a7b0d6a16144abbcd4a1e9f7e3.text: Look in the rubble - what's that? A relic?

a1e77fac7845d11a3360dacf7535a139.text: Picking up something strange in the rubble...

4b918a0133a3b06aa8521a3655748c07.text: [ Unknown device detected in space formerly occupied by mountain ]

05a4db40a20e3338ae1f22696025b5c7.text: Picking up strange readings from the mountain rubble... no code my systems recognize.

22196b85e7b7b2572b75cadf692124a1.text: What the hell is that? There, in the mountain rubble.

22441b77606f9147118e4da3b890d63f.text: I'm picking up unusual readings... it looks like something was buried inside the mountain.

706ace4a20eda96ece6c49331d781f5c.text: Something was buried inside the mountain.

5199517ce602bc6199443887431a40f7.text: Well now, what have we here? The mountain was hiding something.

df9a3cbdb17e67d9f9abb289932c1574.text: Recycling the mountain has uncovered an unknown object buried within.

063ee01d5df10a9c47a2ef9054ae05af.text: I'm detecting... something... from the rubble.

5d0b87d49d1c22d96517c13a960376a2.text: I got a signal coming from the remains of that mountain.

8ea30b8fda29c2f2d15aacbe032268ba.text: I think something was hidden in that mountain.

9d01b612d76f8e84fa1af4ed7662e774.text: ...Picking up strange readings from that mountain, commander.

7379ffb483d56ac41e51a12b1ddc8a0a.text: A non-#corp device has been detected within the mountain. Detain it if possible.

c92220b99261eb93cb35a14a7637b7f1.text: P-P-Picking up a signal from the remains of that mountain.

32dfad45148bcdc35c607dcf58b237f8.text: Unknown object detected at mountain excavation site.

d5f635bf91721daa25dddf424a836d2a.text: What is that in the mountain? Why... its construction is more advanced than I am.

ad2e9c13f961323f08c605d9331fa380.text: Odd... we're getting some kind of signal from that mountain that was just destroyed.

d4f41c676b359e57cb57bbb583b71937.text: Our sensors are picking up strange readings from that mountain that was destroyed. Investigate if you can.

255cf4850905ea3f9e9fd888f20af828.text: I am picking up strange readings within the remains of that mountain.

29e9143cb884bb53f686eb741b576a2d.text: Our sensor array has swept the remains of that mountain... and picked up strange readings in the rubble.

43e68e113befc2948c245ce28f398db6.text:
Secret object was under water after destroying ice

Only needs 1 line per Pilot

23463b676c9fcfa3e96fc76d36490256.text: Look beneath the water - what's that? A relic?

6c1bb981073f1d340df28c2c50040837.text: Picking up something strange beneath the ice...

f80d69438c20c9e45e6e0d2df141ff4c.text: [ Device of unknown origin detected beneath ice ]

1d8144cda347c3b5b09503376940b99a.text: Picking up strange readings from under the ice... no code my systems recognize.

22c1025b888974cf7b258c83bedda1f1.text: What the hell is that under the ice?

d0b1e51d82b72d24ca4147dfcb5f5293.text: I'm picking up some unusual readings under the ice.

bec5ed37bb1c6965adc92cdf6fe0762d.text: I see something beneath the ice.

026b14ce277643f26e19a1da85486c01.text: Well now, what have we here? The ice was hiding something.

c8fb3a2c34433ed267c5bf157e8bddea.text: Fracturing the ice has revealed an unknown object beneath the surface.

74a4f5eca705860695926b885a2c6c04.text: I'm picking up... something... below the ice surface.

18f3089a0f48f3adde5b05952a356bdb.text: I got a signal coming from underneath the ice.

ef96390623446096e4ec355346ea3f6f.text: I think something was hidden beneath the ice.

168518bf679828407cd413d2386393e6.text: ...Picking up strange readings from under the ice, commander.

fa3c6242ba118a330009ddb7b9aa8694.text: A non-#corp device has been detected under the ice. Detain it if possible.

66e13144ab12e4d5e9c1eee42c4f5e44.text: P-P-Picking up a signal beneath the ice.

5c54cf8747d3b0c504f5b0c7183514aa.text: Unknown object detected under ice excavation site.

30a0abdafee48f65010395b1eafc4169.text: What is that beneath the ice? Why... its construction is more advanced than I am.

f9645aed6b7729b9c71e90c4a397bc98.text: That's odd... we're getting some sort of signal from beneath the ice.

64fd82c41fca00b883898d957e10d5a4.text: Our sensors are picking up strange readings from beneath that layer of ice. Investigate if you can.

36d88117f4160b20609a28cb7e117645.text: I am picking up strange readings under that ice.

84f75b7e4d265c457972e3e17899f3c1.text: Our sensor array have picked up strange readings from beneath the ice.

0c2cce074f029c0817e3fe767e70fdb9.text: It activated! It's not my fault, it just... happened!

957f9d28ef1c5b5a2a06451a2421abdd.text: Whatever it was, it's alive and ticking now. Sending some kind of signal.

7371589ef1cdf5cc3099c042c5ad9a31.text: [ Device of unknown origin has activated a signal ]

9d37002a938a146b5493c6b7c2fbe351.text: Uh, that thing lit up when I got near. Looks like it's transmitting... something.

bfa9802ae6df5aa90bc80d044d020686.text: I... I think it's some sort of beacon.

c5e91b9ba5a6bd9edca9ced1fc44ec59.text: I... I can't say for sure, but I believe it's a... transmitter of some sort.

aa3c6c32356f6aeecc0a3ee29d208abb.text: The unknown object is now broadcasting a signal.

77020874161ee5ad97ca141bdca0537b.text: Whoops! I think I activated it. It's... making some strange noises!

544dab326c1984130eeaec780ab17848.text: When I got close, it emitted a signal... hope it's peaceful.

4236194a425680ec9515fcc3c7c99d41.text: Uh, whatever that was, it lit up when I came close.

aef55064eebf17821b7cdc26af692f1d.text: I... I think I activated some sort of beacon, commander.

a42d5276028d6bc39d2d841a25d9f69b.text: The non-#corp device is sending what may be a distress call. If so, it calls in vain.

bd24b4698589f8908a7afcb94a050e0c.text: How s-s-strange... this s-s-seems to have activated s-some sort of beacon.

f85be0117e6a8e6b036717ff06452a7a.text: The device is broadcasting some type of signal... strange, even I can't decipher it.

aef765da3eb9bfaaeaa18b3b9c869f10.text: I think we're getting some special visitors...

f5b1412cbef3c66b986ee038658a5e46.text: We've got company... and it's no Time Pod I've ever seen.

f476d4e500c331fd4ef42cc562b65578.text: [ Object of unknown origin on approach ]

d88128294ec8457de6d7d7493f0f75bf.text: We've got company... and it's not from around here.

f4ac532e6d9c2f9c871046cbe72d5c71.text: Haven't seen a Time Pod like that before... if it even is a Time Pod.

5d20dc8a87eb877afe15112023477fa2.text: I think I know what the beacon was calling now.

3731597142de882089ca7cd9f41d8e98.text: Something comes. But it is a craft I have never seen before.

69ddb731856fa0df66d22b1550ecc8ec.text: I... I think the transmitter called it here.

920e2b04fcc80d39d7e88ad78baeb244.text: An unknown object is descending through the atmosphere.

b02ccb92ca4d0063935d89195976a7f3.text: Look at that Pod! I think it came in response to the signal!

42c67feff61b44b29c01eb9c040bdb04.text: Got something unusual coming in on sensors...

370cfd0db8af039c72ac60258146fa6e.text: We have company... but, uh, does that Pod looks strange to anyone else?

52ea9437c434d9d222d1af516e20a624.text: Unknown capsule, you are trespassing in a temporal reconstruction zone.

265b03083d5bde48c378c7dcffbfe239.text: P-Picking up an incoming craft! I-I-It's emitting a s-s-signal like the beacon did.

7a47a6ee3359c7ef73b62be198095f2c.text: Atmospheric disturbance detected. Alloys comprising object are not on periodic table.

18897adc03e71bbc19ceae450cb7909d.text: An unidentified object is approaching... emitting the signal that strange device did.

04c61a46674f7312e833af0c5df167ae.text: What's this...? We're picking up a strange craft on sensors.

443eb3a4e7a30b7a60068059eeb8ee50.text: Sensors have picked up an unidentified craft descending on your location.

482c99c6a05cb9ea675fd894c15d921d.text: An object has appeared in orbit. Nothing in my database is able to identify it.

a13e1bb3d3c3b2bb774030eb838c2f6e.text: Our sensors have picked up an object descending through the atmosphere... if it's a ship, it's not one we've ever seen.

ed62c30b5a7ad36a92c11de426784d6f.text: Picking up quakes - Vek are digging their way to the surface!

084d0925abfbcf9b44058d48d43bee18.text: We got more Vek digging to the surface, get ready!

df2f78f7596e5afba2259eb0eb29f246.text: Got Vek surfacing, watch the ground!

431a22975cb4ccb83c7876a8f424b067.text: [ Seismic readings show enemy activity from beneath the surface, and rising ]

37a5fde80aee9d0e3e55fab62c609a16.text: Seismic readings are reporting Vek burrowing to the surface.

a92d4764aa7a83383c89bf310568f7d1.text: No matter the odds, we'll win if we work together.

a80672df08f49d362e028f5a266dc974.text: More Vek are emerging for us to kill.

88c4d646adfe9853121379b332c218b4.text: More Vek are arriving to die.

d5e368dcdb0268f44dc73eac9d3ade6c.text: Vek are surfacing to fight us on open ground. Good.

b201d337650de29003133762f4daf243.text: If only we could find the Vek nest. We could learn so much!

30ec63f27bb02677ff68b5ed7e448faf.text: Vek burrowing detected. Disruptions to soil catalogued.

193626eb02f82ed4fa9692f517da70b8.text: Vek subterranean disruptions increasing in magnitude. Preparing harvesting tools.

eb4f03b6d42c6e75489ef2dddeb9f781.text: More Vek to stomp? No problem!

804ebaf2df296f4bc15d3f0d68b67118.text: Looks like more Vek are about to join the party!

96d66a8a6a770f69efbb9dcabfa1d5fa.text: I'm reading seismic activity - got Vek burrowing to the surface.

bc6bb7880be52ab95a68b7aa8906ee54.text: Vek are tunneling upwards, rising fast.

bea37ef8be71bc34e634ebd513d37501.text: Guess the Vek are bringing more buddies to even the odds.

14e9092e67807d9366ed8905502ac286.text: Ground's shaking - more Vek on the way. Good.

8d8297e91ea18ddab78792499f616eaa.text: Got more Vek coming up from below!

9ce3e51c45da1f52158188056c284885.text: Unauthorized Vek hazards have been detected.

6f6aa834ffc2f6f43ce5a2917e3c4ed9.text: Vek preparing to emerge without permits to surface.

7ea5a2432e7d9db4864cd1f4c06cbd44.text: They just keep c-c-coming... how fast do they breed?

fedd2329fd238a810bd0d097b5946142.text: M-More Vek are t-tunneling to the surface!

8737e9f1463cfebc498b5792456d786e.text: Seismic readings indicate Vek activity approaching our coordinates.

552a51212b9b1019cbe251d03608fae3.text: Vek are making their way to the surface.

616bf7b3ea2fa8c15f09e4ae423027a9.text: Vek are about to emerge. They will likely be hostile and try to kill us.

68933c08d84e9c211c63710b19351acc.text: Seismic readings are picking up more Vek surfacing near your location!

077e99dafb62b6c14be6a197344eee6c.text: Seismic readings are spiking. More Vek will be here soon.

0b11d3ad3c2d0c87e5f795e351e27b4f.text: The Vek are tunneling to your location. They will be arriving shortly.

b9f0c53fbb8536119a213bb96e5795c4.text: #squad... we've detected multiple potential Vek emergence points. Be prepared.

de749fe7c3deb117e6b4bd6c9be7b57c.text: Got a visual on the emerging Vek.

730d7b9a4662d5c164edc301caab370f.text: Let's stomp that Vek back to where it came from.

4a9f764355826309c9b519df3a912b9f.text: Vek's popped up just in time to be put down.

c31c5a7f04b6f9dd0afd5a92e38d049a.text: [ A Vek has surfaced. Locking on with sensors ]

b55b417b5afe406cd32831c674565b02.text: [ Sensors have locked on to surfacing Vek ]

211d6c464aa7913e0f551f2477ab894a.text: Vek has surfaced. Follow combat protocols.

e2bd0a47296a38bbaaa1360661117ba0.text: We got Vek on the field!

36439e51f42311527e76f35b32e77b98.text: The Vek has come to die in the light of the sun.

fe52af6da884b83361691ea4b040cb78.text: The Vek are certainly wasting no time swarming our position...

0c9031578215a14f933ef915aad5d167.text: The Vek are responding quickly to our presence...

13af940546e511dcab1be81f4b1522a9.text: I shall use all parts of these Vek in refertilizing the region.

96480970a18025a8ed89465eec9dc849.text: These Vek are ripe for harvest.

7b35353a23df1cac741c3a939c4aeab2.text: These Vek are ready to be recycled.

3d20b442fb01e190377064835b119c80.text: More Vek have surfaced - let's give them a proper welcome.

f38e028edc7be81d373258e77910751d.text: Got new Vek on the surface.

9c01f1b99dcf2f0a572255dd19c369d0.text: Got more Vek threatening the Grid!

5c6da2836b63b7040414375d0b6fa1be.text: Let's put these Vek back in the ground.

a610864b59496212b956df26d30d37c9.text: Let's send these Vek back where they came from.

98353b7a8bb4595917e87883967204bf.text: Vek hazards have reached the surface.

78be48c122720b353f7702c3eae95765.text: Attention, Vek: You are not authorized to be in this zone.

7ed3306fbdd31790f7a8a752918d1ed7.text: Vek detected on surface. Damage to island infrastructure negligible.

09238f12157ceec88bd302efdf5f099b.text: The Vek have reached the surface.

4a6c79328848dd329069ff6009af575a.text: The Vek have reached topside. They'll be more trouble now.

83f314c14cabc0cfa2d2192beaf56fa7.text: Vek have appeared. Tracking them for potential threats.

bcdb137cbd9faeec7d0a80b1391962fd.text: Vek have reached the surface. Be careful, #squad.

ee66336268a5c912f5e5afc4d505e02b.text: How does that feel, you burrowing S.O.B.?

25e1361d0d19a3f1a2e6fe98443c22bc.text: This little bastard isn't going anywhere.

9f3314d66366d0af3bc391423677c4e5.text: [ A Vek is attempting to surface beneath this unit's Mech ]

3aeafdde9da2a90bcf9010279172332b.text: Not sure how long I can hold this Vek, commander.

b87f5df9116c2e04c55d5127f2d5ded4.text: Keeping a lid on this Vek!

b1718cf2b6e0216aaa8371945776455d.text: I... I got this Vek pinned!

9fb78d4127f9d37d884f9715b703b1e4.text: Nice to pin one of the Vek for once!

7f8dae825786d271a17b376bf7e86572.text: This way is closed to you, creature.

493ad6d6b087e210adfeae144a276368.text: I guard this bridge, Vek, and you shall not get by.

ff15fc65062570fb1eb60196435fbc56.text: This Vek doesn't have the strength to move me, but it's not giving up!

7e18554acb91facc01359df0b1d478e4.text: With a little help from my good friend gravity, this Vek's not going anywhere!

13e6a9e9a59988919f36b2228c85f799.text: This Vek will remain planted in the soil.

493ca39f93d29b876722299a2ccb5e30.text: This Vek will remain in the soil until ready to be harvested.

263b4246e6a04ac463088a1b19827c19.text: This Vek shall remain in the earth until we are ready to dispose of it.

973f1b1eecc479c78ce6eca41e41bb4e.text: Ha! Just TRY and move me, ugly!

44c405212d670a1cd18e129868ecb0cf.text: Let's see you try and surface now, Vek.

b08eecca0851547e91c69b907fb4609f.text: Not my first rodeo, Vek - you're not bucking me.

f7d309ed1258fca8ece3b060d70bf183.text: No surfacing for you today, Vek.

898d2e1f777ca0b19877a8ea2d72be9c.text: I'm on... top... of the situation.

5310af725bf75bc04d8a8186d5d3384e.text: Hazardous Vek material has been blocked from surfacing.

67cb93f8c4d44586c7a33a7eb2eae17f.text: I-I can't hold this Vek for long!

3dbbf7fbcf70f57a5b34eaa9e018f6e7.text: This Vek is not cleared for surfacing.

1aa0b9c017edb8fd3f1234c1209918eb.text: Blocking the Vek in such a manner is rather embarrassing.

0af5f9eb54140bee418ab645c09ee52a.text: Squatting on emerging Vek was not what I was programmed for.

f169bff6d2ce667f7764a9ed07dc59d6.text: Surely we can find a better way to block these creatures than with our Mechs.

a4bc07dbbd3f2f329f2082c4d9292553.text: Update: Vek pathing blocked by Vek

f206aee916a96fed0d0fc8c30eae8e77.text: How about that - they're doing our job for us.

e0c38e49d03dce4253133e60652c7dd7.text: [ A Vek has been prevented from surfacing by another Vek ]

e0a8f96aa41c8285081664260e020b18.text: They can't stop themselves from emerging... even when one of their own is above them.

22718608565c753825962869e3ad911f.text: Nice to see the Vek blocking each other for once.

92c91e9cea6ec20811caf31fa6132b95.text: That one's trying to force its way out.

157395047756c1b89fd876befb58764c.text: We will use your numbers against you.

25f133af0451542e7c756fa597b70833.text: Apparently, the lives of their own are no consequence to the Vek.

f6ffdcd22c843ff240594b42cfb60b48.text: Vek is attempting to burrow through their own.

d491f5c17727a75794069dbdb4213eb9.text: Finally, a useful Vek! It blocked the other one from emerging!

e70c421d7b9a88a1237c679363edf67b.text: Vek are blocking others from emerging.

78ce7eff904ccd40ffa69682e99794f8.text: Looks like a little Vek on Vek action there.

e5ae5dd934fdbeaded4b977f3c172aba.text: Nothing like two Vek butting heads.

6a0432f413809a6111c8b0021ac80471.text: Let the Vek bastards get in each other's way trying to play catch up with us!

d11b4097efb228eae5f3b7e2b95fc004.text: That Vek's blocking the other one!

cdfeb77661fcd0154ae97412a25b6e04.text: Hazardous material is conflicting with other Vek hazardous material.

33d83485a10fc4c737ece1819f22faaa.text: Vek hazard has blocked another Vek hazard.

6edd71f0730d570c9394170d336b9bd6.text: The Vek d-d-don't seem to coordinate their actions.

421da522a78c83bccb3fd2a9954b5549.text: The Vek r-r-reflexes don't s-s-seem to adapt to field conditions.

e23fdae0e1782c491e817403f010d9b9.text: The V-V-Vek seem to work at cross-purposes to each other.

e3766269f1e6c7a05d731616a142f867.text: Good to see the Vek are making themselves useful.

0b99d3c12b178b5783eaa5a10b63ecde.text: Good to see the Vek pitching in.

b9e57cc1c7d7b7397822a6ed28470582.text: That Vek blocked the other one from surfacing!

b65de03d6016fcea2d7320f86c91952a.text: That Vek has blocked the other. Stupid creatures.

40e7cdbf8939c2f7289677ac92761596.text: The Vek are an effective hindrance against their own kind.

dab4c4ed492291b31ac14dcfda43e3ab.text: That Vek prevented the other one from reaching the surface. Curious.

6ed4dcf54d45c572a1bfdd0fab778f59.text: My Mech's been shredded - another hit, I'm a goner.

d3d79c468258aca44c85db86ffdd2ea6.text: I've taken heavy damage, commander, but I'm still in the fight.

83e02da2fe579cc09d14ef0b396c5be0.text: [ This unit has been compromised. System failure imminent ]

20785b78cf38e7c1425a96db07ec68e5.text: [ This unit has sustained critical damage. ]

1856f4b769be3117529dc112a66711a7.text: [ This unit is in need of repair. ]

71793776901d07dae6712f739d50e6c8.text: Damage readouts are in the red!

66f35803ec5ccaa1e9e92d08683493ce.text: My Mech can't take much more of this!

9d92d2e6172bb0b9579b93d45479a1dc.text: Another hit like that, and my Mech will be destroyed.

29dbba6eb8889b6d98942f658e236266.text: I am still combat-worthy, but barely.

096390eb92f602f103850f05b7c826af.text: The recycling of my Mech is imminent.

c42a8d90c6865608976740507edc74e1.text: I am about to enter hibernation mode.

ef1a53d286c3d14aa175958ef968cd41.text: I may soon need to abdicate my gardening responsibilities.

9996f1af814a19d920cdedcbbf4e5a1a.text: Come on, come ON! Don't break now!

5d007bb64ab1bc22f79684cfc75bdb7f.text: Hang in there, little #self_mech, I'll fix you all up when we get back to the Carrier...

722063e2b0ccbc95b1fbfa130572e28e.text: Need to repair fast. Or a shield.

5d02adda73e299dc6d26640e5122d8e3.text: Might not walk away from this fight...

e047837e0aa75b32a956242bb7c7e632.text: Nfff! Don't count me out yet!

deffb7ce15fe7d4fc804d0a2c1a792f4.text: Another hit, I'm out of the fight!

92cabbdec8f8b6760ba97c200d68f75c.text: Reporting drops in (1) outer hull integrity, (2) networked systems, and (3) this unit's probabilities for survival.

972dc974bebb82e45bbf6342cee45d90.text: Surviving components are reporting severe damage to Mech systems.

b172af282e2b5bfe093d0fb03af6d6b3.text: C-C-Can't take m-m-much more of this!

f91804fb4807a3ad71b8128e6beb37c6.text: My Mech wasn't d-d-designed to take this much damage!

21637d49ddf8a6a00f4348c49d37e2f5.text: My Mech is about to fail in its primary duty to protect me.

b3d92c2cafdf781d69e27355fdf1bfa9.text: My Mech is in rather drastic need of repairs.

d1f7d17d5d3bc7c35a78fc4567e1c9e2.text: My outer shell... er, Mech... is in urgent need of repair.

e2f81fa7e995bef30ef7e1999db56586.text: It's got me locked, commander! Trying to break free!

721b3040f5312d7e38b5ab37724a6234.text: [ Vek excretions are preventing unit mobility ]

c24e03d90684a36dbf4c6fdf53f394e6.text: Whatever that Vek's spraying, it's locked the servos.

dc39219b1fc442d8e0d31f6cdc81826a.text: I'm caught in its webs - I can't pull away!

c414e142878a242062b43482464f0b26.text: You haven't caught me, Vek. I've caught you.

215968c57d24cbe1b470508abcfccf15.text: Do you think your web can hold me?

69ef7681bfa8f4c19a66c3beea6fc342.text: Caught in its web! Servos unresponsive!

b83f75ead6f5ec220899ab3676e74376.text: This adhesive's tensile strength is incredible - I can't pull away!

2fbe4de9d30b1beec4af0b421874b171.text: I really must find a way to shield the engines from this gunk...

c0c03ee84644d2e47a3bba26b8653a57.text: This Vek has formed a cocoon around me.

be934c85d17934d3d89282b560f16f6a.text: This Vek has cocooned me in a manner that is neither protective nor safe.

284fd425403ae9b91903f26cc19baf08.text: The Vek has sprayed me with a biological adhesive in order to feed on me.

3d82107d470e1a8a179a83192c771d1d.text: Get this web off of me!

f059cacc3f3a05f3c66cdf6040fe2515.text: This Vek's stickyfying me with its webs!

1cf1cd987ec8bae622f7cafe46e10027.text: I'll be scraping these webs off the hull for a week!

9ab4d3e10729cd8496a9ab526b50fa5e.text: Vek's caught me in its web!

5c752fdb7f37f64abd87c3f83d7e2d93.text: This Vek's so scared it webbed itself... and uh, me.

5deac3301ad519452adc484211c29b72.text: Think this web's going to stop me?!

da9c679aebd35000022234d2ca612bef.text: Webbed already? At least buy a man dinner first.

a0ae8922087dfe75095978f54545578e.text: Oh, you want to dance? Bring it!

f60a75df8f6ff9283a0949eb00102b05.text: This Vek's web is a little too clingy for my liking.

a6a7f1b59906ea04c506114819705659.text: That web won't stop me, you son of a bitch.

480011faae0492d7cd59b549cf823b7f.text: Think that web would stop me, Vek? Think again.

7d6f4538d42f4e60c709895366af8aad.text: Evasive maneuvers complete. Vek web went high and wide.

902f9ca03afc03bd727ad164d32670bc.text: This Vek webbing won't stop me. I'm clear!

66d7a6ee04c3ba27b5153ac300de0850.text: Evaded the Vek's web! Free and clear!

df44383f40f97b0ca197552e5cc299a1.text: Vek tried to web me, but I saw it coming a mile away.

8b17747d8177807f7184919ab700199f.text: #self_mech restrained by hostile Vek. Movement impossible.

4032049b33fedcadd57079f97e68e1ac.text: Hostile Vek. Release me at once or suffer the consequences.

5923ece09a37694f87e4b1a98cb354b3.text: It's g-got me! My Mech c-c-can't break free!

91b1d30713e639834bc7f6257effd55b.text: Vek! You are accosting a designated Pinnacle HR officer. Unhand me!

8817c619c7d6aa6cfc35e846d14894ab.text: Remove your webs at once, Vek, or I shall be forced to respond!

f52d32cf87b34a545c2e2df662269404.text: This Vek is secreting its substances on my person.

6f73eb33e253394793b26c07becf5974.text: Shield up. Let's put it to use.

74b56db4e57cf7a91c7a498b0be16f4b.text: A little extra safety never hurt...

d02fbac8868e8d1b91b9fe11fe213654.text: I'll use my shield to run interference.

644c7a97ee251dd1e8fea519f0d2ba92.text: Shield active. It'll absorb one blow at least.

ccad10acf7f559418dae7ebfe256781b.text: Save the shield for the weak.

10585dcc446b2964dd9440b3ee557ae0.text: Better off giving this shield to the civilians.

ca06e44fff70a6d84e0d5ec8efb7f561.text: These shields require millions of calculations a second to maintain cohesion.

5cc7a9375adcfefa8142698de2a164db.text: This shield is an effective kinetic dampener - for offense or defense.

4f484923739d3a3596a51c5c85ff623f.text: Being confined by a shield interferes with obtaining seed samples.

b9bc97ed1151642c159756a655069b7a.text: This shield will protect me from contaminating this habitat.

420f95da47c609fe43151fc80ade94d1.text: I prefer this cocoon to those made by Vek webs.

ed33cd601c5ced94aa6e5ee5382f8da5.text: Ooo. This shield really brightens things up!

6ddd883d851d2da340eee722612402bb.text: This shield makes me feel like I'm in a giant soap bubble.

cf9280509ed268c710638fe193b8531e.text: Shield up! Time to do some damage.

58db9c376e7faf5e6bf757274dd67d20.text: Shield should p-p-protect me... for now.

48ce2425d22fc375e4ebf919f7a0892f.text: H-H-Hope I don't need this shield, but I welcome it n-nonetheless.

bb4dd08e232d4bea6fca069f2415a2cd.text: W-W-Wish we could establish a shield over every b-b-building on the island.

5ea9070542aa6c9171820850cbaba601.text: I am pleased to report that I am currently shielded.

ae5b2cfda2a70e5ce183312c4e435b45.text: Being shielded does not mean I plan on taking any unnecessary risks.

1296b0404811916b4f48d5abdeee2643.text: Nothing a little grease and spit won't fix...

6c84ec656d8f8f5121c91415c5a17a10.text: Repairs done. That should keep the engine light off for now.

7e3d82def36dd895e1946dfb05c897c5.text: [ Diverting parts from self to damaged Mech ]

a537167d6c455397f15f0739eb359fc0.text: Managed to patch some of the hull...

0f99184846644de5f6fc406758a3a8b8.text: Readouts have stopped flashing red... for now.

00ddf86001a09c6feadcba2b32a5c4ca.text: That'll hold until we're back at the base.

382e1ebf32ca37960e27ee93c0c7f950.text: Just the kick this thing needed...

d1c02bed65754b79cf1d990ae6cff8f8.text: Hopefully this machine won't fall apart now...

1be1796fc8983008a929ff2ff8e2e173.text: I don't have time for this.

46b902296d0a819b9afffeca3e1d4bdb.text: Everyone, back away! I need space to work!

e33616c8d52a175ff5829941a620c32c.text: Hate doing repairs when I'm rushed...!

d08aab2eb75f6fd88d1ecc3a3c20eb0c.text: Could I get a little space to do my work please?

dec756da29b46d59a4a3aab309fc93ff.text: I have given my Mech what nourishment I can.

6877e2120626b95878c48de2fa965c4e.text: Extinguished components uprooted. Mech reseeded with new parts.

e61e853c20168f19eb617a14b78dca08.text: As my Mech tends to me, I tend to my Mech.

c7ebb087765b80cea036531e1c6ad349.text: Me and my little #self_mech are ready!

e1b5cd94d65370aac9c99ddbf3046ce2.text: Nothing a little elbow grease can't fix!

fce2b38824560d8c34dd82eaa1c8dced.text: I'm not an Auto-Repair Bay, but I make do.

4cfbaf6a459d529794ffdd9786a4a01b.text: Have to apologize to the repair crew when I get back for these quick fixes...

05c72e9831a6db1756888e737e6f41f6.text: Why can't this thing fix itself...

ca5987441d93d5e1e60dfbcee9c4f6fe.text: We need field mechanics, I can't be doing all this myself!

13bf1b7d612c333f83c530566f4e9fd4.text: This isn't my job, but it's done, okay?!

e00271676a0d69ebce7354be5c0b8326.text: Repaired and still in the fight!

f799bbc3c869f8478ff48c6960405bf4.text: It's a quick fix, but it'll have to do.

aef2b4dd56717382f33ba88929b6d8d5.text: Components unfit for battle have been discharged and replaced with fresh recruits.

b0978464fe2b1e4313d098870d68b2c8.text: I have isolated the malfunctioning components and executed them.

da7de5913ecfffc61906260b2df35f15.text: I have isolated the malfunctioning components and made examples of them.

3ad8e820cee0b48e16b7aad2191d1b76.text: This Mech's systems were difficult to figure out... b-but it's fixed.

dd8ad83b7d0635fb292ad36a22739678.text: These repairs should b-b-buy my Mech some time.

b89c8c5db3ba56a0a05c943adb67b4b1.text: A filthy job, but done superbly.

090e35b514b158587a043fdf22461a11.text: Field repairs really are more a job for a robot intelligence.

77657869ea657059b89c02be67c289d6.text: Repairs are first-gen work, unbecoming of my capabilities.

a234760aa04211465df043571cf962f6.text: Pilot levels up (not necessarily max rank)

79f3aafca8004ec0128da83f6cfbf976.text: I can't believe how much combat duty I'm putting in.

4b2d54fb5db1b1c903bd6cd4d8249d27.text: Not always sure what I'm doing, but I guess I'm doing it more efficiently?

7e102051cba2b5a5ad68588dcc695155.text: They better not start saluting me.

b18b9594dc5664001ceaf64c6b26e416.text: I'm receiving a commendation from Detritus on my performance.

a7e0cade29b4d195a1bed31cec574299.text: A promotion? Looks like my anti-Vek efforts have paid off.

7030076f2b6882896fd4beb2b3ff005d.text: I feel like I'm getting my second wind.

1ed3801b2b58e64588d642b8c1a4973c.text: My training's coming back to me.

5bc5b46ef62aa05bd96124d71f9c2fcb.text: If the Vek think they're wearing me down, they've got another thing coming.

39e2ba31a0d1314324cf8750e9c2c785.text: A promotion? Is that like a doctorate?

fdc95b1f75642271f768c76933c72703.text: This adrenaline is really giving me great ideas for new tech.

4426a7a0495b3fa13e38720d04a8dded.text: I have optimized my Vekticide routines.

d98ee55d7b22226e7d09a95ede3d9160.text: New Vekticide protocols have finished compiling.

242988f99719b8c18a1810de231299ea.text: Wow, a promotion? I don't think I could have learned all this in sim-training...

5f19233b182b4f8ee8a2fa8510bc5ac9.text: A promotion? Me? Wow, this real-world training is paying off!

b96becdef7294a6b3861697f0b789d56.text: Save the medals for someone else.

83db4b644eb6439b0ac6083db550b769.text: Others deserve commendation more than me.

aa9bbdbbe509fd85929bbcce7a20ebb4.text: About time I got a promotion! I've been doing all the work!

dce2a73863737da2086d96d0a990ad39.text: A promotion? My foster mother would be proud.

18a6b81d0414960f804ed70815ff1ca1.text: A promotion - wish my foster mother had survived to see this.

7e8a9f17fb4d6c3eab74370fcd6cb296.text: Due to their bravery in the field of battle, I have promoted several of my components.

374c3d686972733cf8222dc6666ea3b8.text: Due to their valiant efforts, I am upgrading several parts to full systems.

8fb0637832b612213ab8a33a00e06a37.text: ...D-D-Does this p-p-promotion mean m-m-more combat missions?

4ff032c1afd15091f54524bd4100d627.text: A p-p-promotion? But... I d-d-don't want to get better at killing Vek.

b4829256d2805eef023b8c4f682a333b.text: #self_full promotion logged. New managerial protocols downloading now.

3e47e32499205888a35b534fc0c9a13e.text: My new tactical algorithms have successfully compiled. I am now more superior than before!

8629995bf66fa42b7bfdb246e4a43d8e.text: My self-defense software has been upgraded. I am now more superior than before!

b2479e36fcbd9af097a8ef9ac4797213.text: Pilot is observed to level up

66b3a9adc4ad2834348132927415da85.text: <Whistles> Nice! #main_first, you're getting good at this!

a2e9524c3aaecc37adcffc3d75263e02.text: Good for you, #main_second, you earned it.

a7d4756246452edad62d18f681bb1f8c.text: [ Tactical efficiency of Pilot #main_second has been upgraded ]

90b33db4064cb4645dab2a6d34100558.text: [ Pilot #main_second's tactical efficiency has been upgraded ]

31850c65154f0e3155ab94d101904fac.text: We may have a job for you at Detritus, #main_first.

c15963120672f048658ba28f12409d27.text: Looks like #main_second's learned a thing or two.

b258d866d9be83af3f4501acca956010.text: Congratulations on the promotion, #main_first, you deserve it!

ecfab36eda87626c480b445069809df3.text: Well done, Pilot #main_second! There's the benefit of hard work and staying focused!

0bcdbdbe76e6e6757b4ce5415c923b34.text: #main_full has been optimized. Updating Vekticide routines.

9fd8b9ea4be225589db9b6e109de5cde.text: Easy there, #main_second, your promotion thing? It's not a competition.

254500ee36abf1159e133b360e2982fd.text: That promotion means added responsibility. Be sure to share what you've learned with others.

4826c0e89a8d9f56ed1df8f185c250fb.text: You're getting skilled with your Mech, Pilot #main_second - well done.

c5b9c66d88b9d62a7369ea55cb1678c2.text: Congratulations - you've earned that promotion, soldier.

56a6ab8bf65dddda4d99f16a1c26bf3a.text: #main_mech's pilot has achieved synergy with its partner.

1cedeffddcd0e365b5808d0927edd0e1.text: #main_mech's training of its pilot has succeeded.

6a0f0a4382444bd320bd15055c209133.text: You've d-d-definitely improved since the w-war began.

f80bba4c9b7c8ae57decc156e5a24b4e.text: Why, it seems your new tactical algorithms have finally compiled, Pilot #main_second.

19f8901c627270a772977c12a31fd505.text: You've shown exceptional skill, Pilot #main_second! Let me be the first to congratulate you on your promotion!

acea3922cf0d2853bbf0542ad7031066.text: You've proven yourself in the field, #main_full. But to prove yourself to me, you'll have to save R.S.T. first.

d8a99917161a889a6d2668a0e466d627.text: Humans gain knowledge slower than machines, but it is worthy of celebration when you do!

0780510a206b989d5178da8c02f23ca7.text: Commendation is in order, Pilot #main_second. If anyone deserves that promotion, it's you.

97e1272ccd680c054d01ba28dfea4a38.text: Your performance has been exemplary, Pilot #main_second. If we had another dozen like you, this war would be over.

65a7b01e5c60395e75f3ec76472d7582.text: Well, that did it - next hit's the hull.

805ddd4c7f501ae3f9bbe525a5eac241.text: Shield's down - time to get serious.

5cf0f36d7b49e49c93dedd957cb597ce.text: I need to find a way to make these shields more resilient...

e6fed32f6629163a94db08ef60fdfadc.text: If only there was a way to maintain shield cohesion...

ebca8f60155f23203edb8280cb39c994.text: My shield has cycled back into dispersed energy.

9153f7086775b82d6a07fb7ee384b649.text: Shield has dispersed. Like sparks. In a storm.

6063f3630a1318d8716ad0261c1ac847.text: Violence has shattered the tranquility of my shield.

ed8cc1a560b3c6451d71d1ef70554d29.text: No more shield? Aww, I liked everything tinted blue!

f01430a085a5ee2f1f41ef10146acdc3.text: Shield down - and the kid gloves are off.

0f5de35ac15f26aabef5f8f14e12262b.text: Figured the shield would fail eventually...

2d43f118914744c54118af7579840be1.text: I wasn't counting on that shield anyway...

d9337d392400e8077c36adc24b887baf.text: Shield was just getting in the way...

ec3c8f3decd5136ad7281b94f95a56ff.text: I'm fine! Shield took the hit!

6b55b796493c8671594698f816ae851c.text: My shield has failed. Its systems will be disciplined.

229e28723eabe636e9fa770aaea1b616.text: My shield has fallen in battle. It shall be mourned.

02860eb760d25f14b5dd9760024f6d79.text: My shield has sacrificed itself for me.

4ad000cf7b19683bbb80f639af063a89.text: Shield, your bravery will not be forgotten.

fc8a9c41f20ba8a200f7be6757724b6e.text: I regret to inform you all that my shield has been compromised.

1ec94abe6d24f123d1c82d400eeb03c1.text:
Damage commentary comes in three flavors:

"SELF" : The Mech did themselves

"OBS" : The Mech (or CEO) observed another Mech do it

"VEK" : A Vek did it, and a CEO or Mech is commenting on that

a6d5766f7df4e2fee99525bf48100258.text: Update: Vek submerged\nSecondary Update: Vek life signs have ceased

fbec6f3b039f47e462d02626dccd0014.text: Say hello to Old Earth on the ocean floor for us.

50bdab1c9d17c58edf29e53d51464d8b.text: Guess water and Vek don't mix.

00e8ef0fed8c4c66bd4e8d9262ff4b7b.text: That's one way to wash the Vek away.

5486ea851a33afd04e7daef126cdeb3e.text: That water'll clog its lungs in no time.

1fc8c64693d98a089996b3df046d99ce.text: Teach it to attack a water-dominated planet...

c232c8cb9793b623d9b7c42c4b49ce18.text: They aren't amphibious... water is deadly to them.

04036077cfc80701369ee0abd14dfc58.text: Not a pretty way to go, but...

2b61ce02880ac3fd72253fa6720d48bf.text: It went the way of Old Earth.

77b426fd08b15444a90841f975840973.text: The Vek seem ill-adapted for water.

c0b58b4e04fee0931d5b92babece47e1.text: That Vek won't survive its new aquatic environment.

69dc606f6d7b210e056a3591a4e88828.text: That Vek's nutrients shall nourish the water.

0bfc43db61fa194b4ba68e69c7ed572d.text: Vek has failed to adapt to new environmental conditions.

c0da4599e4a4f38c36d5e91041a28969.text: Guess Vek forgot the 'swim' part of 'sink or swim.'

eca4c0eadf4128900d0a218802149610.text: That Vek's got a great future as an anchor.

d2b6110ee23115039883b594a220a565.text: Water kills the Vek faster than missiles.

0d5fa6f429913f1323903950e70578a3.text: Like that! Drive the other Vek into the water if you can!

365e0f20c2cdecd55372518293445434.text: The Vek are drowning themselves to keep me from killing them.

e38e8dc9c09b7f3437059fee93ff1100.text: I'm going to send a few more Vek after it.

95dc7e9a867843300b89335ebb576979.text: Say hello to Davey Jones for me, Vek.

1c38d49d3e0d7fbbb4181b7d3161b12f.text: Well done, let water do the work if you can.

7311bb804ae9fb363f5dac1c3689d5dc.text: Drowning works for ground Vek, but watch out for any fliers.

a23c686f13161a572fb0c84b8e143fbf.text: Vek has been removed from work zone.

a3a1a09471b62561acf3f644ddfbea52.text: Hazardous Vek material has been washed away.

e2e2d597088b87e5d164ca714595c2d8.text: Attention, Vek: Flood warning is in effect.

7034b606f4f77b538985dbe97b30eec5.text: The Vek is dropping off m-m-my radar.

77eaf59b1cad6ea558fd22adb61ff27a.text: The Vek's in the water... and f-f-falling fast.

0f4e27ab5da5d7865f6a5703bf84a97a.text: The odds of that Vek resurfacing are 0%.

ffe2cae5283f24e1960ae29092a0b30e.text: The Vek's decision to spawn on a water-rich planet is rather peculiar.

ae303177c09caaed131c15617bd1eae1.text: The water should flood the Vek's trachae, inducing anoxia, and it will slowly perish as it sinks.

e346c33436050e6865422c9a33e77e72.text: Drowning the Vek should keep unnecessary Vek residue from staining the battlefield.

dc1deed5e94361208e33c372e154a5d8.text: The Vek goes to join Old Earth in the depths.

ad2953ac3bbd6d284762756739039645.text: The Vek joins Old Earth in its grave.

fa3f7c7cc252fdfe128bb7eb78148621.text: May the aquatic life feed on that Vek's corpse.

132c8f3e2fe335f1a172490e760fb084.text: My data regarding the Vek and water is limited. The result appears positive.

240aeadec68fb3c8b66734ecfbd5836a.text: That's one way to dispose of the Vek.

3cc88e24723c50ae2239d92a820144fd.text: Vek falls down a hole (from anyone / any cause)

399c2a0f6483ad4fa4c2cccb20a3214f.text: Update: Vek falling at terminal velocity

bf297df8fbf5e8b295b21fe1edc24806.text: That Vek's not coming back from that.

3abd63a9ab041c14cb5b3f8cd10d3ea3.text: Let gravity do the work, I say.

ed9cb0282425ff7c54aa7d8e8041ac69.text: Hope it hits another Vek on the way down.

64e834f938a3274a2021b88db6fd9a7a.text: One Vek... fell... off radar, commander.

de9f725efb560a08997bcae65d0d9c7e.text: We'll close that hole later, let the Vek rot down there.

80c89c62bffd5df21b1b5a966bbf17e7.text: It's not coming back from that.

ac440f0058786144ab2cd3898248d5f3.text: That's one way to do it...

2c0e33d040a0fc993ccf3a0e90d7010b.text: More merciful than the end I intended for it.

a6e958967023f12f74939bfb8293bf60.text: As the Vek arise, so shall they fall.

0299295b2812aa569da70b8bb0882947.text: And so shall the Earth you seek to conquer consume you.

adc405f7de7cd255175a9dc0c0fb244e.text: I doubt that Vek's carapace will shield it from the fall.

50e0c06cc55aec917c5e50ecba0fd1fd.text: That Vek's nutrients shall nourish the land.

0da8788bdd61a0cd11fa6acde6e6bcb0.text: Did you all see that? That Vek fell like a stone!

16341b6c01c01fe43d8645ead4f5cc63.text: I hope that Vek lands hard.

68c483c9454a5fe48bff14be7970bf36.text: Don't think that Vek can fly...

61de376eb22f4150ae6ca925e70fab16.text: Spares me the trouble of killing it...

3d5854db132ae5338c53384f78b39a17.text: Damn! Wanted to kill that Vek myself!

f56228d7707258e473d0f395fa0943ff.text: Vek has removed itself from work zone.

325dbc8482e2af17b2034b41c3c64e9f.text: Vek has experienced the unsafe conditions inherent in the work site.

9d676460729f7bef4c71a1e14eda31a2.text: Vek has become part of island foundation.

41237f9858b1acff0f72e186a66c4516.text: It... it's a l-long w-way down.

9a7f0c37959fbaeadfb8eb89646746db.text: The Vek's odds of surviving that fall are 0%.

09076dee126e24eb5ba20823e9d21bf7.text: The Vek's odds of re-emerging are 0%.

3575e9870a9f00d1142e08983d77607e.text: My sensors confirm the Vek's terminal impact with bottom of fissure.

6b6ae1b5d3c7acd167f070d6f7f6c3d5.text: Burying the Vek should keep unnecessary Vek residue from staining the battlefield.

6259306cc1a61221cef260fa853bd861.text: Look at that Vek fall! I think I just heard a cheer from operations!

1a86d96097a94265a585b560a3e5df9f.text: We'll send a team to dig the Vek out later to make sure it's dead.

a095355f5ed1147669cf1dea4fd61bee.text: That Vek is no longer a threat.

ee8a60ae77a4b634ce88aec50c9ee987.text: Sensors have registered the Vek died on impact.

018f724560b177664ae398d79e5878a9.text: It'll die in the A.C.I.D. pools beneath the island.

4e16026231ece9ef9395f4c66fc4fb28.text: We may need to send some waste crews to clear out that Vek blockage later.

a4f7f9d6a9bd4d26fe35f6d4479df6d3.text: Vek is put in smoke (from anyone / any cause)

2ffd900d205426fed622dc715823b883.text: Update: Airborne particles have slowed Vek reflexes

64734e2f9f124fa106f91a2a409b0c44.text: Update: Airborne particles have halted Vek attack

665b0939d06a7f9acbcee64e3e3179b3.text: I hope that Vek chokes on the dust.

99cb569b95242225ecedc20db9b4b45c.text: [ The particles are interfering with the Vek sensors ]

bc7425e8bf5f9f54b72dfec4301defe8.text: The particles are disorienting the Vek.

9b4598b73a10439a513894aee887d8ab.text: That'll scramble its head for a bit.

0e03af03a55b4da282a20ddf8708824c.text: Hope it chokes on that cloud.

078ce76783b84b58041810594961ab39.text: Looks like the Vek don't like the smoke much...

3b2b5fa90926df970308324dd89bb267.text: It is not used to fighting blind. Let us take advantage of this.

bd7608cf07593bae9194fd305153d8ed.text: The Vek is exhibiting symptoms of disorientation.

fc406a6b240907d65b19950229e4ad2e.text: The Vek can't seem to focus in the smoke - interesting.

9304a2e48fdc3128a944bc777f2b8db5.text: The smoke is acting as a Vek repellent.

3bad3700e21db9243cfa4c905fbd3707.text: Adding smoke dispersal to Vekticide routines.

c55ea18f3199c82f1c58df0dde9b4685.text: Particle dispersal interferes with Vek receptors.

549bc9848ba0c09ba8d67ec0fc4a5b63.text: The smoke is acting as a deterrent to the Vek's aggression.

45502ed7531eed46788d74b078929080.text: Hope the smoke makes that Vek's eyes water...

033872198ddf1ad34f7a5ef0eb642924.text: Looks like that Vek's lost its bearings in the smoke.

ceaf664eea470614778c896cfc537125.text: Smoke can't stop me, but it can stop Vek.

d0d862abb996f3e094fd6a47dbeff5c2.text: Have to be R.S.T.-trained like I am to fight in storms, Vek.

094735a852eaf9365813470b940664fd.text: The Vek can't maneuver in the smoke like my Mech can.

07b935698c369bea68c4a486a985d101.text: Vek's lack of safety goggles has disoriented it.

e303fd3d0c68bd584f8e02cffff3239c.text: The cloud s-s-seems to be d-d-disorienting the Vek...

5bfff7da1083ed19ee826932d81af6d2.text: The c-cloud is, uh... clouding... er, c-c-confusing... the Vek's senses...

6d0a751dedde2c317fe1b6de611be9a7.text: Vek encased in cloud of particles.

9cc6036eabb1c3f487306ccece5ff75f.text: I believe the smoke is interfering with the Vek's olfactory receptors.

79a47ee4f5b5bdf4982ff3b888758da6.text: The Vek actively avoid smoke... much like our own pilots.

1dfceb375aa4a3427a4befe78a43e1c5.text: The smoke disorients the Vek, makes them easy targets.

aea7df16c2bd20243b56030afe386b00.text: The dense smoke will neutralize that Vek for now.

b00c389da38568a8c9f5e701196e4f9e.text: The smoke seems to confuse them... perhaps we can make more use of that?

5619cdad47fe045bb5aedeacffa756c5.text: Vek is frozen (from any cause except Snow Storm and Freeze Mine)

e8614a0aec5c9558d3f214fa3f0901d4.text: Frozen... but the Vek's still alive in there.

b0d0fa3ba8f278267bf1f85f6eebfe7b.text: Commander, Vek's frozen, but still alive.

9b7e54129bd62ab017dc28f0e291598c.text: We're about to lose the Grid!

a2199664b2952ea851d6e950a1da9020.text: Grid's in the red! But we can save it, I know we can!

4844d04470f77cdde38f8779d9f7ce29.text: Grid's about to fall! We need to protect the buildings!

e789b591e273ae861e4fc855356dc23e.text: Our resolve is strong. The Grid is not.

ae5c85023091eb05fec760739530779d.text: The Grid is about to fail. Shall we die with it?

1a2165a23da17d88b5fa26914b89aea0.text: The Grid is bleeding out. We must protect it.

e1a4151f7e18aae4c635668fa18bab90.text: We're losing the Grid! Another hit...

53228de0d0e740c29a09a041363bb095.text: Our Mechs are powered by the Grid! It needs to remain intact!

bb5af115ef11166d4c6e6469737a7022.text: The Grid is losing its ability to nourish us.

c580e478b2cf111e9995c312b09f5098.text: These battlefield conditions are damaging the Grid.

615391337810fbf1c0291ac9e0443025.text: The Grid is unused to these battlefield conditions.

22a656eb4b2ec7c27e00c08433780784.text: Bad news, #squad - Grid's in the red!

d92a435df39992576ac46b0a3cf273d4.text: Another hit, and the Grid's toast!
