fc210d556ff284c683841bdab9204c80.text: Protect the Grid or we're done for!

b1482519b790b2245f9ecc34c1f6b0d4.text: Uh, looks like we're almost out of juice. That's bad, right?

0af1942648bddbdb627f0bb960e620bd.text: Grid analysis indicates we are nearly out of power. The island will be lost.

6a80b56d96672a2b0d1b8a3545b47637.text: The Grid's in th-the red! We n-n-need to do something!

bace80d958867ab8c1cf819408701914.text: I do not wish to alarm anyone, but the Power Grid is likely to fail if it takes any more hits.

70cad11a134109ef3334007c51a887fa.text: I don't wish to affect morale negatively, but the Power Grid is at near-failure.

578e76cbb3c17a2a697e431314bfee88.text: The Grid is failing! We don't have much power left!

f85eb60efb3e395c6df724c1af07a748.text: The Grid is bleeding power. Another hit, and we're done for.

78a9ba9f7a831fb6b0df5f41440c65db.text: If the Grid sustains any more damage, the island reactors will fail completely.

5ac3c6a537364bde835aa59453a2a7d0.text: Our engineers report the Grid is at critical levels!

3f56c2b36a4991e98f440f069940e858.text: Accessing: Island pop. database\nUpdated: Civilians lost

b5cea5d7c39f4529ddc7be1f8c3b221c.text: I... I... couldn't do anything else.

30c1b4396b1c0b1dc0daed7463805522.text: I didn't want anyone to die.

10e19d9c6b78ddb5c34106af8f01d04a.text: I... oh my god, I'm so sorry! I'm so sorry!

bf32693a0c8cfe8e82ab8ba25a5aaa9c.text: They did not belong on the battlefield.

633f7fe12de0946a512f356c2afe1fa9.text: I hope this doesn't damage the Grid too much.

c4b58b7b5d39c6228770965dfba48065.text: Detecting a drop in Grid power...

75738477603ab05b35831d64a49dc37c.text: Human silo destroyed. Multiple lives have been recycled.

3642e1b578d81b4e07e598d674eee042.text: The #corp civilians will nurture the soil.

d8154b7735c9451f82839d7663a670b1.text: Those people... but have to stay focused...

95c194a4226b9dc73b547ad9ea971305.text: I... I wasn't the one who lodged civilians in a combat area!

b15507b39990f40279791b0c24cc7f1d.text: I'll report my actions to CEO #ceo_second myself.

4679d90e70e8cf3e63ce4aee2d9fc911.text: Collateral damage unavoidable. Power Grid holding.

81dcc6d45268007d065e93769aa7a0f9.text: I c-c-can't believe I just did that...

71f4b594fada8ae3e588c846eff89be2.text: I... I wanted to use my research to p-p-protect people, not...

8832907117d814f90c61cb8726d112c7.text: If only we c-c-could have evacuated the area first...

c767724ed5a19883260221545df1ac99.text: There is no need to trouble the human citizenry about this regrettable incident.

0bbbed3f57b612accdcd05b423e30dd7.text: Submitting a request for a press blackout on this regrettable tragedy.

70a5142609571426090e57029f58bdde.text: These #corp buildings are exceedingly fragile... their humans, even more so.

3dbabdcbf4ba5b1cbe2e33dae77d1ea8.text: Those buildings aren't reinforced, they can't take hits like we can!

a37f5f7ebde52d6913ef9af4a1ef8924.text: Don't think about it, keep fighting!

c83d5830ef27305a9eb21dbec1438ee8.text: Did you just... oh my god!

6f32df2dcf152006959cdbb85f58047c.text: No! We came to help them!

22f427a724b77778e587dd75bea8fcbb.text: The weak cannot protect the weak.

e81e8ed124e6e7fc6ecf6e0d3f691f80.text: You must predict your actions or others will suffer for them.

245662dc4b20b9da44ea4714db74ccaf.text: Put it from your mind. Focus on the fight.

57d3f24825970d8f53ff3b01b8548529.text: Next time, think of the Grid!

fd0554837c2ee7246675040f8abc7dec.text: Do not risk Grid damage, or we will have nothing to fight with!

16e69c5e65ce862780eff9b2197e9aa3.text: Oh no! I hope no one was in there...

fa1cdb4c3724c7943d49f4f972220ad8.text: Did... did they have time to evacuate?

f7e53c330fe6ef57030cfe03a9759b56.text: #main_second, you and I are going to have a talk when we get back...

4991b456c559e19dda909cff94303c73.text: Were you just careless or did you mean to kill them?

7606c33e3963fe7f52c9c601d2125cb2.text: Did you seriously just do that?

e166b3060a0eabe63bb5d6f09f3dc23e.text: Don't think about the building. Keep fighting.

0337062f970d08fb62c6379457520762.text: That building... you had no choice.

0a23b52c005b88bf40118a3dd2d17d4a.text: Collateral damage acknowledged. Power Grid holding.

9fce225258692215aa539283445cd87c.text: These #corp buildings are exceedingly fragile... the humans, even more so.

1977cb0bc7bf93cd1f499e96a9ac89a5.text: Please watch your fire, those buildings have civilians in them!

e871d0084ed5870505ce4d82c37c10e4.text: Please try to defend the buildings, not damage them!

0e82306611d25b29485205efaeaecfa5.text: Careless. That building should have been protected!

cfad751dac4112f74e6a7db555237171.text: Your incompetency will result in hundreds of deaths!

0fc6aff4679e784b561a975cd5db95c3.text: I trust that was unavoidable, but please be careful.

df5d21ddfb6afcea18a5104fd30993f1.text: Those citizens... I'll speak to their families myself.

d614390b4d905a653c384917640a627a.text: The Vek will pay for that!

3b4830107789f7c6be923152b0a88617.text: The Vek will answer for this.

7746c32fbb399b2b7a78cdd62d27d25d.text: I won't let the Vek get away with this.

69e995f4df7ba0efa190a494c9f23c6c.text: They should have evacuated weeks ago...

851eb6f03740033d0d653103a1182dc2.text: A small sacrifice if we can save this timeline.

4fed5df260fd93c734cf35b248c6b6df.text: Must we allow the Grid to sustain such damage?

7a53cfb142c903eb2fc8b0d98d2cb938.text: While the loss of life is regrettable... why do the Vek target the island structures?

12fa16119bc4e8411330013ad3aa18e6.text: Interesting - the Vek don't seem to be attacking the structures to feed on the citizens.

124fb039844bbec48adf5d34c1872513.text: The casualties are unfortunate... but I wonder... why do the Vek attack the buildings at all?

afb8b4d4f7401c55f8c164ea1e3c7e3e.text: I... I had thought the buildings were durable, but the Vek...

adb57eab431e18a421bc1b3ec91df48e.text: Those #corp civilians will nurture the soil. The Vek will follow.

5e860ddd62bf9a639599c7acec986273.text: The Vek are going to pay for that!

e68568d503f6bf019a8914eb5de1c0a0.text: I'm not letting the Vek hurt anyone else!

d575d2c75dc1990f0363fac9b0d65752.text: Look, there's nothing I could have done to protect that building, all right?

8bb69c299094a58f519751326e3172c1.text: We can't let the Vek do any more damage!

9841a8ba60e4816826c49055d4b82565.text: I swear the Vek will answer for that.

951730ea0e73996577397e8453635c47.text: That Vek that took down the building? Mine.

a1fd8f24507970661d9b3387ec09041b.text: That Vek's going to answer for killing those people...

8b46e5940ea16f6bc96262393bb746fe.text: City damage acknowledged. Power Grid holding.

34269e0089dc182b365d56c9900ed608.text: Th-they didn't deserve that... n-n-none of them did!

5a93d687233ac2bf2cb3b63448ac5606.text: Updating population figures for #corp resource projections.

9b9ea1775f5acfe734f57b5c15fe24b1.text: Tabulating a list of the civilians' extended families and dispatching condolence letters.

323bc6c0156fd2de3b115be835cd54f0.text: What a loss... that building stood tall for hundreds of years.

9ab03751e79bc0f7e43997ab2c30d905.text: Dispatching rescue crews to see if any civilians can be helped!

e99e78c8623335456cd7e7a0f23705f0.text: We need you to defend those buildings!

f6991bb3263132230369f02309cf1855.text: It is unacceptable to let the Vek succeed. Stop them!

37da042ece7e3b3585482bf44545ca71.text: You're there to stop the Vek, not watch them destroy the city.

292237b3d8298721b1a609f6638dd3d1.text: I am reading multiple casualties. So much death.

8cd7d14edbd88c4ce497683fe0f3b6b8.text: Too many lives have been lost in this war.

913798ab5dfd5f3032758b736d7785f8.text: That building had countless machine lives in storage.

c1d4c70854545ce477972365581c4817.text: Building resists damage, currently anyone can comment but I can change this to _Obs/_Self/_Vek if we think it's worth it.

654bfac2dca5f818e49b9b0fcfdf3886.text: Looks like that building was built to last!

b10670e11f29488e3a3830f1a979bd74.text: Reports are the civilians in the structure are safe!

0c05ab55fd45d4b8054917348a70d53d.text: Looks like the building passed its safety inspection.

6c53bb5661c5f7a2bb4a584284b16231.text: Much respect to that building's engineer.

8916b34df3775d3f1b2183aaf24cc28b.text: Next time those civilians might not be so lucky...

83196c16520dbc89b00ae1ad7d1efdb5.text: Can't let it take another hit!

0b77557ca145808b5b983bba1213d381.text: Thank heavens... I thought it was done for.

0a807956099205be641e6470f83817c9.text: Give my thanks to the building's engineer.

598f1eaa59d1db7de4ad91644373b327.text: Perfect! We didn't lose any Grid power!

097e4157e86f6bdd4d19a5ba0cc35c3d.text: No drop in power! The Grid held!

a85448a65af3cd5241aff115f8778a78.text: Human silo has resisted the impact.

e5c2e53195966ab9954d1728adb00aab.text: That building got lucky! This time...

8c0cdada2d9e3295b49c1d4c0465b645.text: Guess that building was tougher than it looked.

955077d59169111e56d2d0d4c6fe2967.text: Building's still standing! Uh, not like I had any doubts.

b626606eae16721b6dd8b1d04db8657b.text: Civilians reporting in - no casualties from the hit!

b66a45269d0eda1493329326d3ec0147.text: #corp citizens in that building - they're safe!

4cc121ff6b1b986aa54a1e54346593aa.text: Wrecking attempt on #corp structure has failed.

c0e2c18803ca6e778465aed63fa41bcb.text: Finally, some luck for a c-c-change.

4860a7c5430b0a2ac37a7ee4cf41b6c1.text: I am surprised the building didn't collapse, considering how fragile #corp buildings seem to be.

47fcafe7c5d5464077c69ea29ef940fd.text: The structural integrity of the #corp building has surpassed my expectations.

33020d8fb7a36bfd198b1daa5c3b060a.text: Archive construction at work! Our buildings may be old, but they're sturdy!

51130f4214ab700b34fe228409d622c2.text: The Grid held. You got lucky this time.

a505d424d2dbabc747a8a7ac26173aa1.text: The Power Grid's defense is unreliable at best. But it worked this time, that building held.

0b297c49e8445e323e9c701473d91d1e.text: Damage repelled. The lives within are safe.

29e798fcdcc657753422b3dd92005f8f.text: No damage reported. The attack was successfully repelled.

751f2640e5c72f0bc65215f156aa8bc5.text: The structure held! No casualties reported!

f692cada6b5b7700db1142a72f427acb.text: The people in that building are safe!

799361d58fed88b3a6dca3a090dbcb8b.text: Train took a hit... but it's not irreparable.

5ce214d2f211a78ab514912a47ee69f7.text: The #corp train is hit, but not destroyed. Yet.

4bc75594eff18dfb8d035f2bf10984bd.text: The train is disabled, but #corp should be able to fix it.

8c5107b1833c9cedda3bd40ad67b0ff7.text: Looks like #corp makes trains that can take a hit.

e316633dc814759bbe19acacd32f1d79.text: Train's derailed, but #corp can get it running again.

ef183efa9cfb75f5a72101f7640ac880.text: Train's derailed, but from the looks of it, #corp can still fix it.

223c55f2fbd8c69684cd425be22ee908.text: The train is damaged, but may be salvaged after the battle.

bcf6d874048e8103c467a508c63b2b40.text: Once the battle is over, I can get that train running again.

d9e0539a22142c2b1e1bc98517f36d54.text: Give me an engineering team, and I can get that train up and running after the fight.

8ecd4376dfced2f24cdcb1e59c4c9c11.text: Looks like the #corp train's stopped... but at least it's not completely destroyed!

9721e1ec75a389859dd7c44f8d3e64a2.text: Protect the train until the Vek are gone, might be salvageable.

755308cfbc0a664af5d74e0e15f3ff67.text: Don't let the #corp train take another hit!

aa4a6633365f21382be23d2e3b585d5b.text: Well, the train was slow before, but now it's not moving at all.

e32fd5e653a04a3407fa1a11b9a72df0.text: Train took a hit, commander, but an engineering team could fix it.

d40f086bd1e3e0fd4b62a11985e7c995.text: Train's off the rails, but #corp engineering can get it up and running again.

163ec2ec90642613360463d4c22ccbb5.text: #corp train has experienced an accident. Recommend execution and replacement of offending parts.

75735da788beed64e39348d23efac2df.text: #corp train's repairs are covered under warranty.

024bdea1172a0f7b16da1a9fd9ee5f9c.text: The train d-doesn't look completely d-damaged. Maybe the #corp can repair it?

a384a7a60c60849106f2053f8b1268ed.text: The #corp train has come to a halt.

8897589173f92736a8423e3fabc3fbbb.text: I have radioed ahead and let the #corp know their train will be delayed.

037e61113af48d5193a23984aa46ad1d.text: Ol' Harold's one tough locomotive, but even he can't take much more!

b53c145b13bf8e5608e91eb61377a51f.text: Our maglev's crippled, but can be repaired. Keep it from taking any more damage.

ee26647ab54f580ab23c5f843934b6d5.text: The train has been damaged, but scans indicate Pinnacle can still restore it. Please keep it from further damage.

3f1da80d2a658e4646f200d1d9916599.text: Our train's external structure has been breached, but it's still functioning. Another hit, though...

2a247e0fa362e9796ac31d23cf65d723.text: #corp isn't going to like this one bit...

6a79f3d87271d6cb360ca6d624fc9363.text: Train's a casualty. Let's make sure there aren't any more.

e32337fa662705342dbdbad40f2a7393.text: Train's dead, #corp can bury it after we're done here.

b3079ccc6035a26921812f255cb5f028.text: The train's destroyed. Not even #corp could get it running again.

977c8f904b9f62456492838b138bdbda.text: Train's wrecked. Concentrate fire on the Vek.

7f77d2c51588b4d63b618a5d0a130f05.text: Train's a lost cause - but this mission isn't.

6c017b5476cbdae8c50a1abeed827acd.text: There's... almost nothing left of the train.

d5e3a1556af70e4889247981febc3097.text: The poor railway crew. I... don't detect any survivors.

70ac17c55c6fd0bceb463132dcdce08a.text: We no longer need to protect the train.

929ced02614b5a2069b1ff0e188133ba.text: It's more parts and scrap than train now.

6d30487f45c232f806166c8907769325.text: #corp train has been destroyed. Advise removing railway to create more arable land.

f388a99e1c99ff3f37c5e449522d4712.text: #corp train destroyed. Advise repurposing train hull as a planter for saplings.

eb4a040532d271684c4d0bf33358bce9.text: That train's next stop is the scrapyard... it's done for. Finito. Gone.

960ee6fc54bbaddd747d4ceefd9acbc0.text: #corp train's wrecked. Concentrate fire on the Vek.

7384c120ce1e4e634831bc83137c3987.text: Dammit! We needed that train intact!

6da26d232159a4bb969c7ada9876ee7e.text: Okay, train's beyond saving. Let's kill some more Vek.

414ef3c9e77911dfe5587ad02ff7093a.text: We can cry over the wrecked train later... now let's kill Vek.

f846531ab29256b1e75d5b94c249d448.text: If the train wanted to survive, it would have moved faster, all right?

33313b7acc833354bcef304f069c3d30.text: Not even all of #corp's engineering teams could put that back together again.

7a13abd1e512dc9d6c862a02be24e380.text: The #corp train has fallen in battle. We must avenge it.

f7fd95938f734d6d85cfffa36c672fd1.text: The #corp train has sacrificed itself. Let this sacrifice not be in vain.

525f1fe761e2bb20dffb2531ca66a80e.text: I d-d-don't think anything could repair that train now.

ff8dcc9666412527e038ec7a9937f738.text: Not even a f-f-full #corp engineering team could repair that train.

f1d580ac889ed073555ca2317322b539.text: The #corp train has ceased functioning. It is beyond repair.

ca71f37c55dac63ad703a2a1a25708b4.text: I have radioed ahead and let the #corp know the train will be delayed indefinitely.

9f4edd4d6d89c7186cd1f238d8d2a0e3.text: That hit damaged poor Harold beyond repair. The last Old Earth locomotive... lost.

10959c1f21415e1c54935644e61a870a.text: The train has ceased operations. This undermines our survival projections considerably.

e42665c795181907012d6d5d9202f18d.text: Our train is down - and so is the crew. There is nothing more to be done.

b0ceaa82a54fbf285e1e370f62beca52.text: Remind player to block emerging Vek

c47bbf98cd2da6354300640235cec4e5.text: We need to block those Vek from reaching the surface!

1373bf4cc4ab378bcd9c5c97400090db.text: Remember our orders! We need to block the Vek from emerging!

5e97186539b3c2888460c477578c5ddb.text: We need to keep those Vek from surfacing!

da819cf8f747aaee450f14e87e93ab99.text: We need to keep those Vek pinned underground!

0c07a5fb2470ff8b051c09520f89068b.text: [ Objectives dictate emerging Vek need to be contained underground ]

e9ec52649f37007981d1309aa38f27b0.text: We need to keep those Vek from emerging to secure the region.

45784fa192b287264152ce7d7f479bf0.text: Keep those Vek below ground, block them with your Mechs!

5e33fa4d39ba603f57483e2706de6f0d.text: #squad - we need to focus on preventing the Vek from emerging.

718d69e6d5b2494cfc46d8a8de63719d.text: #squad - move to block the Vek, don't let any of them surface!

05d8e342f856e05198e7447adafd9ec7.text: #squad, move to block the emerging Vek... with your Mechs if you have to!

ff2ab23ff81175b13a76b1285ce55db7.text: Our orders are to block the emerging Vek.

ddf4fde8046c61f772bdaf705d966c50.text: We were ordered to prevent the Vek from surfacing.

f92bcb25ac517f7de0134d5175254ac7.text: What were we supposed to be doing here again? Oh, yes, prevent the Vek from emerging.

5d5f536cae3396b09a300128c81afdf9.text: We are required to prevent Vek from surfacing and damaging the region's topsoil.

6338f77cb125130583c56263227dc36c.text: The Vek are to remain planted in the ground. We must prevent them from surfacing.

2ce8dcf6f3299db2268bd7a2f94ac08a.text: Uh... we're supposed to be keeping the Vek belowground, right?

5e7fc47d9550e799863ffbb2feac63c7.text: We need to keep those uglies from surfacing! Commander's orders!

f7b118a8306942e5f0b29f454b8c986f.text: Remember #squad, we need to keep the Vek pinned down.

fc3dac231cc53c1d8eea4852a5a978d2.text: #squad, don't let the Vek surface! Use your Mechs to stop them!

246f8d0785291dda32ec70fb141c3f47.text: So... our orders are to sit on our asses... correction, sit our asses on Vek?

4a71fc02826bfd1684df8afe1bdc4e65.text: Wait... didn't the commander say something about keeping the Vek from emerging?

7b4904805f602f445acaf1c9c971d0d3.text: We have our orders. We need to stop the Vek from surfacing.

2b5d1cd32524bdbb4d26d6445a7d944c.text: Remember - our mission is to keep the Vek from reaching the surface.

cfc015dec990ee6164523f2b27bca914.text: Our work orders are to keep the Vek from surfacing.

e44f82158d11df751557044bf5842fa1.text: No Vek is to be allowed to emerge without permission.

5e8189d02769d1c1bc580c84acce21d6.text: We have all been given our shift assignments. Cover the emergence points.

780aaab2ae15779114e262f8e83b218a.text: Um... shouldn't we be s-s-topping the Vek from emerging?

cb0f5d2755dc7122c122928af9fb8fe5.text: S-should we f-f-focus on the Vek emergence points?

08c485ccc935eedccc3c6cdd122b7905.text: I h-hope we c-can stop the Vek from emerging...

2130a55ac57d14858a9cf2af027dddc5.text: Vek have not been cleared for emergence and must be detained.

19bb8063b6f0dc1b057166d22202d63c.text: Unauthorized Vek tunneling must be halted.

c889fb0690e0b3356032d27a3797e750.text: I feel the need to remind everyone we were requested to prevent the Vek from surfacing.

5036acfb2b1d0b60fcc1c42df9c497ae.text: Commander's orders were to focus on the emerging Vek.

d47270ea48ffaaee40d5c1f46edd6702.text: We need to keep the Vek from surfacing. Block the emergence points any way you can!

03a381831c31005556a2ecae359cc1d6.text: Block those emergence points! Don't let the Vek surface.

f14ee3f2cbd2ae88fb94c3ba473a0029.text: Part of your mission is ensuring the Vek remain contained below ground.

f7bde1df3d814754c399a6a18cb13cba.text: Block the emerging Vek if you can - we need to keep them contained.

40a31a96e2a6a643b049983a13e65709.text: Did ol' Dewey really get those planes flying again?

33dfbae7e6f2d480ee740e32d8c84b26.text: Archive bomber coming in - I hope the pilot finished basic training.

8cd55a1af148d3c24c36bafd904cd45e.text: Great - Archive air support, for what that's worth.

d72db136bd4bfcedb484d002f9208c10.text: Old Earth plane incoming... let's hope Archive can keep it in the air.

35bb7ae10b9b6c12d1e1bf7f5ca6ce4f.text: Watch your heads, Archive bomber coming in.

b9a1fec40139e42679d37a9e1eff045a.text: Archive air strike on the way!

82102f46427d9b66afbc94ed3a7cb660.text: We've got air support incoming, move to safety!

017fdb8e2345c185edcbaf5ccbabafd1.text: Got air support coming in fast!

8b3b1c8912c4a569e991fa7945f8a255.text: Archive's got a bomber coming in. Watch yourselves.

03b3631d63f5936b3fc8b5fba042f2b0.text: Archive's air support is on the way... stay clear.

7a7ec142f06d31259084224b0e155d92.text: I'm picking up an Archive bomber on sensors.

7f30855ad64bd3239af6f114e32d8525.text: Archive bomber's coming in for a strafing run.

7859c4929e334346aced8d82c4bde6df.text: Stay clear, everyone, Archive bomber's beginning its run!

342e6bb58d4d5226021221a3b5322e85.text: Picking up an Old Earth bomber on sensors. It's... wobbling a bit.

bc239c36275830767f2e7f71d37f57a3.text: Sensors detect an Archive jet flying with primitive propulsion systems.

d5be7da37e1d202031aec1d49d5e2a9b.text: An Archive bomber is about to do considerable damage to the region's topsoil.

92e31a46a55f580b0e8e3b62d1c69775.text: I think we're about to get a fireworks show from above!

75eefd15f168676e465d5954d577f767.text: I hear a bomber coming in... and... nnh... someone needs to tune its engines.

f203679c428f1ceb7d4d4f9905e772fa.text: Archive jet has started its bombing run... please don't hit us, please don't hit us...

2ead50b36b216fabdebb72a6c4487a61.text: #squad, get clear of the bombing area!

3c636f8ee6d2a4522e6287ffb215f8de.text: Hope that Archive bomber doesn't veer off course...

5415ca8c01581c8e728a09d7d9d1787a.text: Got an Archive bomber incoming... it better not get a scratch on my Mech.

ee58782e737071eabfe1b72766e177a3.text: A flying demolitions crew is approaching our position.

82c50de3003b1c296e1dfcc5425d7814.text: I'm p-p-picking up an incoming fighter... one of ours.

485a1d353ff9ee705b2a065b69c72079.text: I h-h-have what looks like a jet on s-s-sensors... and an old one, at that.

20320f421d4a794995665028203e0f70.text: A sub-optimal Archive jet with a sub-optimal pilot is on approach.

a36c130684c88c1c9c67103dfa7e9999.text: We've got one of our jets coming in for a bombing run! Clear the target zone!

3fc95de9554fe71d00f39adc77cbb339.text: Ol' Dewey was right about those tanks - they're good to go.

5e6abc61b42669310697ce8784076ca1.text: Those tanks are online? I'm surprised, they've been exhibits for so long.

e3b7a1f969d4a0e61cd25f0ce542956e.text: Guess Old Earth made those two tanks to last - they're ready!

3201ffa4b97ada89c6906927f0932ffc.text: Those old Archive tanks finally woke up. Get them moving!

2f67c35908d845d7472c1841dbb37449.text: Both tanks are powered up. Let's put that old artillery to use!

0fa90898dfcf9929bbcff15302b97db7.text: [ Archive tanks: call signs 'Daddy Warbucks', 'Mama Bear', are now activated ]

9eefef2fd00e6f8995ec9c0fb164e566.text: Those Archive tanks don't look safe... but they're up and running.

8b144eed0e7b34ce8c1d038b4bfcf167.text: Not sure what those tanks can do, but they're ready.

6b28938bbb7bba20c4deeca667716692.text: Looks like those Archive relics are warmed up and ready to go.

cc846c81b1f08760e614f84fa2e2c5aa.text: Looks like those two old warhorses are ready to fight.

2490cc0dd4adf9766b57040dca568196.text: Both of the Old Earth tanks are powered up!

33b1bca558c699f19200c9d987147301.text: We've got fire support from both Archive tanks.

7f4b40be03b9864c14fb7fab3568be05.text: Make certain that those old tanks do not hit us.

a14d20a387d2f74f7ac9d5234d4fb701.text: Tanks' batteries are at full. They are awaiting orders.

038300a0e9c3d7f40ff6737aa5b452fa.text: It looks like Archive was right, the tanks still work!

70d577db39b352193af4ab8e742672df.text: The Old Earth tanks are activated, and ready to add Vek nutrients to the soil.

5268add06dc85e1f5c2ec907c3b6462a.text: The Old Earth tanks are activated... and asking if our enemies are 'communists'.

19b69fcbac55255a47aedd729e9661c4.text: Get it into gear, old-timers, we need both you tanks in the fight!

dee115f1dfa523ccd219dcf4b359aba2.text: Got new friendlies on our side!

8c39ca5fc8781cc93d13763117d58675.text: Archive tanks are activated, time to roll out!

0744d3885a9d4fa0efcbd1b2e446e284.text: Looks like those tanks want a piece of the action.

8a65e5fd08bcc12626fe1c60595bce61.text: We've got reinforcements. Those two tanks are ready to be deployed.

c5b39873307db6f40da6674aeb1516d8.text: Those two tanks are... against all odds... ready to roll.

57ef574999c279ae75e2120b8f4ad463.text: The two bulldozers with cannons are now ready to begin work.

fdf6a90388a959eec3528ae2daa03c0c.text: We have two new members of the work crew, ready to pitch in.

dc8082c7bbb2108f67f228035df1b654.text: Two bulldozers requesting permission to join the #squad.

2afb4db7f329cc21d939533adb83f152.text: G-G-Getting a 'ready' signal from those t-t-two Archive tanks.

4bb807c4d02ed2cf14c738a3119f6d96.text: Those t-t-tanks are c-charged and r-ready.

a2f1a1a5637465dc91354d27a60ac1c1.text: Archive tanks online. Syncing objectives now.

a500c827153bc3d6ba5fa921ddcea93c.text: These tanks are online... and my, they're rather crude.

ec84b8b15823bf722b5e7bc0872ba601.text: The two tanks are online... and... I believe they're gossiping about me!

31e3ecdc1192dae615090cd31d45476a.text: We're reading green on the tanks - they're ready to go!

96d49d54679cef733fec3899c32e6a44.text: Only one tank survived to activation

3020ac0768712157dae834ba5d47795c.text: Archive tank's good to go! ...and can't believe it still works.

b5965304a5b82499f9b7b07085d7fdfa.text: Tank's ready - let's see what ol' 'Mama Bear' can do!

a2de3cfb8e74e00c68dbb5e7bd936b22.text: I'm getting the 'go' signal from the remaining tank - I can't believe it, it looks ready to fight!

fd32cb66187fe72708817a00f4b0bbec.text: Mama Bear... er, the Archive tank... is online and ready to roll out!

6ea7bb583877b02afda39bbec75b7abf.text: That last Archive tank finally woke up. Get it moving!

12238af16d15b1393f97745057965530.text: Surviving tank is powered up. Let's put that old artillery to use!

8c509b5197d5efbf8dc95413294d0b10.text: [ Surviving Archive tank is now activated ]

e018c42db220d1807afeae19cce3b8a8.text: [ Surviving Archive tank: call sign 'Mama Bear', is now activated ]

b16586af574b76e260e272284cb90107.text: That Archive tank doesn't look safe... but it's up and running.

4512b2a771f6c51c9c3d9f48e3243844.text: Not sure what that tank can do, but it's ready for orders.

cd37980f9c4b73a35e7f5ab76f81df40.text: That Old Earth tank's charged and ready.

54fb4433ea4f0bde58ab1e8906f9603d.text: Got the signal from the surviving tank - it's ready for battle!

98ffdfc8821411bd312f62b157304502.text: Hey! The surviving tank is armed!

f38855569c822b97e51e123a3dd45b1c.text: Looks like that Old Earth tank wants to help!

25f886bfc8643d76e6d6a44f45c7d779.text: The last old soldier is awake, and seeks to avenge its brother.

96683cf1ef431eb69c09a2eacf6923cc.text: Make certain that old tank does not hit us.

db9e5196ed44d9c3219127b96ea42668.text: Tank's battery is at full. It is awaiting orders.

a276d757bcf6421acc972a7f5919727c.text: Why, look at that - the last tank still works! It's online!

011bf359252a2d55ab40c7f2c6226010.text: The surviving Old Earth military unit is indicating it is ready for action.

bdd1703c4fe9954a401e4197226b7b2f.text: The remaining Old Earth tank is activated, and ready to add Vek nutrients to the soil.

e94e8db3e0acd77707a41c1f5a2ee00f.text: One tank's alive - and ready to avenge its sister!

63f2bbcb51187700e6ec0cea731810cb.text: Got a new friendly on our side!

4cd0e9b6a77dbfd4a964cbb58b690013.text: That Archive tank should even the odds.

aa3dc44531bc2b2364f72fbe109a9b1d.text: Archive tank's fully charged - time to roll out!

90530ddc9f1f7f8a46e61742a7603e1e.text: Looks like the surviving tank woke up. And it's pissed.

8fea7175ebb6834bdad877ce9011a473.text: The surviving tank is ready to be deployed.

16c0c4d47a88e0fabf5a28da12b7fd31.text: The intact bulldozer with the cannon is now ready to begin work.

94d0bc98b7846d1d642b2e8814785966.text: The surviving employee is ready to assist with clearing Vek waste from the region.

79c65332b5f0c895df11abebf89dbd6e.text: The remaining bulldozer is requesting permission to join the #squad.

42c07335297e66e08b767cb8a03a0bbe.text: G-G-Getting the ready signal from the r-r-remaining tank.

05e964dbf09ba2ae6b6d2dfc02f0133d.text: The s-s-surviving tank is charged and ready.

5ce28e2081221399d4eca842bdc0331f.text: Archive tank online. Syncing objectives now.

7001a40b0d9cfc722f9809f1ca6f76d8.text: The tank is awake... and why, I believe it just called me a 'snob'.

44b396319e1c8ab26d283254025ac2c8.text: The surviving tank is online... and using a rather coarse programming language.

3efa6867669991e6613b88c292e162a6.text: My engineers report that the remaining tank should be ready for action. Send it into the fray!

32005f9481f7cf4b15524a2e63d18282.text: Remind player to destroy the Dam

3cd0b5fc611ed94f5c7f43fe96aa1aa5.text: We still need to break that dam...

4ef204759dbec8bf4a2b63579881935a.text: Anyone who gets a shot at the dam, take it.

f11974e8c219300fdef445e84ec9fd61.text: That dam still has to go.

490a6518980c3248d4eda52cfef7860f.text: That dam needs to be destroyed to protect the region.

8c55adab44a721716a613e7650259e3b.text: [ Dam still needs to be destroyed ]

cd1b160a50e441d5ef26c4067b101d6c.text: We still need to take out that dam...

ef9dfe8b3351959df622bfb7cab18bd6.text: Dam's still intact. We need to take it down.

9569109581ab4b3af43304b62c7aa189.text: Time's running out to take down that dam...

f80fb217c5a58a5e885b3f1422d19ceb.text: #squad - if someone gets a clear shot at the dam, take it!

11353e45114161c42e4e60ffd8a26d32.text: Hate to destroy the dam, but if it helps against the burrowing Vek...

fbe604bed82d74cf7be69b53f2ff2bb1.text: Destroy the dam when Vek lie in its path.

b7b4337fad8de6389cdfbab5915124d9.text: Use the dam to drown the Vek.

3f0cda67f94aaa9a89015b08658bf7e9.text: It seems a waste to destroy the dam...

107cb1da61917dfbd6391f5083c8dd15.text: Shame we have to destroy the dam - it's really a fascinating piece of Old Earth engineering.

e8a3f16c050ae77cc8fb25a237799028.text: I'm sure there's some easy release valve for the dam that wouldn't require us shelling it...

08b35a8f3f7c715b434b01dc03e5fda9.text: We are required to recycle the dam to irrigate the region.

fb8cb2430983a6c5b11f8ec82f2b0317.text: We have been instructed to recycle the dam to reduce Vek burrowing efforts.

d815329590702c2d40ae2cab3609300a.text: Seems a shame to blow the dam up, but...

bb6e93731e4a571335549f32ef8e4faf.text: We need to take the Archive dam out. Commander's orders.

060d0e5e228c48ce7e087b64d4b9a503.text: CEO Alms asked us to take out the dam. Let's get it done.

596a37d734b897df7fdbacf1cafd59c6.text: I hope you're not expecting ME to destroy the dam.

45c5294c01200c4dfd1d8a331d423b4a.text: The dam doesn't count as a kill. I'll only do it if I have to.

370671ce3a04c3d81821c5eda4cd1467.text: Remember - commander's orders are to take out the dam.

07710c80421e2264245ee7b06db33ee1.text: Our work orders include obliterating that dam.

36d07070d2c1fe8d4cf822338d6b18a7.text: That dam must be obliterated. With extreme prejudice.

0d40d78c40d0d0e5674ba3f925413d9a.text: We all have been given our shift assignments. Obliterate the dam.

bc0464c93a384b0e3d48c448a687858c.text: Sh-Should I be the one to d-d-destroy the d-dam?

d115bfebc0e58b468adaa5a05cce9d71.text: Can our M-Mechs even t-take down that dam?

ab3e443fde35571a9553a2edf13ac318.text: I feel the need to remind everyone we need to bring down that dam.

c9c1ea10c6e37c0e0bfe3998bbfb44e8.text: Commander's orders were to destroy the dam.

1062ebb4097a2473d9ccd50a38d7c540.text: That dam needs to be destroyed... we need a natural barrier to stop the Vek, and a river's what we need.

eb3d4f8330b376fcca383c4426d66d84.text: I hate to press, but is the dam still intact?

3a929c320b2445eb7136ef42d182da5a.text: After the completed animation of the dam drowning things

d76fe98f0157b28c9c7b6188862f52fc.text: Accessing: Region topography\nUpdated: River now online

bccdcdfa34d3b6cd935219a1fdedecfd.text: Update: Vek tunneling prevented\nCause: Water barrier

568f1cbd5bbdb2c81d820dcf1f12ebd8.text: I guess this is what you'd call Archive terraforming?

b4d54ab65d7091bfc2b4d1881eae99cb.text: Shame about the dam, but it was necessary.

7b7bef0d24a699212173abc58a11ad9f.text: Uh... Archive control? You've got yourselves a new river.

3d0313119350a1d4bc948493049389f9.text: [ Dam has been destroyed, river has been deployed ]

e01203bf73f98a5eca309b04afc18046.text: Someone should tell #corp they've got a new river.

daa9ce93b0510f647cd4e9affd4e4bf4.text: Updating region maps with the new river...

dcd3a1d76178f2f942279aadb304c0aa.text: Water's the best wall against burrowing Vek.

b2cb9017b3cee3c13c4756412215f0d5.text: Looks like Archive's got a new river.

aecc2a15ff81b4b133f0298023824f9d.text: The flooding has made a natural barrier!

222afba0519d630bcdfcc52f4e3e7c03.text: We seem to have made a mess of the dam.

af0564cf2a50aafc41533b92cd1638db.text: Dam recycled. River is now irrigating the region.

908fed5d7b01de5307d5c7cfe69cfcb5.text: Water has formed a natural barrier against Vek burrowing attempts.

07148c9542f0fa64ce00186696b0a6b2.text: Do we get to name the river?

30de999d8ce9813df86f91a5dd4a38a4.text: Not the best irrigation job I've ever seen, but...

83c22af3f2c313b2d2879b1c625615a6.text: First dibs on naming the river... #self_second River, discovered by yours truly.

e6e17ca1a69ddf62d24bc982401d343f.text: Should be proud - R.S.T. terraforming rarely makes rivers.

cf0a9b74bf73543c3aa0c3711e1d1928.text: Monument has been obliterated with extreme prejudice.

e8ef3960aef6154d1fc4687dd5d22c50.text: A new drainage ditch has been created.

8d28a20e61ce795741f09473f40cd9b1.text: A river to ferry away the dam wreckage is now online.

4c863c511375ff12fd163cde17bcfc18.text: This sh-sh-should put a s-s-stop to the Vek's tunneling efforts.

8f1b415c563c718210715ffa27addfb6.text: Well, that dam would have collapsed eventually, I suppose.

cda49371ae59f13ba5ca5b8f5402b4f4.text: If we must sacrifice decrepit human museum pieces to defeat the Vek, it seems like a win-win.

2aee61ab1094f41b5fb2d3100c5fc7dd.text: Look at that river run! Well done #squad, I knew you could do it!

5e2f9877ebb6fd679d91ce8435ff9d2a.text: Triggers only when the first satellite is destroyed

4c99eea1b0e714313977ec98cb2a8189.text: Dewey must be crying right now - his grandfather gifted that to Archive.

27576b956b0bec5f548f2d99df90f936.text: We lost one of the rockets, commander.

313890bd7a8e0a0ac250567ba1fef0d4.text: We've lost one of the satellites.

5d7ab34a55cdee22faa74b9b8f7b8928.text: First satellite lost, defend the second!

c42fdad8bd6b6e960dc2a44ddffd8003.text: Guess that one's not seeing orbit.

a7e709879cc1f56205acfa0e3390b3ad.text: We no longer need to protect that rocket.

bc0ac4e6b3b061b96aa997ec2c48b84f.text: And I hoped to see it fly...

e355dc439b203a1f19ffb8b9a588fb18.text: Satellite recycled. Its rocket emissions will also no longer contaminate the region.

b0a373f61bd4305159d6fc22c4f1a07c.text: Rocket has been recycled. Detecting chemical residue bleeding into soil.

31a32bd745487bc44300d1d58eb82f78.text: That poor satellite - it'll never see the stars.

1a4b2af4677a65aeba5ea15860e082a1.text: I guess we still have the other one? For now?

28a001ead45e0f47705183ffd29d9930.text: Satellite's lost. Protect the other one!

86c0e83dcac16c6fbfcf766767e4481c.text: That satellite wasn't really a gift from Dewey's grandpa was it? Tell me it wasn't.

7f4784611541a22bd2201f9eaf5805cc.text: We've lost one of the s-s-satellites!

e511b41f3d4aacddc0abe5f85cea2f95.text: Satellite's g-gone! Wh-What do we do now?

141aaeb1e8d4ab51aae4c2d3a76a3651.text: Unauthorized destruction of Archive property detected.

9f918c6ebc5b1e434a7a8400fa15d5f8.text: A waste of a perfectly adequate rocket.

8e33a23c84f5f26bad41aff825e9e438.text: Let's leave this incident off the public channels until we see what happens with the other rocket.

7e1b9e71b859c3d5c0ff4a425d83e935.text: No, not the satellite! I can't look!

84287a5bc69a392e5043366bba5d3987.text: The satellite's lost! Grandfather must be spinning in his grave...

e11753ae517c025c38f537290d30e5e3.text: Triggers when the Satellite queues its launch (the turn before it actually launches) -- It can trigger for either satellite, or both, it's randomized.

1b23ee6060a898e608241e4b0e8fce95.text: Almost ready to launch. I hope that rocket holds together...

54940fe30937d9fff196ec56c1899809.text: We'll soon see if that Archive maintenance paid off when that rocket launches...

e52f4450910ebc56fe12e8f013b4a2de.text: It's almost in the air, commander.

d4d0822e951af6d7512bbb471c1f23cd.text: Be sure to clear the rocket's blast area!

e0727114b101f3030f8745f07ab00f8d.text: Satellite's about to launch - keep your distance!

c150d9d45640417f70638d66a04bc422.text: Just a little longer before it takes off...

54a2bbbd786e9f960e6d81dae4f01868.text: Do not let the Vek near the rocket.

dd7deac3779f88a88d41af755ed8191d.text: Rocket is about to leave this habitat.

ba4a2b99080e619f5b452124a286ba2a.text: Archive, this is, uh, Chief #self_second in mission control. It's a clear day, and rocket's about to launch!

ea98f81074ae510a87159d2b3234b498.text: The rocket's almost ready for takeoff!

e99b106be3cde92b758b10b1316a4076.text: We just need to buy the rocket a little more time...

f840950a98c7f8a89c6a8aca8a7534a8.text: It's almost ready to take off...

86aff76fd197c50518c9297315ae0d2a.text: Will that damn thing launch already?!

4b946ba35af544d4cc5c8c15ee391634.text: Satellite's almost ready for launch, commander.

063b279e5bd5a72df28766d9e17a62dc.text: #squad, stay clear of the launch pad or you'll be ash!

635243cd644d232fef8cb06c6a9a672b.text: Clear the launch pad. I repeat, clear the launch pad.

6cca35dde54bc9c9a5883cb9dca7260f.text: Warning: Launch pad temperatures will rise enough to melt our Mech's hulls.

113de91e6e94881c373622da50a2fb19.text: Seismic readings indicate imminent rocket launch.

4e9cbf1a5655d253859cb6b5594aa2e9.text: Why, I believe the rocket may actually launch.

2ffbc919ea10ceb91ef70815d291ca59.text: Be careful of the rocket exhaust, our Mechs are not built to withstand the blast.

e6bdb0e2116448999e2a8ed2e7999524.text: The rocket's about to take off! I can't believe it!

f3bd55de16affc47c3f8e7ffffaaf425.text: Triggers when the satellite actually takes off, can trigger for either or both

e2f466ce09141683accf7c207b0bbb58.text: I can't believe it can fly!

c8dc4da78db9ced895a6ff54054b87fe.text: Guess CEO Alms was right - they can still fly!

1c99a16bd8d6e6ea1e8e462d91c3e8b7.text: Focus on the ground, not the launch.

ef359e689c781dddc73871e91afc1922.text: Countless insects and plants have given their lives for this launch.

2793e7a912ccab846a99fbf941d5091c.text: Wow! Look at that rocket go!

5c9c37ba57cebe0561dc0f8cd31c515c.text: I can't believe it... an actual rocket launch!

1407622af345700f86a51eda78c8c4a7.text: Rocket has left the work zone.

d58b9955d644303893272db0d38aa9dc.text: It launched... the r-r-rocket actually l-l-launched!

125b42a42a12f67ffda0ad6b2a743c0f.text: W-W-Would you look at that - it's in th-the air!

c7e19a347ccf19e85ea2d31d0b6f6cb1.text: I hope it doesn't hit the station in orbit ...there is one in this timeline, isn't there?

20b6e0f533bb2ff6fdb8a1aae1d9842b.text: It's away! Oh my stars, that is magnificent!

ab5c8b1a4215861f487a1f6b64fee458.text: Looks like Old Earth still has some surprises for the Vek.

cdfd65148a88bcbac72759e8d2b790a6.text: Good thing we held off on disarming those land mines...

269b74524624437b5536ff11f6a55878.text: Love to see those Vek pop.

7ac13dc437244d2e342012ca74231854.text: Never get tired of seeing that.

bd21e63451eb2fd8756f697349080e50.text: The proximity mine took it out!

9282d7ef04f0aaa805b90af453c60bfb.text: Oh! That mine took out the Vek!

8ff97a29c6cd23c12b8a5ea900ddfecc.text: A mine is a coward's weapon, but for the Vek, it is fitting.

5c2f3b74e7ea2685f7b425f6a38028d1.text: Why, those Old Earth mines still work! Excellent!

ff9ce399f21706daa02ac9cf95f1e61a.text: Thought that mine's proximity sensor might be a bit dodgy, but it did the job!

a6981abd803b3794790df9f73453133f.text: Garden proximity mine has assisted in Vekticide efforts.

60941afe9bb68b3ef0646f2b0734e61c.text: Vek infestation countered by proximity mine.

08f67a80f9fd209fa46258b0d412066a.text: Proximity mine is assisting in Vek recycling efforts.

4ee489bae137ff0daa896edc9027be0d.text: New arable land has been cleared by proximity mine.

ca70d90a427fff6db3ab79576637fdcf.text: Whoa! Vek should have watched where it stepped.

5215e380c8ab338a4ae046959a22c10c.text: It's the Vek's own fault for having too many legs. Was bound to hit a mine eventually.

6bff1979864ea6b5c7c854dae28b4dfe.text: Teach that Vek not to trespass on Archive island!

2d457e34f685758e63f48e66c4f0bd6b.text: We could use a few more mines like that.

a70a2a4cef5bf9d8a3de17b73279b69f.text: Ha! I will NEVER get tired of seeing that.

539187d5d5965fc7424fae4e29a12a7e.text: I could watch Vek pop into confetti all day.

cf5b61cdeb428c2053611da68aab7250.text: Tell #corp we're going to need another mine. And another Vek.

5e8149775a32180f41f78f287c1c6790.text: Proximity mine took out that Vek.

7596a27ec08f40a4fb86118d8739d20b.text: Vek hit a proximity mine - that evened the odds a bit.

055acf83155b5024484ec10634bfffdb.text: Proximity mine functioning within normal parameters.

ef506e9948e55b245dbfd05ed6dd9b03.text: It was killed b-b-by the mine.

59213d8a08cf083ee7fbeee5cf410922.text: The m-mine went off... the Vek d-didn't even see it...

47ed64b6dc40e79215bbb45386660da6.text: Those mines are old technology, but adequate.

4d1dec1d98a673d2f729d562ff7fad18.text: Well, those Old Earth mines still have some fire in them!

a3050b836fe21f4e775d7ebc8b4a0aaa.text: Terraformer destroyed. Hate to be the one to tell CEO Kern.

ba820bb1b0c377acf3e2a7a1fb75a3e7.text: Terraformer's down! So much for R.S.T. tech.

e13b84528bc19c661d9d429784e98a99.text: Terraformer destroyed. CEO Kern must be losing it right now.

2418c0300ec0f15692779adc6fbd011a.text: R.S.T. is going to have us filling out reports on this for months.

dd1354ff23c95783be0ad14f5e853f60.text: The terraformer no longer needs our protection.

02681b7c21ed6205b20d6669921116ab.text: A waste of perfectly good tech...

9983425a4768776322d311c05bce06bb.text: Terraformer has been recycled. May it never be rebuilt.

70ed20bb136800077f751d58effadda8.text: Crude, unplanned terraforming efforts have been put on hold. Indefinitely.

67eb6cd496700937ec07076aed2d5f27.text: Whoops. We needed that terraformer, right?

b47b0f8672f5ab07dd2336b3a9365949.text: Was that terraformer supposed to blow up?

058589232104c741fe95176200206e8c.text: Better than losing the Grid, but Kern's going to blow a fuse over the terraformer.

0c5e109d4b33142cc8a8fbaa253766a7.text: CEO Kern's going to lose it over that terraformer.

5bf0e0182a4853e4be98e32d3acfb903.text: Nothing we can do about that terraformer. R.S.T. can bill me.

394051ed6caa5353a154aad0b2d7f645.text: Mother... CEO Kern in this timeline... isn't going to be happy.

a8689704cd71d8c05ff204d00793dc7a.text: Terraformer represented a substantial investment of R.S.T. resources.

8270701736953bd38ba7e86a85b3a695.text: I believe the Corporate Accords protect us from any liabilities resulting from the terraformer's loss.

94dcfe6d672c3ae7d700dd67473f4d4a.text: The R.S.T. terraformer was doing tremendous damage to this island anyway.

682a09f6df6b02aff1cc29d71ba5c970.text: Report to my office about that terraformer as soon as you're back.

f9ff23a439f47e7caaa29c9635d04f61.text: About that terraformer... make my office the first stop when you return to base.

d7ea403a37840b1f86feca0d70aefaac.text:
After the player uses the terraformer (not necessarily the first, random chance)

This will obey the same rules as other barks, where something like a pilot death will take priority.

23f8182196370ee1deff0cd7b1f3f2b6.text: No wonder this island shifts so much.

89806da0ca52f708418b376c8bb1a2e4.text: Okay, that's scarier than these Mechs.

045b26f60fb2c18b6ae9e41d0e0f1b54.text: Think that's impressive? Wait till you see an R.S.T. Earth Mover in action.

4e0e06bbd7d04d82f497fb7b258a1449.text: [ Please stay clear of terraformer work area ]

2561d2e40d763a0303b1d0769383bf96.text: Watch out for the terraformer, it won't distinguish friend from foe.

54fde359d5ea69750037481d4f86e164.text: Keep a safe distance from the terraformer.

3ea51e77a933b7b107c422b0e6364855.text: Keep clear, let the terraformer do its work!

676987bb950d5aceffbf13411aaf6647.text: Wow. R.S.T. tech sure is... effective.

6e38459a9c41eacdcc7f2058dd21d9af.text: No wonder the Vek are attacking that thing.

93750d52c4cd9444ce4948f3be5f4098.text: The land will only endure so much.

2130abe75fa6ee1939f36d4ba6dd86d6.text: Fascinating! A marvelous piece of technology!

c1bf227dc7791778b3c2da516154bda4.text: It's much like a Detritus teleporter, but for sculpting terrain...

7166a6cde4c25a759973fc26b645aace.text: Whoa. That terraformer gives me the shivers.

dd4d7bd29c2158ddd042d96107ca2938.text: Stay clear of the terraformer, #squad - we've got our own job to do.

180877d33d04337108e20a881fff9e73.text: Keep the Vek away from the terraformer, #squad, let it do its work.

d6697bf9f88b21428d936d721eb50606.text: I need THAT as a weapon.

17f91db2efff30ebc0d7d53c22f64aa2.text: Work site has been altered. R.S.T. terrain successfully subjugated.

95f3d2b74c9a40f207f8a28c1fef78fc.text: The terraformer... just... d-d-dissolved the terrain.

ca788bd76d7893dda41ba395a5d5b227.text: R.S.T. Terraformer rezoning of region complete.

0c7271fd71916ba0b9287645c95c577d.text: That R.S.T. terraformer consumes an abhorrent amount of energy.

d1c85836c12d19543e4a16e8ffdcd5cb.text: Stay out of the terraformer's way and let it do its work.

a2e92506784daf6f4365b3ef2d6c0abe.text: Triggers when ground is falling during either RST mission with falling ground

fa80e47577ce338a9da543a1257d1815.text: Accessing: Region topography\nUpdated: Canyon added to database

3258a47e130876382db2dd591413b3bb.text: How does R.S.T. even live here?

4ed4788193367141de235635478d2d33.text: Quake on sensors... just another day in the R.S.T.

b27ab9ead3f1b52f95519df7586cb7aa.text: Living on R.S.T., you get used to the quakes.

5b4a30ee72d3583ef8193a748fc9a26b.text: It's a wonder R.S.T. doesn't tear itself apart...

e2a869bfb4811e575e2600d3acbb3562.text: This island is tearing itself apart - how does R.S.T. survive here?!

f8eb3f0d3d58ea8966bd95c94e7635c2.text: Use the canyons against the enemy.

741073f0027ce11d6ffd623c06ce0e53.text: Terrain is unstable. A new geologic survey of the area will be required.

ac6617c65525e54d38830361947371ec.text: These fissures will only stop ground Vek. Watch your sensors for airborne Vek.

9fbb5928ff5575be911cfa66889014e5.text: Is this island with us or against us?

b4a730edd5452f33dfacd86cd9907475.text: Never get used to fighting on this unstable terrain...

d260fe6bcff13a72788ef0a0e9055d2b.text: Watch your fire, #squad - and watch the ground!

fc29d2aa6f33202996155acc74fccedd.text: I think we just lost ground. Literally.

b04e2370d289b786409b5185f52fc638.text: Watch for tremors! If you fall, we won't be able to rescue you!

cb605f57e70ecb392da5bb8e03ebce7e.text: The foundation of the R.S.T. structures were designed to resist these quakes.

39683175f865ba5931eb20ade3dc00f5.text: S-S-Seismic readings are off th-the scale!

9ef02c62bb3ee77b9eb2f74e59d14380.text: Are these q-q-quakes... n-n-normal on R.S.T.?

1c60877c365da33aaa2f06be1da17939.text: Seismic readings indicate unstable land mass.

b1f1c6c9602adbfc5e00b96496ed251b.text: All ground units, be advised we have a terrain collapse in effect.

9619e2d0717b5f16eae3c96b838c9c47.text: Watch the terrain... R.S.T. is continually shifting and breaking apart.

e7d117d017a2bbb730b684f8645629f9.text: Watch for other strikes, we don't want to get hit, too.

cedc799cbb721d39ef4cf30e4f616912.text: R.S.T. started using the weather to fight the Vek... now it's fighting on its own.

585ced2901f36bf4e2834815427471aa.text: Guess lightning and Vek don't mix.

2251920fb1c52e1e6aba503ca166d738.text: Seems there's no such thing as a re-usable Vek lightning rod.

abcac06990c3f423a186d14ce2f059a1.text: Nothing like the smell of charred Vek.

fdd399e3c710d121c5730424ec6b8cc3.text: Did you see that flash? I feel bad for the Vek...

7b21e739a8d35bc9d118af4f348ef634.text: Confirmed. The Vek are not shielded against electrical discharges.

a71485eff2c4bb203f887f4aef08edc7.text: Looks like CEO Kern is putting the sky's natural weapons to good use...

2273838d7c81565cd873be01e48a6a2f.text: The storm has recycled the Vek.

c5e12efdd2b17cd4593cb2a57a3d52dc.text: The storm has disintegrated many of the Vek's essential nutrients.

772af2194229e55604fa2202e8203b5f.text: Ouch! Do you think that Vek felt any pain...?

a883a919cbdf0bd089f2328d21da332a.text: Vek got caught in the storm!

c0d3fee89dade2d0aacff725c98c2805.text: Weather reports today indicate a 100% chance of fried Vek.

9d034a7ef593bee779efc74558e23321.text: That must have been a shock... get it? Anyone?

118680d69c0a0c4ac7ba07fda0dfb5bf.text: R.S.T. weather stations report more strikes on the way...

762a3b20b281bb8fbfafab039b94e8a4.text: If only R.S.T. could regain control of those stormfronts...

b26470eb4b28d5d21108e193222062a7.text: Vek has been exposed to lethal amounts of electricity.

f39bd895cba7ec60137b5bfba1939f5a.text: Vek lacks adequate insulation to survive a lightning strike.

853731c75fcab0b4a57503fb686efe41.text: The V-Vek do not seem immune t-t-to electrical d-d-discharges.

c3e3de63c7a6aeeb3744d6ea66c252b0.text: The storm has discharged itself all over the Vek. Messy.

818cbe831f6ae41a390429e55849d893.text: Kern's going to lose it when she hears about the farm.

5cf139c0ea68444c9946396574918c80.text: Kern's not going to like our report about the farm, commander.

677cc1157af842a56ff026956ea399d9.text: Farm's destroyed - no way we can salvage it.

1814b38c221645c23c8f701c18667fcd.text: Every solar farm lost costs us more power in the future...

d6af43d64b4a51791567f9e2f1f9cbee.text: Kern won't be happy about that solar farm...

cb44263bb02ac0276d722d86503ed8de.text: No! We've lost the solar farm!

2acd821fdb8de6775425dd3f42326963.text: The solar farm... it's destroyed! The people...

a1f14e1f9253ff134fa4bf998b861017.text: The solar array is no more.

6282e4711b6d66e835e55460788fe34a.text: The array is lost. Focus on killing Vek.

4c335b8d9229e00c97c2706736207f72.text: Such a waste! All those solar panels... wrecked.

3b7f70fa2f0bd668f55593fec739fff5.text: I think we just lost the solar farm.

45dcdd385740b5b151d7ae14b201dc11.text: Solar farm's gone, nothing we can do about it now.

abde353a25b11afe5633b248ad9376e2.text: Solar array's components have failed to defend it.

98e8ae3dc2c4a385ecc29c4236bd9e4e.text: Unauthorized destruction of R.S.T. property detected.

6a71b48a5f631ac98cabfd04978c9e57.text: The solar farm's fragile construction has failed in light of current combat conditions.

8d7e4136158ca843ee32b9472e09c3a9.text: I'll see to it you apologize to the R.S.T. families personally.

bc49be5cfe3cbdbf0a873814804b1b6d.text: Remind player to destroy the mountains

5e0b6708cbb2f1abbf0abc2bc4141d20.text: Remember, we need to level those mountains before the Vek start making hives in them.

123749ed05a558d4ad766fd59a848120.text: Those mountains still have to go.

9d6d589a7ddcbc54d9e926f06b05c49c.text: Those mountain Vek-hives-to-be still need to be leveled.

82b40b516249669fabba38f398d1b2f9.text: [ Mountains still need to be destroyed ]

dd6da3d6a71ad1ff071d1deaa36b2b40.text: We still need to bring down those mountains, everyone.

b21b96b79742fe1d68b8c7cbfef2aec7.text: #squad, keep in mind we need to level those mountains before we go.

8bceaceb5bfefae163298302746331b4.text: Still need to bring down those mountains...

6037114dbd644d8ef44ffdd6070dd42e.text: The mountain range is still intact... if we don't bring it down, the Vek will make hives there.

8951d22145213a3f858a71e6f9e29d4f.text: Our orders are clear. The mountains must be destroyed.

ed880910b038abcd3791ca1b55ef8b93.text: We still need to destroy those mountains... prevent the Vek from nesting in them.

6c593db14bd016b6209ef79279c07ddf.text: That mountain range still needs to be leveled...

a86a68f4f6aad4d06f0c2f8e43a8285b.text: We still need to bring down those mountains, don't we?

17c842a34172d9f5df53d9629711f933.text: Mountains must be removed to prevent Vek hive formation.

d3060fabc060ef9ade6b3cc0e32de6bd.text: Mountains still need to be recycled.

a28a3d8686ae1ba74c7eeec4a8ba2728.text: Can we blow up some mountains now? Please? They gave us permission!

a2e2c1adc0f9ca84303c472c4741383e.text: I know we have our orders, but I don't understand why R.S.T. can't dissolve the mountains themselves...

c9e5084733e570eb784067547fb8f6da.text: Don't forget - we're here to take down the mountains, CEO Kern's orders.

0f4b10a7dcd918d3afe3c86b0ea17f8a.text: Still got more mountain clean-up work to do, #squad.

d0bf2212d1235c6fdcbdcbfb5ce7831b.text: Wait... didn't the commander say something about blowing up the mountains?

d705853a3586d7701a9fbe4e806aa10d.text: I hope you're not expecting me to destroy all the mountains.

d3e4187238b85d4ffd5e4fbccc0a654e.text: We still need to bring down those mountains. Commander's orders.

59493f4b22e2dc3ce6dbcc7b1975ae33.text: All #squad - if you don't have a clear shot at the Vek, level the mountains!

e28e63a475f3a7dcf2751fa6e8fde140.text: Remember - our mission is to take down those mountains if we can.

94b1bde50486a61da92479407bec5994.text: Our work orders are clear. Mountains must be obliterated.

2fd2bbd28e1bcd39a58e9f203eb440f0.text: S-should I handle destroying the m-mountains?

1dd4929530e57be7867ce2014c5e154e.text: Mountains in region queued for excavation.

b9bb71467952169d2bf1adcc7d96df3d.text: Requesting authorization to commence mountain excavation.

01012a2c6647d746a5fe0eca528570b2.text: I feel the need to remind everyone we need to bring down those mountains.

bdc370367253744aaa375bc6c6618ce5.text: You have your orders. Those mountains need to come down.

53534e7c400f1b9dbad518d489e459ba.text: If those mountains remain standing, the Vek will use them as a staging ground for more attacks.

022e2228ac341a47b35fd2bfcd22464e.text: Vek Frozen by Mine. This takes priority over all other Freeze conditions.

6da7da095ccfc90e5742c0212e3a1da3.text: Update: Vek in hibernation mode\nCause: Pinnacle cryo-mine

119153225a93b47cf2d88e324f375f19.text: Update: Vek mobility at 0%\nCause: Pinnacle cryo-mine

e94046f509e910bf9f9ce797628b8132.text: The cryo-mine got one of the Vek!

4635eed9112ccb1ed033f82bbbae06c5.text: Cryo-mine went off! Vek's frozen solid!

31b2834dd82f11e4f5eaae8beccae36f.text: The Vek need to learn to watch where they step.

83b954a6b8cd25aa7d1745f27be3a826.text: Vek was immobilized by the cryo-mine, but it's still alive.

74de6e063d06d108d30ca0ab9b6c7e4a.text: Land mine's better, but putting them on ice is just fine with me.

5d8755f43f609db6d673219a9413f854.text: The cryo-mine put that Vek on ice.

3596aa963324576d26e61f677646fbc8.text: Cryo-mine went off! The Vek's completely encased in ice!

8144ab443adfc10862311fbd385dde59.text: The cryo-mine has suspended the Vek in ice.

606307465eac6d9d2a46c3af25a1d263.text: The cryo-mine has rendered the Vek inert until we dispose of it.

fce1f94a71528157dadcf2389b778192.text: Cryo-mine'll teach that Vek not to trespass on Pinnacle Island!

ee84ef3b2566243d16103c51db2d708b.text: I bet that Vek's blinking under the ice, wondering what happened.

e1a6ca7408b8fc2d8f8b16d5330934e0.text: Cryo-mine took it out. For now.

d5f14830cc4bbde8082c1795df8cc6bb.text: It's been frozen by the cryo-mine - but it's still alive.

d030ba99d946835e551a98f20be65d75.text: #squad! Try to position yourselves between the Vek and the cryo-mines!

f361c4e0083a3d2682e4c76cb20ad544.text: Cryo-mine is functioning within normal parameters.

1e9924602bfe465febc8978c317dd180.text: Vek has failed to observe worksite safety procedures.

a29a9cd899a4c8d9a00dd0f183dfe0b0.text: The cryo-mine... it s-s-stopped the Vek!

6d4ce201f0da209d34d45dffbebe2c06.text: Vek life signs are s-s-slowing - it's t-t-trapped.

c435075f16393a813c358141cc85a53e.text: The Vek hit by the c-cryo-mine... its metabolic readings are s-s-slowing!

1e66df1b46c3c560b83a6d6cfd0803c8.text: An old cryo-mine design, but adequate.

eb885688e00cab3ba7f16c4f2d22d199.text: The cryo-mine has preserved the Vek. I am detecting very faint life signs.

d862965d61542d79908d75fe30e75514.text: The ice is only a temporary solution. Something may yet set it free.

b97e6f598a4c90ce815c9e64abfcff97.text: The cryo-mine has frozen the Vek. Focus on other targets now.

940b14d7c6c873c838948acf168db1c8.text: The factory wasn't designed to withstand that kind of damage.

96e3e3b4949360868cc281afc13964bd.text: There was no way it could withstand a hit like that.

367a4abadcdbe3436b85673eb171e61c.text: Factory's down. At least it's not spawning more problems.

66cec287be34f3b795f0d0277054a7e1.text: Wish we could have saved it... Zenith, we're so sorry.

4161d18272f68b5d35c4e6ae1e968bfc.text: If only we had had the time to fix the factory...

32d37312d2651594292733e233a569af.text: A shame. I'm sure we could have fixed that factory.

692dcc81bb891f4e2d81e5e72c3b1086.text: Now we may never know what went wrong at the factory...

bc25bf939502475828f77ebdf920443a.text: Robotics factory operations have been halted. Indefinitely.

396c288a86f39f285e978da79a0c4879.text: Whoops. Was that factory supposed to blow up?

1de0ad003b743c266164faabb08d5cbe.text: ...I'll report the factory's loss to Zenith personally.

95a0140b108ee8cd942798fde38a14cf.text: Uh, the loss of that factory? It's really the robot's fault when you think about it.

acaa7961c2e1afb311868357f40f3b3d.text: Let me handle the debriefing on the loss of the factory, I'll smooth this over.

bbf5d9871221dd6adc81bea37c184194.text: Factory's destroyed. Need to do better, #self_first...

ba8bdec0beb3d9dbdebd844c471166e2.text: The factory's components have failed to defend it.

e7552703d07489a496c9f3f9ab67c0cf.text: The factory's structural integrity has been found lacking.

2a15e9ef476ee6d4320e483836d2661c.text: The factory was too fragile to survive the attack.

306c2f3cd6dcfb02d1e0493a64e539d9.text: All that r-r-research... all th-th-those robots... lost.

bb21be48328f3b8adda4b21fb87afb1f.text: Were we... weren't we s-s-supposed to p-p-protect the factory?

64e887e337389581201b3ad09cd2d5e0.text: Unauthorized destruction of Pinnacle property detected.

efe91558b4550e270f30b1a416d03f42.text: Thousands of intelligences... current and future... extinguished.

64f118da5735e5bcb8ae4d241ff2bce6.text: I... I can't look. Shutting down receptors.

d671c3b95a75c14eeab1b9d6f656b183.text: Now we'll never know if we could have saved them.

02bd86c8a5c2c525ea3062cdacde4d92.text: That factory housed millions of lives. They were sick, but they could have been helped

25835de5f9392a3d5a0a1c5dd1db619f.text: I'm picking up another Sentient Machine on sensors.

4c3192cfaa90c83695f3a46a4b5ccb5a.text: That factory has deployed another mobile cannon.

9bd9e627ef85a7a15382b8f829063da4.text: Factory's spitting out bots. Be careful.

70f7fcc8cd5ae690d816acb672edb1e5.text: Great - Pinnacle's best robots are now part of the problem.

f39d6cfca1da75f0c4d88423aa237389.text: The factory has deployed more soldiers.

dc8f5d4c97b56f4a3185a83f33842eb9.text: The factory sends more to test us.

1069ee498d797cee044fbcda1af31e99.text: The factory's still producing robots! At an incredible pace!

7e12aeee6ec99648a0f89cb1a5515347.text: Malfunctioning robotics factory has produced another malfunctioning robot.

26580113093b9ae19cdb6504c785e3e5.text: More crazy robots are coming out of that factory!

a5e2fb232006989356fc1c3963afe9b3.text: Got more robots on the field!

56e03e602c2b5ee0a6952a46175d3a94.text: Try and take the robots out before they activate!

98e9a6bd865d1117de7e03098af3e6bd.text: More cannon-bots...? Need to end this fight quick.

208b91ed8d7fd3ace4b4e308c7d1894e.text: Good to see the factory that's spitting out murder bots is working JUST fine.

76843de557a4ddab5ebb714d4fe64897.text: Need to take those robots out before they activate!

77feb369bcee2cec830fcc47e231b7db.text: The factory has deployed a new construct to be deconstructed.

36747052b7f3a5ce683b07e2ec33efb6.text: The factory is compounding its errors by emitting damaged robots.

42e841be365de11b57adea035d8ce551.text: M-M-More robots... and their p-p-programming's still erratic.

d63cded31eed2a451ee96098b50dc87a.text: M-M-More robots... try to avoid d-destroying them!

1e2a6b5a6f49a7fcef65b2431c1f1dd7.text: Pinnacle facility is refusing to comply with closure request.

9a9707f4c874d33838172056fe8b18ab.text: This robot... forgive the term... is experiencing contradictory directives.

9529014a4466fe295155bf62dd70f0aa.text: This robot is unable to extinguish friend from foe.

39dc55c3ffdece6c3590447f07006224.text: These Pinnacle models are surprisingly last-gen... and erratic.

bb3baa6eb80cab294fb935a01ea5bd80.text: Destroy that robot if you must, the threat it poses to innocents is too high.

4800ef6b2b1c6c4f223119f12f976ef0.text: That robot is sick and a threat, but I wish you did not have to kill it.

db76c6b36b0b45014b63895597379117.text: Another malfunctioning robot has been detected, be wary.

e3291a070c00522d5b6d377cf17739f5.text: A selection of enemies on the map are freed from ice (might be bots)

dde6b6dc4123ef38e14bde7707f3e498.text: [ Enemies have freed themselves from the ice ]

1768c918792d1e935f6b3b226f02d370.text: Looks like our friends have thawed out.

bd50556befb860ab82bcf7ddf5f9cfc9.text: They broke free! We've got company!

85290586e4ea82309b4bf72525c741c4.text: Looks like even the cold can't hold them for long...

d6e1165a7f3f5274a9b64c09e3737cf6.text: Was hoping they'd stay encased in the ice longer...

edf9954aa2c6a9753363137e753beb91.text: Interesting. The cold didn't stop it for long.

0e1feaf0a820bb1e19414749fcea6079.text: They've freed themselves from the ice!

2b7aecdcf475887ef5f9099303997481.text: The hostile is no longer suspended in ice.

4459e410fd92427d822ba9a312e35ad9.text: The hostile has ended its hibernation period.

7306502dd9e93cb4977f6ce95161f6f4.text: The ice is no longer halting enemy movement.

96d533c7e5ad80ee6b9cea7ab8127a91.text: Guess the enemy didn't like being icicles, they're free!

f4b83200c17016b9fd72e873a0540b87.text: Hostiles breaking free of the ice!

d07157549a5edee4badd296130db3287.text: Enemies have broken free of the ice. Great.

11b96724079ee2cb70c6298b47e3e9aa.text: They're free of the ice?! Nghhhh... can we EVER catch a break?

a9acce657e98701d789aa344b646c252.text: It was only a matter of time before they broke free...

b89c931424901a3a763bd8a18f4ea788.text: Watch out, they're breaking free of the ice!

d4457d326c8d2dd68c074813ea9b7bc3.text: Hostile units have broken free of ice.

8d6f27daae1a34fca6d5779d5de6210b.text: Hostile units have escaped the ice and are on the move.

cd925bfae88bd1670aefa13ec5b4746a.text: W-Was afraid th-the ice w-w-wouldn't hold them!

74428fadf09a1836383f95aca5693ff3.text: The fr-frozen enemies - they b-b-broke free!

48064efa9111d607feb44c59bbbbb841.text: Target no longer impeded by climate conditions.

bbd4e73e201d1f31cb2fbb98be8d8490.text: Climate controls are failing. These enemies are being released from the ice.

0c35db130bb2a58b1b1dc8452ef5e481.text: Update: Vek in hibernation mode\nCause: Meteorological

6d8720eaa2d94f7c5a15ceb6e35567a7.text: Storm's wreaking hell on those Vek.

dc945b3ffcc2049aa65041841fa14b9b.text: That'll put it on ice for a while.

2f48924d7365fcbe3937bc7040696c3b.text: Don't break it free until we're ready to kill it.

6fd2592a4d1d34fb6befdbd852cd7ebd.text: The cold has paralyzed the Vek!

c1403e3d413b9b0675f641a57aaa2bf5.text: The Vek are at the mercy of the elements just as we are.

217547d5737388c92fd1fed1689f9693.text: The storm has suspended the Vek in ice.

6a113de3b66522b72963e001529e41a7.text: The storm is acting as a deterrent to the Vek's aggression.

58e0964e90af6389c18b31ffbff74a26.text: The storm has rendered the Vek inert until we dispose of it.

31b0102fb3f2e88c6f13d1ab71efd851.text: That Vek got caught in the storm!

895931a76d803660efe8943c3b24ce2f.text: Brrrr. I got chills just watching that Vek freeze!

3f6c0f774f19ae69ae9217aa886a45c3.text: Looks like an early winter for the Vek...

3e925e60f66d4d7733fcc87ba779cb99.text: That storm should slow the Vek down.

ec36d214b9c6810a6c4926ef52cdb280.text: Hope that Vek wasn't expecting a warm reception...

258a155208f41d07445e535c89382a01.text: Guess that Vek'll need to wait for the thaw.

eec870b619b8a532df4e0959c5f0f0db.text: Different kind of storms than at R.S.T., but still effective against the Vek.

56b4502d14f859d3fc60ca8a27d61360.text: Vek seem unable to c-c-cope with extreme cold... or water...

431d7853f06752d530ca9eff7ea518a6.text: R-R-Registering faint life signs from the frozen Vek... but it can't m-m-move.

576e07402b346e5fc002385d01474e25.text: The Vek has succumbed to the storm.

567d96d1673640c88e011c2f5dfa5936.text: The storm has trapped the Vek.

2cb726596947ca617d4038a518ec205f.text: Snowstorm freezes speaking Mech -- This takes priority if Vek are frozen as well

fa3023d5812b1e146c0bb2ad16a1d8b8.text: Warning: Mobility compromised\nCause: Unfavorable weather conditions

7a04029a0b7878c4341c6e802519d9f1.text: I thought R.S.T. weather was hell...

4687e701a769c2b3f381ebc39194ed36.text: Systems unresponsive - the cold's shut them down.

00339f468c88c4d1418adffa2ad1646d.text: Storm's paralyzed my Mech! Thought the damn webs were bad...

3a67a920b8ee9d7bf2ea76af95c73d0b.text: My Mech isn't shielded against the cold! My controls are frozen!

790e69cbd54339f8430686804ff052f4.text: My #self_mech has been suspended in ice.

3a544939ba744ed24660cfe166dd031d.text: The storm has rendered my #self_mech inert.

78f6fcc3160f1b960b9cb1f5769528ee.text: I got caught in the storm! My Mech's shutting down!

73edf22e98775b877cb3588aefb9fdc7.text: I'm iced in, but really, it's kind of cozy.

5e239f2b437b157b8da691dff3177439.text: Concentrate on the Vek, I'll free myself from the ice!

ac62b81fa9bf7275956744d9a15ddc3f.text: My Mech's frozen solid! Do I have to wait for summer, or...?

d7a5e80249f1b21bccc8b0a850165db7.text: What the hell - these Mechs can't handle cold?!

75f354ef24fb3abcb0e5a1fdeb6827fa.text: My Mech refuses to respond. Preparing repair components to free unit from the ice.

0df47ab467c124c343b6337bc5eb61ce.text: The storm... it's... it's freezing m-my systems!

54a2f8c52e18024ead5de56402f9103a.text: This Mech impeded by climate conditions.

7e316028a73daa5d0f12ab4ae15370bf.text: The cold is exceeding this Mech's capabilities.

10eee25799113419544e753d88eb3786.text: Update: Target decommissioned\nArchiving: Factory serial number to casualty reports

c1d1d0fa1cc967fe9369660d8eeed9bd.text: Update: Target deactivated\nArchiving: Factory serial number to casualty reports

9ab5781bddbbd7e62691512b953e1260.text: That's one way to fix its bugs.

d4035b685ca2583feb356ae9d02eee04.text: If only we knew what was wrong with the robots...!

995b5df8ca350b21f6bbec62247f2092.text: I... I tried to avoid the memory core. Maybe its black box can be salvaged?

159308e9b9a2a80ca7ab9ac8128467b5.text: If I could have reprogrammed it, I assure you, I would, but...

14d602626aa91a981bb201395b73b219.text: Short-term battlefield advantage offset by loss of potential long-term robot ally.

ee7243000f23c51407423f32314f9392.text: Chance of reassigning damaged robot to recovery at Archive: 0%.

27b658479e49de2b293a3a99cbfe2f37.text: Sorry, little crazy robot, but I had to.

769e93dac54265e7dfbdddcca528ecb7.text: We're trying to keep from killing the robots, but...

c32bdbd7aff8e5c7e52821aa980adc88.text: We can't protect the robots and fight the Vek at the same time...

e32877aa44cacd9813ad06ca2ada4864.text: That robot had to be destroyed. I'll apologize to Zenith personally.

4727747335e9b3da46290cf67b0fefc9.text: Another robot down. Zenith can bill me...

9c48627c456a0df714011f28e0b900e1.text: Er, you think Zenith saw me destroy that robot? What am I saying, of course she did.

c0c400eebf52c4648957686ae9255944.text: Can't say I'm too torn up about destroying a robot...

a2ff09c54bf67f8f2f2ca37825aaadd3.text: Had to destroy one of the robots, commander.

3762c6d502a106300c96c14a3bb6c277.text: One of the robots was destroyed, commander.

78fa65021ca426b250fe3da56a6bb82e.text: I... d-d-didn't want to destroy the robot, but...

c66c68fe3f8c912ddcf19d7c79557c62.text: We robots are supposed to be setting an example for the humans, not working against them.

933dabf1b0dc359fa16801d66ff35e63.text: Player is observed to kill a hostile Bot

2be854124d57bc4c2697aee5cb91587f.text: Hate to see any tech destroyed...

79daec2934a5adf6d1dc0c5946637ec5.text: These bots didn't leave us much choice.

177c17bdb65effddde392cb6b83b7fdf.text: If only we had time to diagnose what was wrong with them...

089784be7b07aa18d8398fb7c51f8fd2.text: Sorry, Pinnacle, but it's us or them.

b5e8ff3390faf3299b4a9b7f89b3dde2.text: Zenith's not going to be happy.

53f9fe06a75cd6304a16efe199509cc9.text: I wish we could have fixed it...

fad1a7ed27d08669d3636acef17acf5a.text: That robot was at the mercy of its programming...

a8b148aa40fc29fce2f7831e36834ff7.text: I know this is war, but we should protect the robots if we can...

d4b459e4f7663255ce8682d7d2bc7a5a.text: I may still be able to examine that robot's remains.

ba493e067c2273b08e4f9cf0324ef1d9.text: Why are the robots acting so crazy?

61b2485e358af69afb278c76485e234a.text: That robot had to be stopped. I'll apologize to Zenith personally.

813ca44514a57853852e59ca8ee63069.text: If you can spare the robots do it, but don't put yourself at risk to do so.

e07733a38ecfcefc65c316d7ba81c5f9.text: It was a murder-bot - what else could you do?

64ed4802c7a17e1b5188a15f902563bf.text: I respect Zenith wanting to save these robots, but they ARE trying to kill us.

4736f82d9ba6b6aa3eae72ec26eea5b1.text: We're supposed to try and protect the robots if we can.

719fd11293b424f091f18541bffe33af.text: This is against our mission parameters.

c8a2646da47a14986fca832c60e53d4e.text: If we can spare the r-r-robots... Zenith w-would want that.

af68a0b0119480e76ba70fde44c408b3.text: Unfortunate loss of a robot. Serial number recorded.

ed37cde172ae78f207ce45b5c6902c4c.text: Why would Zenith allow something like this to occur?

7d6eba96d210432baefcb35975de11fd.text: Killing that robot was an unfortunate necessity.

5dd9967adce1106f2e9273401c426f65.text: I take no pleasure in the demise of my sick brethren.

6dab69427d4e50a5add91e4131e8c621.text: That machine had to be destroyed.

0d476e9a437e80c678355918f95e479e.text: Player was supposed to defend the Disposal unit and it was destroyed -- Shooter could be anyone

e914d19cefb26680ac56a8c8dc3ad50b.text: Launcher's destroyed, we're on our own.

1f503ea3c8c829764b131faa80dfcf6e.text: That disposal unit was key to Detritus' recovery efforts...

a2ce0e1bc5a8562a8ba8e883592e4cfb.text: Detritus was relying on that disposal unit - we've set them back years.

101c060caf29ab74e7c456d6af15ab2a.text: Dammit! We needed that disposal unit intact!

044823d7807847c7e78147877ae44b69.text: No! We've lost the launcher! The poor crew...

74889b286f261577397aa77a37329ea2.text: The launcher and its crew... they're gone!

f2219f947aa3d071b7a4c69e3349fc41.text: I... I could repair the disposal unit, but the crew...

f17e22d4a4c00b1b05112bec128c172c.text: Detritus toxin deployer destroyed. A.C.I.D. production halted.

42f38cc19c5b8fd1f3728fe3fdf497fe.text: Detritus' poisonous chemical deployment system has been shut down.

f6fdaac244ad9509001d9575640a880d.text: Uh... now the disposal unit's gone, what now?

370fb050dcea9e4f6833afaf240f7458.text: I don't even want to think how much that unit costs.

40b455e6f6edc4849dfe1b8490cbe960.text: We needed that Detritus unit to clear the Vek hives!

e53f96a14c7326457ed8977f6e813aab.text: Detritus vomit dispenser is gone, nothing we can do about it now.

a5009c14c7f3c3f7635d0acf3fe18b13.text: Vikram will understand. We're helping him, right?

13f5194e135b136a76d4e7f76e8bf498.text: Let me handle the debriefing on what happened to the disposal unit, I'll smooth this over.

b818df62a7a8227efad38fd9c3eea3e4.text: The disposal unit's components have failed to defend it.

8edee61e2fb7282ebddae93797a77341.text: Unauthorized destruction of Detritus property detected.

c51a137b8dd305c365f6d7ed4474c6b7.text: Well, we'll never hear the end of this from the Detritus 'intelligences'.

978c08e6d0478730e0ad0164223096d6.text: I believe the Corporate Accords will protect us from any liabilities resulting from this.

ab43cbde6e81bc8b15b96d326672a337.text: Ah... unfortunate. I had hoped we could keep the unit intact, it was key to our defense.

0aa2f7927def9a525f4a63f7bb36b0d2.text: Player uses Disposal Unit  -- mass damage

b70676f47c2f08a6663d337463766d11.text: I wouldn't want to be in charge of cleaning this up...

5a2a92ade66a8ae723581237c27f1860.text: [ Please stay clear of disposal unit's zone of operations ]

aa54c7a632175a62a4379efa5fc589d1.text: Be careful of any splash damage - those chemicals will dissolve the hull in seconds!

09d7ec7f274468c062320689e9b3f9f6.text: Keep a safe distance from the disposal unit!

52771d101312c41f6460babf891bb23b.text: Detritus certainly knows how to wipe away problems...

e090b6d95234ad44919e20fe83b9b9e9.text: Oh my God. That disposal unit... is unbelievable.

b4155b045116986203f073cabcffabb3.text: That disposal unit, it... it just liquefied the terrain.

cb7410f72295c706a800b8478e2cd589.text: Give the launcher space to do its work.

e871a3b814d6a90b3da42f4ec31f0d8a.text: My word, I see Detritus wasn't exaggerating about those chemicals.

a6efd6f26d10e9b1377bc175ad06ac10.text: Detritus toxin deployer has been activated. Wasteful. Inefficient.

ebd22030474a4c2431824340cdd0b6b4.text: Detritus toxin deployer has released more A.C.I.D. nanites to destroy habitat.

359cb341a3767db6c42eed8f32b1fca6.text: Did you see what that disposal unit just did?!

c529d32775c6847881ba2667063bcbd7.text: ...That disposal unit is one reason I don't miss working at Detritus.

a7b8395f882dd6cccd0df92aef7ecbcd.text: ...Disposal units like that are a reason I volunteered as a pilot.

d3db557e54396d798e08024752b49888.text: Give that disposal unit some treads and we'll win this war.

add7bb36839c59c55af29d54f56f5fb8.text: Detritus unit's saturated the ground, commander.

ef89b6a70d32b9bc7aa80611d42b1438.text: The disposal unit is dousing terrain with nanite disassemblers.

79831b9ca8d5230a8465b6acfcf61618.text: D-Disposal unit's r-releasing enough chemicals to poison the oceans.

45ba09097fed70937afa361f384cf641.text: Detritus unit rezoning of region complete.

4e036683ca21e6d23393a58dee864b07.text: That Detritus unit certainly makes a mess. I hope I didn't get any A.C.I.D. on my hull.

eee7db78ff84a629414e31273872a619.text: That A.C.I.D.- dispensing sludge thrower doesn't exactly brighten up the landscape, does it?

c77a69da2b8ee79ccd9529b733b8239a.text: The disposal unit has proven very effective against the Vek. I wish we could make it mobile.

55cfebe6dbbc1ffbb9fe603a31d8fbcd.text: A.C.I.D. barrel destroyed (as per mission objectives) -- shooter unclear

386d8015f82ba438cdddc327ee0ff083.text: I hope those chemicals do the job...

77ddc1f0de65e0eac3394a8fd4a464db.text: The vat has been breached, chemicals released.

1600389b80c65db1a88cfbc44900e2e4.text: Wait till the Vek below catch a whiff of that...

467b5fd01038a5c881a839ade8fe75e3.text: I almost feel sorry for the Vek below...

cc427f07ed2491c3b1a8605babcd5f6d.text: My, that Detritus A.C.I.D. burns through the ground fast!

15bfafc7036a21b867d3bd4593ef22d7.text: Detritus toxins now seeping into Vek hives.

1b297d3140d6b98893f20cf94b6f17ee.text: Containment vat has been cut open, and A.C.I.D. is bleeding into surrounding terrain.

01110194760fb30094b4702bb399d952.text: A.C.I.D. released! I feel sorry for the Vek below... almost.

84693412a0e463adcf1f0614a6e031cd.text: Keg's tapped! Er... well, the A.C.I.D. barrel is.

890e47524454695bf4a93f3a1175ca21.text: Detritus A.C.I.D. vat has been punctured. Chemical release detected.

9bfb9ee14e58cfc9f6bf22022bb7afa3.text: Please observe safe distance from ruptured Detritus vat.

bf3f6eec2a8f56cd3a9d304976e7da6a.text: V-Vat's releasing the A.C.I.D. into the ground - sh-should hit the Vek hives soon.

d95f0f106ae45e9642192743d4bc3f60.text: Vat destroyed. The chemicals are draining into the hives below.

78408ce25277be594e6d3a30455fb682.text: Excellent, commander! The Vek should get a taste of the A.C.I.D. soon.

ec14cbe46bae02e08ca626f1c7618364.text: Guess we'll need to ration the juice to our Mechs in the future...

0752186ff80b227a14082f43385759ac.text: It's gone - focus on the Vek.

3a7bf8a8fbc61520f6ad085657f88d2e.text: ...I think the power plant is closed for good.

eaa88cbd6bef7dcf1f86de7bb350bf56.text: Whoops. We needed that power plant, right?

386f90695511693566aceaa1fe80745b.text: ...Was that power plant supposed to blow up?

3f1d1b9617b63bcf9182c000404b7745.text: Power plant's lost. I'll apologize to Director Singh myself.

9f26f49c57dd08cdfbf3ab36fa57f98c.text: Were we supposed to protect the power plant?

bd1490cf5cb0295d12d63cfa162273ed.text: The power plant's gone... oh man, we are in SO much trouble.

ea0abba0ba96e4da5ac9c44ffdd9a6df.text: The power plant's components have failed to defend it.

086682363098b5f8fb1f137f54aebd98.text: Ah... unfortunate. Still, better that we ration power from here on out than lose the region!

e65bb00a0823c1c31671cf0135817093.text: Detritus needs to miniaturize these things.

e5098f85fd5e78bec482713b3085bd76.text: These teleporters weren't made for living matter...

a2fd96bab6c14014c84ce57605e4f2ba.text: I hope this doesn't cause any permanent cellular damage...

764de66f644dc4a9e66f62f5a4b521cc.text: I do not need these tricks, but I will use them.

a74e46bbcfe4901bf9fdf210e2108296.text: It is said teleporters steal the soul of those who pass through them.

fcd3c28505600e5f728bd49a0b0851c5.text: I have been recycled and reassembled.

2f8f76bb43c34b375647626cd6b8984a.text: Wheee! I want to do that again!

1f95fa44f70113f4a7576115aeed27dd.text: Remember - red to red, blue to blue.

002318c8b7b27dd597e12371804ca66e.text: Displacement successful. All components accounted for.

a831375a21ce220066ba2fdb31bff7c0.text: Teleport complete... and my voice. It's... steady.

f1dbea0ecd472facd06e79229f43265c.text: Recalibrating coordinates... wait, is that my voice?

756b4021ddd822d72181725054c0f6bd.text: These teleporters are much larger and clunkier than I expected.

4ae7ee5d294cd59d7b61b3d988f2d726.text: If you feel faint or dizzy after teleporting, please contact our medical division at once.

af0fdda728744b4ede2c30d010dbb3ef.text: Mech moves on conveyor (self) (does not hit anything, no damage, etc.)

5f35c6a0e216dfe01603f0b14501afd2.text: Wish we had these at Archive for moving the relics...

7ce9ded995573b613b0e4097e5c1d627.text: Hope this doesn't take me to a Mech disposal site...

01b886ddd1a2fedb92fda844a5ffea3f.text: Need to get off this before it dumps me in a vat.

9c0e14736849e2c17a3de5c72f81d203.text: Looks like these belts can support our Mechs after all.

55b60e52bb06c7dd9d890041a09b71c6.text: Time to go for a ride.

a436a5e153f4803000d9566cf75c5aba.text: Let's put these belts to use.

c68155c925966ca13d2e36e234fc4134.text: Just like an old-fashioned airport walkway...

cdb8a462a38e9bc7b00ebc152d9f4d0b.text: Using this conveyer belt is... undignified.

e80f379f3dffa109f4de1ff3717426b3.text: I certainly hope the Mech's weight doesn't exceed the belt's safety parameters...

4dfb0781a716306c254e7b5f8bbb051d.text: Detritus uses these to transport waste.

f1b2bac5b975866b2054d4cce215c97f.text: These conveyer belts belong in a theme park!

2de102674944054345cc496bdc74fb1e.text: Mech, meet conveyer belt. Conveyer belt, meet Mr. Mech.

3a2b51e8df5a26816b9d85157fc82705.text: Let's put this Detritus conveyer to work...

44769cd658ab198bcb0109cb1cd5fc1e.text: It is a work site violation to use the conveyer belts for personal use.

dbb71e6a6aa8eded73a21be4d81a8a91.text: Using conveyer belts without hand rails is a court-martial offense.

8cea783760d71ff446d250062cad201e.text: Uh... is it s-s-safe to m-m-move on this?

9356ee378dcdacdb365f158798b4dfee.text: Reporting self-violation of conveyer use safety protocols.

ec5c014613629e2a0bd0ae370e9d20e9.text: This manner of conveyance is unbecoming of an intelligence such as myself.

25a1bf23c2a92a25985b7fc40ba5e6df.text: How embarrassing... being ferried about by such a primitive device.
